title: Bad stay, totally uncoordinated
desc: The counter people gave me room cards to another person's room. It was quite bad experience, with not much verification done. They basically just asked for my first name and gave me a card key. I went up and down 25 floors, 3 times as the door simply would not open. After that, the person in the room opened up the door with a very shocked face, and totally unsure what happened. Turns out we both had the same first name. Your team did give a wine to apologise, but it was not a great stay overall..

title: Great central location
desc: Loved this hotel! Very clean. Comfy large suites, with fantastic location. Stayed for 5 nights, and we had a great time. Suite was very large and comfortable. Bathroom has a good selection of toiletries and smell lovely. Yea, coffee facilities provided. A water filtered tap is in the bathroom, which is great to refill your water bottles up. -no incase you have forgot it, a clean bottle for you to use while you stay is provided. Shopping centre is through the door at the shopping centre. Breakfast is of great quality and plenty to choose from. You have 2 restaurants to choose from. If you can‚Äôt find anything you like. On the ground floor of the shopping centre is a very large food hall, worth paying a visit. We did treat ourself to a afternoon tea, which really was a master

title: A Nice ammbience hotel
desc: Nice hotel, with old school design. Authentic decoration. Service quite similiar with for platinum member with gold member. Not quite welcome in this hotel. The old guys who guard the frond door, very good personal. He try to remeber any guest name and give greetings very polite.

title: Family Staycay
desc: Had a family staycay back on 2021, Great hotel modern with luxury looks, room was clean and spacious. Had a great stay with my family, kids were happy with the poolüòÄ Overall worth the stay and definitely will stay again in times to come, thumbs up!üëçüèºüëçüèº

title: Best way to see Singapore
desc: This is the 2nd time I have stayed here and can't rate it enough. Great location for seeing the city, beautiful rooms and the staff are just excellent. Would never hesitate to recommend this to anyone.

title: It was good
desc: It was a good experience, i choose the accomodation first because of the location, it is connecting to mall. The room also excellent but i think the bathroom - closer need to be completed with a water bidet.

title: Service was bad
desc: -Refrigerator was broken, but they cannot swap or repair -The sink drain was clogged I called operator about these issue, but they have not answered for total 3 hours. I asked them to change the room, they finally accept my asking.

title: Great stay, one of the best locations!
desc: There was a pre check in recommendation and it was really good fast check in process for us. Room itself was quite normal clean simple but I'm not sure I'd rate this 5 stars, because I felt the room facilities were quite normal nothing outstanding nor luxury. Food options and convenience of shopping, access to MRT stations - these were all great. That is why I rate this overall a very good stay. I shall return!

title: Personal 5 star service!
desc: We were in Singapore for a good few days and i couldn‚Äôt ask for anything more than the spectacular personal service at Fairmont Singapore. From the moment I stepped out of the taxi all the way to the dreadful day where i have to check out, i was pampered by the amazing staffs. Housekeeping kept my room spotless throughout my stay, the check in agent at the front desk ( I didn‚Äôt manage to catch his name) did a speedy yet informative check in and the staff at Fairmont Gold Lounge was out of this world with their bubbly staffs and superb hospitality . (Wish i had remember all of their name, a few to mention was ricky, jamie and furdos) Definitely the hotel to turn to whenever i come back to Singapore.

title: Outstanding service, excellent location
desc: We thought this accommodation was outstanding, the rooms and the service were far superior to a 5 star hotel we stayed at in Singapore the week after. There was nothing we could fault. Great pool area and choice of restaurants - very hand how it backs onto the raffles city mall too.

title: Very happy
desc: Warm welcome, great room and service, perfect location for a few nights, choice of 2 locations for breakfast was great. Acess to the shopping centre and restaurants is perfect, plus the supermarket downstairs.

title: New year's rip off
desc: Recently renovated rooms were a little too dark. We took up the New Year Celebrations at the executive lounge, a little disappointed that this was not included in our high paying room rate as we had already book a room with the executive lounge access. The view was great from the lounge however i felt a little cheated when we were only serve beers and wines. Wanted to get some spirits with mixer but was told it was not available even when the brochure mention free flow spirits will be served. 1 Star for the party as not only does the decorations looks tacky but free flow Champagne was pour only after midnight. Everyone was having a great time, surprisingly even the staffs who openly invited themselves to the drinks while serving. Definitely taken aback by the

title: Well located
desc: We had a great time at this hotel and the staff and service were great. We had a great view of the marine bay. Would highly recommend it. Also very helpful with room allocation and the breakfast was great.

title: Perfect stay
desc: Great experience all around. Hotel meets 5 star standards. Bed extremely comfortable. Room extremely quiet. Great gym and facilities and perfect central location. Check in and check out went smoothly.

title: welcome, make yourself at home - Fairmont Singapore
desc: time-crunched yet vacation-hungry folks could indulge in a luxurious weekend escape at Fairmont Singapore aside from its elegant bedding and the stunning five-star view is the Fairmont Gold Lounge on level 25th where Club guests can indulge in a dining experience with one-hatted culinary creations a noteworthy mention is thanks to Mr. Marcus Hanna & his awesome team for their attention to detail, ensuring that all his guests have memorable experiences & keep coming back and for that, we are truly grateful

title: So good to return.
desc: We finally returned to the Fairmont Singapore for Christmas and New Year, our last visit being March 2020. We have stayed there several times a year since our first stay in 2006. It was lovely to be greeted by Robert one of the long time doorman. Our check in was easy and quick. Our suite was beautifully prepared and exactly to our long-standing requests. Our paper was outside our door each morning, our laundry was collected and returned on time. Our room was immaculate each day, and our rose replaced with a lovely card by our room attendant. We had breakfast in Prego each morning, the buffet was as delicious as it has always been, and our tea and coffee was made for us upon request. It was so good to see so many faces again, Ismail on the door by Prego, Danica, Cathy, George,

title: Beautiful,child friendly and amazing hospitality.
desc: Thank u to shannon phua for the attentive service from the start. You truly deserve to be regconise. Amazing view. The breakfast is good. The cleaning service/room service did a very good job. The check out was easy. Thank u so much! Will definitely come again! Recommended!

title: Good location
desc: Nice hotel - I was there for business, but had my kids with me. The customer service was a little lacking, I wanted to have my kids in a connecting room or at least nearby - but they were put in another tower. They're teenagers, so could take care of themselves, but I was disappointed - especially as I am a GOLD Accor member.

title: Amazing stay Great Location
desc: We had an amazing time. the hotel is perfectly located . we had a room with marina bay sand views and we loved it the hotel is connected to a mall that have all the amenities and so much food to choose from and its just next to the raffles hotels Breakfast was great some times you have to wait a little longer to be seated but the food variety and taste was great the walk to the merlion was about 30 minutes. great hotel our second favourite in Singapore

title: Not bad experience
desc: Superb hotel, but very SOP, no extra service for accor loyal member. Nice lobby, can get early check in due to my member benefit. Room was nice, huge, (not sure if i get room upgrade due to my benefit), clean, housekeeping staff was great and responsive. Got standard welcome ammenities, like welcome fruit and folded towel but thats all,no use put comment in my reservation ( as this is special occasion but no personal touch for the request, just standard SOP) Breakfast was nice and much variety, location superb as attached to mall and mrt station.

title: Awesome Hotel...just be extra careful at the checkin
desc: Everything was great, the rooms, the swimming pool and the best part was the breakfast buffet. Amazing spread (including some great gluten free options) and the kids loved it. We once lost a toy in one of the public cabs that the hotel orders and the security was so good they managed to track down the cab driver within an hour though the security cameras. One suggestion to anyone checking in: Do pay attention when you check in. We got a really good deal and we booked in months ago on booking.com. When we reached the hotel to check in, the check-in person took our card for deposit and quoted us the full price at the time. When I said that no, that is not the price we bought it for, she insisted that price that I have does not include taxes. I had to push back again and she

title: Brilliant Hotel
desc: We loved the hotel and will definitely stay in the future. Location is great, facilities are great, dining options are great and staff were welcoming. The pool deck was good given the number of guests in house at the time.

title: Christmas in Singapore
desc: A much improved experience than the 1 star rating I gave Fairmont back in 2013. Everything was good. A little issue during check in but nothing major. The room definitely had a makeover but it's been 9-10 years since my last visit and some wear and tear were noted. Nothing negative this time. It was a good experience .

title: One Night In Singapore
desc: Singapore is a very clean and modern city in Asia. Fairmont is like a colonial Hotel matching its standards set worldwide. Decent sized room, nice bathroom and good bed. We stayed on the 25th floor that has great views of the city. Breakfast was really good. The hotel is adjacent to a shopping mall where you can get groceries, buy clothes and souvenirs, go to restaurants, coffee shops and more. The hotel is close to the Subway, making it easy to get to other parts of town, like Chinatown, Little India etc-- however, the taxi to these places is around $5-7. The harbor is a short 10min walk away-- great place to sight see and snap photos. The service at the Fairmont is top class and helpful-- definitely recommend staying there.

title: Christmas at the Fairmont
desc: We had a wonderful experience in the Club Lounge. Our daughter is Coeliac and Simon in particular went out of his way to accomodate. We wish to thank Lydia and her team in the Club Lounge. The food and atmosphere, together with the attention to detail and special touches, is what makes your stay memorable. On a minor note, we had daily issues with our swipe access to the room door. When they were reprogrammed, the club lounge was left off the program at times , and other times, it would simply not work to our room.. Whilst staff promptly fixed it each time we went down, it was an annoying issue. The air conditioner in our room was also very intermittent and the room remained quite warm. However overall, the service was wonderful, the room amenities were lovely & the staff

title: Very well-appointed room, with great location and view
desc: + Great check-in and check-out experience with Ivy + I booked the newer deluxe room, great decision as I could see the considerations placed in the room and modern furnishing design at various corners of the room including the bathroom + Bathroom has a large sized bathtub and rain shower + Paranomic city view (day/night), I could spot various hotels (MBS, JW, Raffles, PanPac) and the Singapore Flyer. Nice to chill at the balcony. + Acknowledged as Accor plus member with welcome drink voucher, used it at the Antidote + Location is right beside Raffles City shopping mall, very convenient

title: Good location family friendly
desc: Good service and support. The location was good at downtown area good for sight seeing , shopping and move , eat , rest and move again. Facilities was good and easier to access. Love the pool side as a great place to enjoy the warm sun and lazing away.

title: Very attentive and patient service
desc: I would like to compliment Ms Shannon Phua from Fairmont hotel front desk. She is very attentive and patient and even go all out to help us with our issues. Despite being busy, she is calm and handled all our enquires well done

title: Well located
desc: Overall experience is satisfactory. Upon physical check in, the waiting time is still the same even though we have done the online check in. I also observed that one of the towel has stained spots but thankfully, there is additional towel provided in my room.

title: Visit to Singapore
desc: We stayed at the fairmount in December in one of the gold rooms. It was a very enjoyable stay made more enjoyable by our waiter in the evening Simon. He was very polite and attentive. We hopefully return again and hope to meet up with Simon again and the rest of the staff

title: Comfortable stay in the heart of Singapore
desc: Comfortable stay with great location especially if you get rooms facing Marina Bay sands on the higher floors. Good dining options and great spread for breakfast. Proactive room service and modern decor and lighting in the rooms giving it a tech savy feel. Overall recommend a stay if you wish to reside in Singapore closer to MRT, restaurants connected to a shopping mall and nearby attractions of Merlion, Marina bay sands and Singapore flyer.

title: Countdown to 2023
desc: Booked a one night stay at Fairmont with my family on New Year's Eve and we had an amazing time! The room was spacious, clean and comfortable, and room service was very prompt too. We also attended the countdown event at the Fairmont Gold Lounge where we were warmly greeted by the bubbliest staff, an excellent selection of light bites, as well as one of the best views of Singapore's skyline. Huge thanks to Rus, Lydia and team for making us feel so at home as we savoured the final moments of 2022/ushered in the new year together. It was truly a wonderful and unforgettable experience, can't wait to be back!

title: truly awesome
desc: what a hotel! Really beautiful and amazing view overlooking Marina Bay. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Didn't try food so no comment. But location is just too good. Room decor also is very awesome. Thanks.

title: Great location; Large Room
desc: Loved the location - there is a big shopping mall connected to the hotel. The food court below is very convenient and with many choices. The room is pretty spacious with a great view also. Free bottled water is a nice touch.

title: The fabulous Fairmont
desc: As a family we had the best time at the Fairmont Thankyou to Lydia ,Howard and Rivqui at the Gold lounge the service was amazing and as the staff were . Thanks to Howard who found me my perfect accommodation with total professionalism . Lydia your team is fabulous and we can‚Äôt wait to come back Thankyou

title: extremely noisy stay
desc: the noise from the refrigerator, the drilling noise, the tapping noise, and the slamming of the doors from the other rooms, made the stay a dissatisfactory one. to add salt to injury, the stay was to celebrate our 29th wedding anniversary. we were given a slice of cake, with a nameless card, without naming the receiver or the occasion, enclosed with candles. not a very sincere gesture.

title: The lovely Ismail
desc: Ismail the friendly doorman makes my day every single week I‚Äôm in singapore on work. His big smile and friendless goes a long way for me and I know for others too. Ismail has a great memory with faces and always remembers me every time I walk past! I look forward to seeing Ismail everytime I‚Äôm in Singapore.

title: Best stay in Singapore
desc: From check-in, the treatment was spectacular. Very attentive staff. Fantastic breakfast with lots of options and room with a fantastic view of Marina Bay Sands and Gardens by the Bay.. Hotel close to 2 metro lines.

title: Strategic location, spacious room, friendly staff
desc: Strategic location, right at the center of city hall. Direct connection to malls & MRT. I was staying at 1038 for 3 night. Clean & spacious room makes our stay very comfortable, not to mention it's city view, it just excellent. Will be back to this hotel very soon.

title: Great employee @ Fairmont hotel, Singapore
desc: After covid-19 era, I'm very happy to come to Singapore again with families. The hotel we always choose is Fairmont Singapore, very convenient as well as high quality services we satisfy every visit. We're also quite glad to meet Mr. ISMAIL again who works in the hotel for a long time as I know. He's literally kind shows warm smile every time whenever we go to breakfast restaurant every morning. My son really likes him and met again this morning finally, and took a picture together to celebrate to be reunited after 3 years. I think Mr. ISMAIL is one of the symbol of Fairmont hotel Singapore! Thanks for all your kind greetings!

title: Fairmont Hotel A+++
desc: Review I had a pawcation during CNY.. called a few hotels eg sofitel etc as they have pawcation but none of them can help or totally not helpful at all especially sofitel. When i called Fairmont.. the gentleman Timothy answered all my quires and even explain in detail what this pawcation package is all about.. he is extremely helpful and thus i immediately make a booking for 2 rooms Upon check in De Cheng is also another great staff and he ensure our check in is smooth. Even the technical staff which consists of a lady and a guy ( did not get their names) went all yhe way to help us solve the chromecast issue. A++ Overall i had a great stay during this 3 days 2 nites.

title: Meaningful customer service as always!!!
desc: Upon checking in, Jazlina found out that this was my final night in Singapore after 2.5 years of living here (transition night for my departure flight tomorrow). She upgraded me to a room so that, in her own words, ‚ÄúI could have a beautiful view of Singapore for my final night‚Äù. And the view indeed was stunning. This gorgeous gesture not only characterizes the Singaporean people and hospitality but also highlights the tremendous customer service that Fairmont Hotel offers. Thank you Fairmont for capping off an emotional departure. üôèüèæüò¢üôåüèæ‚ô•Ô∏è üá∏üá¨

title: Good view
desc: We had an awesome pawcation with our pet Morkie. Our Signature suite located on the 25th level had an amazing view of the MBS skyline.  We ordered in-room dining of chicken satay, fish and chips and dahl curry served with basmati rice, and they were yummy and delicious.  The room was kind of old though, but overall still a very pleasant and relaxing stay.

title: Magnificent Hotel - would definitely return!
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont for the first time and were so impressed. Firstly, the hotel is magnificent - decorated superbly, classic and luxurious. The rooms were spacious - we had a Fairmont King room, the staff went above and beyond and were so very friendly and welcoming. We ate breakfast each day at either Asian Market Cafe or Prego. Both buffet breakfasts were among the best we have experienced - the range and quality of food on offer was amazing. We also had dinner at Prego and would rate it 5 stars. Exquisite food, beautifully presented and great service. Lastly, the location is truly amazing - easy walking distance to so many attractions including the Civic District and Clark Quay, and attached to the Raffles City Shopping Arcade. I highly recommend this hotel and

title: Comfortable rooms in good location
desc: Lovely large comfortable rooms with ability to enjoy fresh airy breeze via balcony. Room sparsely decorated though functional. Had to request additional chair Attentive staff . Good breakfast selection though rather repetitive and limited at times .

title: Fairmont, Singapore
desc: This is a lovely hotel in a great location, the staff were really helpful and always had a smile and greeted guests every time you passed, the hotel spotlessly clean, as were the rooms which were and spacious and really well appointed. We really enjoyed our stay here and we would definitely stay at this hotel again. Thanks for a great stay!

title: Wonderful staff in the Gold Lounge
desc: This was our second stay at the Fairmont Hotel. We stayed in the North Tower. The Gold Room was very spacious and there were luxury products in the bathroom. We had a problem with the shower not working properly and this was fixed promptly. The staff in the Gold Lounge are an absolute credit to the hotel. Nothing was too much trouble. They were kind, friendly and considerate towards us. Thank you. We are looking forward to returning to the Fairmont soon.

title: Ideal location for seeing Singapore
desc: We stayed here for four nights whilst visiting Singapore for the first time. The hotel was perfect for getting around with City Hall MRT underneath the hotel and a shopping mall/foodcourt. Paid ¬£12 each for a 3 day travel pass which enabled us to visit everywhere we wanted to see very easily. The hotel was absolutely great, we could not fault the room, service and breakfast. It was all 100%. The doorman Ishmail is charming and brightened our day. All the staff were lovely and as we arrived early we were given access to our room straight away. If you are visiting Singapore this is the hotel for you. Would be very happy to stay there again.

title: Amazing staff
desc: I would like to thank so many staff members at the hotel, especially Azlan with his help with a lost credit card. Also all the staff who helped when my husband had a bad fall, everyone has been amazing, Thankyou to Alfie who was especially helpful and lastly the concierge ( not sure of his name) who helped with the hospital payment I had to make with an Aussie credit card. Many many thanks to you all. The rooms overlooking the bay are lovely and the gold club is fabulous, great breakfast and drinks at night.

title: Marvellous stay during CNY period
desc: It‚Äôs a great stay at the Fairmont during the Chinese New Year period. The Fairmont Gold suite is spacious and allows the kiddo his own personal space. If there was one thing I need to nitpick on, it will be the lounge not allowing kiddos during the evening canap√©s so perhaps Fairmont could consider lowering the age bar so that older kiddos could assess the lounge during the evening.

title: A very pleasant stay at The Fairmont Singapore
desc: This has been our second short stay at The Fairmont in two months and we have been very impressed by the warmth and and friendliness of The Lounge staff on the 25th floor nothing was too much trouble and their aim is to please their guests and the three we regularly came in to contact with were consistently positive . Their names are Juxin , Jamie and Rickie so sincere thanks to all of them . There was an issue in our room with the noise of the lift being quite evident . However we brought it to the attention of James the Duty Manager on the 28th January and he dealt with it swiftly and moved us to a quieter room , thank you to him . Lydia was our main point of contact and she was happy to receive feedback on our overall impressions of our stay , apart from the weather

title: good location, felt warm while checked in until check out
desc: hotel located in a very good location with a shopping mall next to it and just above the MRT, my room has a nice view (both in day & night). clean room with all i needed. the great thing is having a water machine with hot function which i could drink as much as i want and no need to call "0" for more water. however the coffee was barely satisfied which i suggest to change the house blend bean will be great. I will definitely choose Fairmont & Swissotel for my next trip to Singapore, subject to the room price.

title: Love this place... Great rooms, Great view, and the most warm and lovely welcomes and greetings from the staff...!
desc: I stayed here for almost 45 days, every day is a fresh, lovely and awesome experience. The breakfast is great, loungs is good, the room service menu has a wide variety. The staff has great energy and are always greeting with a warm and bright smile. I love the cleanliness of the hotel and I can see the extra efforts put by the house keeping staff to keep the rooms and facility clean, all the time. Special thanks to Ismail dadaji, you have great energy, every day you greet me with the greatest smile and it really inspires me and makes my day... Lots of love and hugs to you üòä.

title: Another good stay at the Fairmont
desc: first encounter was with Front Desk Staff Anne (lady with spectacles) who offered me a range of rooms I can top up for a better stay - opt for the Signature Gold King Suite; a good decision for the family. The service delivered by Simon and his whole team at the Gold Lounge was excellent! We will come back.

title: Great location and luxurious hotel
desc: We just loved this hotel, the room and its amazing view. The wonderful location and choice of great vegan breakfast with quality tea. Would definitely stay here again and the staff are so helpful and professional. Highly recommend.

title: A great family stay!
desc: Family of 4 (baby and toddler) stayed in the king salon suite with a cot. We had a wonderful stay at Fairmont! Checkin staff was lovely and very efficiently checking us in, providing cute lion mascot plush toy for both our kids! Soooo cute!!!! We checked in at around 8pm and took about 15min to do the process. Location was perfect - few min walks to MRT city hall line (near Paris baguette/McDonald entrance). We used it to get to marina bay and orchard Rd. Walk through peacock alley (near Prego restaurant entrance) to the raffles city mall. The mark place place in the basement is a good place for lunch and dinner. Doesn‚Äôt open until 10-10.30am though so keep that in mind! And best to avoid the lunch rush (1pm-ish) and dinner rush (6pm-ish) as it can get real packed and would

title: Very good hotel
desc: A spaciuos room, very clean. The staff is very helpfull. The hospitality of the staf is very impressing. The room was cleaned and arranged including the personal equipment in the best possible way. If and when i go again to Singapore, defenetly i will back to this hotel

title: Always a Good Place to Stay in Singapore
desc: 1. Nice Room 2. Nice Bed (i did ask for firm Pillow, its really nice) 3. reducing usage of plastic bottle, and its more convenience for me to just fill it from a water dispenser. 4. Thanks for the welcome note and Chocolate 5. Hospitality is without questions thank you Fairmont..

title: NYE stay, club level room
desc: Fabulous hotel! Rooms are very stylish, comfortable and clean. Room service is prompt. Club lounge is one of the nicest I have visited with an excellent selection of canap√©‚Äôs in the evening. I have stayed in a lot of 5 star hotels in Australian and SE Asia and would definitely stay here again!

title: Beautiful hotel
desc: We had a fabulous stay and we‚Äôre looked after extremely well. The staff were polite and attentive. The room was luxurious and the food was amazing. We enjoyed the pool, gym and spa (spa for adults only) and were thoroughly impressed with the facilities. Thanks Fairmont!

title: Wonderful service from the heroes of Fairmont that enhanced our experience.
desc: Seamless and delightful check-in experience: We were attended to by Ace Foo who promptly brought us up to the Fairmont Gold Lounge upon checking we were booked for a stay at a suite. Ace was a delight to speak with as he was patient in answering all our queries and also accommodated our request for tours to selected suites where we will potentially be hosting upcoming family celebrations. Lastly, he brought us to our suite - The Governor Suite, a well appointed space on the highest floor (level 26) of Fairmont Hotel and introduced the space to us and made sure we were settled in. Home away from home experience at the Fairmont Gold Lounge: Enjoyed a wonderful experience and being delighted time and again by the team at the Fairmont Gold Lounge who were not only attentive to

title: Overpriced and not in the slightest bit friendly
desc: no review description found

title: Very enjoyable stay
desc: Very nice hotel! Reception was very easy. Rooms are huge! Really enjoyed the breakfast buffet, as well as the gym, which is one of the better gyms I have seen at a hotel. Location is very convenient for touring around the city. Very reasonable price.

title: Ac cold & unannounced power maintanance
desc: Ac constantly 17c called for repair couldnt get it done until last 2 days of stay. On jan 4 power maintanance at south tower unannounced no electricity at all, emergency lights auto on. Guests were complaining big time. Was given sleep in room at north tower 2am.Management did waive some charges but overall terrible experience for 5 star hotel !

title: Very good location, could have been better with better noise prevention
desc: we stayed for 2 nights, overall was fine except that we can hear all the chatter and noise from the next room. The wall, likely wooden, was clearly neither not thick enough nor properly insulated. another comment, asian selections of breakfast was relatively limited. ps. laksa and coconut rice were amazing.

title: Great central hotel with excellent facilities
desc: Great hotel great breakfast great facilities. Excellent choice for Singapore. We stayed in double double with our family. Breakfast especially good. Would highly recommend. Also very helpful with lounge for midnight flight. Shower facilities excellent

title: Perfect stay in Singapore
desc: We loved our stay here. Large comfortable room with all the amenities and a great view. The breakfast buffet was outstanding- delicious with so much on offer. The perfect location for exploring the city with the metro directly accessible underneath with vast connecting malls with food, supermarkets and amenities.

title: Cost-cutting all around
desc: The hotel appears to be trying to cut costs. Le Labo amenities (which is the Fairmont brand standard) no longer available. No physical newspapers. Quality of food at the breakfast buffet has declined. For example, fish cake curry instead of fish curry. Tea is now self-serve from lukewarm water in an urn. One day they ran out of English Breakfast Tea. Hours have been cut. Before the pandemic breakfast was until 11am but now only until 10:30am. The hotel seems to attract lots of families with children. The breakfast area and pool area were full of loud children. Unpleasant and not relaxing. The drinks at the pool bar were weak and overpriced (even during the happy hour). The previously soft comfortable bed mattresses have been replaced with hard ones. The spa area is in

title: Great stay at Fairmont Singapore
desc: Just checked out from Fairmont Singapore and I have to say, it exceeded all of my expectations. From the moment I checked in, the staff were friendly and helpful. The room was spacious, clean, comfortable and most importantly, it had a great view overlooking MBS, explanade, and CBD. The location was also great, as it was close to many restaurants and shops.

title: Birthday surprise üòÑ
desc: Thank you, Fairmont for the lovely birthday surprise during my staycation.. The welcome decoration n birthday cake was awesome Your reception during check in was so pleasant n courteous- Adrian n James.

title: Amazing and appreciation from our true Heart
desc: We really enjpyed the excellent and warm hospitalities from this gentleman who represtented the warld famous Fairmont Hotel. I would highl…£ recommend this gentleman join into your mgmt tesm. And I really like to see something happen when we come back again within this 4 more . I forgot to mention this gentleman his name is Simon from Gold Lounge. Yes amazing and appreciation from the true Heart

title: Great to be back and better than ever!
desc: My wife and I had not been back to the Fairmont for three years, so we were slightly apprehensive on what had changed. We were very happy to find the hotel, service and rooms were even better. The staffing from the front Desk (Shannon) through to our daily room servicing (Hoa) was first class and made our stay even more special. We stayed in the South Wing, newly refurbished rooms and spectacular view to Marina Bay, as well as located on top of Raffles Place and the major train station, you cannot stay at a better when in Singapore. Will be returning again, and the Fairmont is our place.

title: A fanstatic stay at Fairmont Singapore
desc: It is a fantastic stay when staying at Fairmont Singapore. Firstly, I was impressed by the hospitality of staff as well as check-in process. In addition, the express check-out mode is also available at the hotel. Secondly, hotel room is clean and it is convenient when they have water dispenser is installed inside the room.

title: Everything perfect
desc: Spent 10 days at the Fairmont and only have positive things to say. Stay in the South tower if you can, rooms are newer. Staff are without doubt the best I have encountered. Hang my room attendant did a great job every day (thanks Hang), Anoop, Marlan and June in Antidote bar were very friendly and engaging, and Alecea in the Eight pool bar was so lovely. Thank you all. Breakfast buffets are good. Probably only disappointment was the food in the Antidote bar which was dry and not particularly tasty the two times I ate there. Other than that, 10/10

title: Special trip
desc: Our flight was canceled and we were put in a hotel. Staff are very enthusiastic and friendly. Great service üòçüòç. Special thanks to Mr. Bernüòá who helped me. Enjoy the atmosphere of singapore and the people here. A lucky trip.

title: Lovely hotel, great rooms and wonderful staff
desc: The staff were so helpful and accommodating. Ace at check in was wonderful and the lovely happy gentleman that greeted staff outside Prego restaurant for breakfast each morning was beautiful, what a lovely warm man and a wonderful way to start the day with such a kind greeting. All the staff were fantastic and service from ordering taxis to getting a drink at the pool bar wonderful. The beds were also extremally comfortable and the view and room itself was perfect! My only tiny criticism is that there are no power points in the bathroom and I could not blow dry my hair! I was very confused by this as was my sister in another room who rang reception to find out where a plug was and was told there were none for safety reasons?. I had to take the hair dryer, unplugged the coffee

title: All good
desc: our flight was canceled and we were accommodated in a hotel, very nice, friendly staff, special thanks to Ismail for help, very tasty food, a huge shopping center under the hotel, we also managed to visit the festival of light

title: Great Property and Amazing Staffs!
desc: The Property was great and the Team at the Reception , Gheesaja (hope I got her name correct) & Mike from the Concierge Desk and the pleasant Lady who cleaned and maintained our room during the stay our simply amazing & a great location with access to all main locations.

title: You can't go wrong with the fairmont
desc: Stayed at the fairmont for 5 nights with my wife and two young toddlers. Place is immaculate and very well kept. Attached to a shopping centre with 2 great food courts. Also a stone throws away from an MRT. Room was spacious and clean. The staff were absolutely amazing, friendly so nice and always greeted you with a smile. Great pool with awesome sauna/steam room facilities. The highlight of this hotel though is the greeting you get from Ismail every morning on your way out. We loved it . If your thinking about staying at the fairmont. Don't think just book it.

title: Amazing and very refreshing!
desc: We had an amazing stay with family at Fairmont! It was for my birthday week celebration and the hotel staff surprised us with a cake and decorations The entire staff was very polite and courteous and helped us with all our queries. We were also provided with a baby bottle sterilizer to use for our kids. The location of the hotel is great - within walking distance from major landmarks, Raffles mall is just downstairs, and great restaurants and cafes near by.

title: Great Location & Service
desc: Great service and location. The hotel seats right about Raffles City and the MRT is just 5 mins away. There are a lot of food options around the hotel. The room is also very spacious and modern. We had a comfortable stay. Would return again in the future.

title: Comfortable stay, great location
desc: Big & comfortable room. Great hotel location, nearby of everything. Easy to to get delicious halal food at the hotel or inside Raffles City Mall. The hotel granted us early check in & late check out, very nice gesture.

title: Fairmont Singapore
desc: Very convenient location, every room got a balcony offering a breathtaking view on Marina Bay. Spacious room, with large working desk ideal for business visitors. Fast Check-in and check out. Easy access to shopping mall and transportation

title: Great experience.
desc: Beautiful spacious rooms and bathroom. Breathtaking views. Quiet, did not hear neighbours or other noise. Pool Bar is great fun. House keeping were wonderful. Very clean and nothing was too much trouble.

title: Fairmont Hotel
desc: Ismael in front of Prego restaurant is a good reference of happiness and well being at Fairmont Hotel Singapore. He is a very Charismatic guy and always standing up to make your day starting with joy. Hope the Hotel value him as much as he does to customers..

title: Robotic Staff and bad customer handling skills
desc: Very surprised at the service level of this hotel this time around. They very much lack the professionalism expected out of staff working at a five-star chain, that too the likes of a Fairmont. I have been a regular at this hotel and come here nearly every second month for 3-7 days. Am an Accor member (their loyalty program). I just landed from Jakarta where I stayed at the Mandarin Oriental, service there just posils. They are so curious and impeccable in their service and attitude that guests tend to expect the same from all hotels. Which in this case was really an eye opener. The thing that surprises me is the staff are extremely robotic in nature, nobody wishes you in the lobby, even when I went to check in, I was not even greeted, the person just put his hand out and

title: Consistently delivers a quality experience
desc: I‚Äôve been staying at this hotel for business over the past 8 years. The staff couldn‚Äôt be more helpful and they consistently deliver a high level customer experience. The highlight of my stay is my morning greeting from Ismail who has greeted me over the years.

title: A true 5-star hotel with the perfect location in Singapore.
desc: We always choose the Fairmont when staying in Singapore, because it always delivers luxurious comfort, style and impeccable service, and the location is wonderful. On this occasion we stayed there in January for 3 nights before going on to Australia, and then 3 nights in February on our return journey. We booked Fairmont Gold Harbour View rooms, which included access to the Gold Lounge where complimentary food and drinks are served each day between 5.30pm and 7.30pm, and breakfast with a good choice of hot and cold food and eggs cooked to order. Our rooms had wonderful views of the Marina Bay and were stylishly furnished and very well-equipped, and the bathrooms were really excellent with baths and powerful rain forrest showers. Everywhere was spotlessly clean and the rooms

title: Excellent hotel lovely service
desc: This was our second time at this hotel and the service was above and beyond from check in and overall customer service. I would also like to thank Antidote bar as their service was exceptional as remembered and the added bonus of welcoming drink was appreciated.

title: Comfy stay
desc: Love the stay at this hotel. The room we stayed was quiet and comfy with 2 stories gym and 2 pools. Breakfast at hotel was quite a spread where you find different cuisines. Some advice: to indicate the change room signage clearly. I was lost for not able to find the change room signage.

title: A Stay Made Good
desc: Though my stay in Dec to celebrate our anniversary was not too memorable, Fairmont made good our stay in Feb, though I still had to pay for it. The Gold Lounge access was exquisite, especially with a warm and hospitable team, Firdaus, Zhi Xin, Misya, Jamie, Simon, Rusyaidi and Syakirah, orchestrated by Front Office Manager, Chezza. I look forward to my next stay with Fairmont Singapore, if I can find the reasonable rate.

title: Outstanding Hotel Experience
desc: Love this hotel! The staff were excellent, and the service was extremely friendly, especially during check-in. The rooms were very comfortable and luxurious and there was a wide range of food and beverage facilities. The location of the hotel is great. Highly recommend this hotel and will definitely be back for future stays.

title: Great hotel, great location and great view.
desc: Absolutely one of the best hotel I ever stayed. Very strategic location in the city center, above the MRT station. Got the best hotel view in Singapore viewing marina bay area. The room completed with water filter, TWG tea, Nespresso and some auto charge minibar. Swimming pool is not to big and shared with Swissotel area, also have minibar to get the welcome drink. Great stay, will be back here next time.

title: Perfect Stay in Singapore!
desc: Perfect is the word I can described Fairmont Singapore! After the my horrible experience at Pullman -- I believed this is the best decision I made, move to Fairmont Hotel and continue my holiday in Singapore and enjoy my remaining days there. Ryan is so amazing, I got an early checked in -- Clean and Big Room.. Not just clean but worth the money I paid.. The quality of the room cleanliness, the furnishings.. and the amazing view.. Absolutely turned last days in singapore as the best days!! Mr. Ryan is the angel sent from heaven.. The best service and the best guy at Fairmont! Very friendly and accommodating.

title: Mix Feeling....
desc: Prior to arrival - Daniah from reservation was professional. Addressed me by my first name in the email which make me feel welcome. Broke the tradition of addressing customer by Mr or Ms. Refreshing change by Accor I guess. Called Operator to ask for more information, received a lukewarm response, but not a big issue At arrival - Shannon checked us in. She is a GEM as she smiles and greet me professionally, welcoming me back as a Accor member and wishing us happy anniversary. I can feel she is genuine in creating an experience for her guests. She is definitely in the right industry and Sngapore hospitality industry need young professionals like her. Stay - Newly renovated rooms with a homely feel. Decent size with high end filter drinking water dispenser which is an

title: 3 nights stay
desc: I booked salon gold suite. We checked in late around 9-10 PM. I have asked if possible for complimentary upgrade as a consideration for late check in. But no luck.. instead she gave us room near the elevator and city view. Could have at least locate us in better view and quite area. That's only my disappointment. Note: >< Salon gold room has no bathtub and no bidett. >< Gold lounge: >< Accomodating staff. High quality food >< Check in: >< personalized checked in with welcome fruits in the room >< Thank you for the 3 bears.

title: A quality stay
desc: Great location, very well connected to MRT and no dearth of shopping around. The rooms are very comfortable. The gym is old and lacks specific equipment. The balcony is of good size and with great views to T=Raffles if you or that face. Overall a good stay

title: Family Staycation
desc: I had booked the Signature King Suite with Fairmont Gold Lounge for bday celebration. The room is spacious and clean! The personal touch and the services by the Gold Lounge team is excellent. During happy hours we are not able to bring our baby down for the evening cocktails but the team offered to bring some canap√©s and champagne to our room for our enjoyment (Thanks Simon for delivering it up to our room) Fairmont also did brought us a small chocolate cake for our bday celebration. The cake taste fabulous. Definitely will be considering Fairmont again for celebration / staycation in the future.

title: Wonderful experience .First visit to Singapore
desc: Wonderful. Thanks to all the staff especially Robert and Saxwsn. Room service good and Restaurants very enjoyable. What a treat to visit your hotel. Will definitely come again. The welcoming staff put us at immediately

title: Clove lunch buffet
desc: Had a company buffet lunch at Clove and really happy with the excellent service provided by Rusyaidi from Gold Lounge. Rusyaidi attended to our request and always wearing a smile. Will definitely visit Clove again.

title: Great - Gold Club Suite
desc: The location is very good, walking distance and station interconnecting to the mall. The Gold lounge facilities were very good. Mock-tails to order. Definitely recommend this hotel if your stopping for a night or a few nights.

title: Fairmont gold lounge highlight of our trip
desc: We mainly loved the friendly service provided by Simon and Jamie at the fairmont gold. Food as well as drinks were amazingly delicious. Moreover, the hotel room was relaxing n I was quite impressed with the technology features in the room as it was my first time at fairmont singapore Overall I had a good stay :)

title: A corporate feel to this hotel
desc: This feels like a business hotel, even the room decor feels like an office, rather than a tourist hotel. We woke on our first morning to find water streaming down from the ceiling - not a good experience, but they dealt with it and moved us quickly. I'd describe the place as busy rather than relaxing.

title: An uneventful birthday staycation
desc: I have just completed a one day staycation at Fairmont Singapore to celebrate my wife's birthday on the 9/2/2023. As an accor plus member I made use of the complimentary one night stay and even paid extra to upgrade to get a harbour view king room to celebrate my wife's special day. It was a forgettable and uneventful stay. From the point of check in we were informed that car park coupons were not available to guests and the concierge only provided one coupon which was valid for 24 hours. This is rather ridiculous as we are both local residents and we needed to get around from place to place. Not having car park coupons to guests means that the hotel only places emphasis on foreign travellers and not locals who wish to spend time for staycations or family time. I do understand

title: Fairmont Hotel Singapore. You must stay here.
desc: Ismail is a true gentleman. He greets you as you come into breakfast and make you feel at home. A marvellous team member and we will come back to this quality hotel just because of Ismail. Thank you!

title: Review for Simon & Jamie
desc: Top service and hospitality. I highly recommend Fairmont Gold that‚Äôs come with Gold Lounge- good view and good food too. Keep it up! Also, very clean and good hygiene. Room is comfortable, spa is comfortable too.

title: Amazing experience
desc: From the moment we arrived we were warmly welcomed. Nothing was too much trouble - had a fruit platter and water waiting for us. We were upgraded to a room with water views - magnificent when the fireworks were on Friday and Saturday nights. Bellboy "Azlan" was wonderful.

title: fantastic hotel
desc: We stayed for 8 days in the Fairmont gold Room and are extremely satisfied. The room was great, the lounge was fantastic and the staff in the lounge went out of their way to make and keep you happy. Definitely our place to stay in Singapore. We have stayed there many times and it was always great.

title: Good Stay, Well Located and Good customer service
desc: The room was well organized with all the required amenities available within the room. Customer service was excellent. Special thanks to Ms. Haiyan. The entire hotel staff greeted the customers/visitors with atmost importance. I remember one incident which happened in front of my eyes. I was waiting for the bus, when i saw a lady with two toddlers with the hotel gate. As soon as she reached the main entrance of the hotel, the hotel staff quickly came in for help and took on of the toddlers and the luggage. That hospitality stands out and relieves the pressure in that lady. Appreciate the hospitality shown and eagerness of helping people. Once again, Thanks a lot.

title: Upgraded Stay but no Water for Kettle Provided
desc: Despite providing clear feedback during my last stay on 11th Feb, the staff still did not understand my needs which were clearly spelt out twice before. The water filtering system in the room is too noisy and therefore, it was switched off following my request two stays ago. The Hotel offered to provide a Kettle with Mineral Water. But this offer was not replicated during my recent stays as only the Kettle was provided. I find it frustrating to repeat myself every time.

title: Great Location / Ok Service
desc: It was my first time to stay in Fairmount in Singapore and it was a disappointment that such a hotel with such an Excellent Location can have such Poor Front Desk Experience. The room was Spacious / I was not offered an upgrade although I am a platinum member!! Didn't have access to the club lounge although I am platinum member with Accor group. if the benefits are still not the same as Accor then it should not be promoted as an Accor all program member since it doesn't offer the same benefits for platinum members.

title: Mr Robert at the door - a five star guy
desc: Mr Robert at the door and Ms Jean Chang were stars they embody everything we expect from Fairmont. My arrival procedure including misplacing my reservation was not good- took me 60 minutes to get my room early morning Else it was a great stay in Singapore

title: Good location
desc: Nice place to stay for family. Groceries and food stalls are just below the hotel. It is part of the complex of Raffles City. A bus station is just in front. If you are joining the Big Bus Tours, Suntec City is just within walking distance.

title: Relaxed, Recharged and Rejuvenated Staycation
desc: One is spoiled for choices to do anything and everything in and out of the hotel. Whether to work out in gym, swim or laze at the pool, get a good massage, having meals and relaxing at the Fairmont Gold Lounge. Or traveling out of the hotels for easily accessible F & B outlets, shopping, visiting museums, public transport with a train station nearby, you name it and you have it. Inside the hotel, the service oriented staff met and greeted you with respects. Specially applaud and mention the following staff for their good if not great services. They were friendly, helpful and served with passion and smiles. Fairmont Gold Lounge : Lydia and The Team; Nigel Jaime Chan, Howard, Syakira, Simon, Ain and Ah Lian. Front Desk : Alfie and Ryan. Spa : Alvin, Tony and Sazali. Prego :

title: Good enough
desc: The rooms at the Fairmont Singapore are spacious and beautifully appointed, with all the amenities you would expect from a five-star hotel. The beds are comfortable and the linens are of high quality, ensuring a restful and rejuvenating sleep. The bathrooms are also well-designed, featuring marble floors, modern fixtures, and luxurious la labo bath products (although they are made in Malaysia and China). While it's great that the housekeeping staff provided excellent service and took care of your messy clothes, it's disappointing with the issue with the air conditioning. It's understandable that the aircon turning off every time you go out, but resetting back to 24 degrees Celsius is extremely frustrating and annoying. It's important for hotels to provide guests with a

title: Best housekeeping
desc: The room is clean, thanks to Xuebo and Shanshan the housekeepings that makes my kids feels so happy when go back to the room and see the decoration that they make. The room is large and the staff is kids friendly.

title: Great location and easy to travel with MRT
desc: Bwautiful room with great facilities provided. Nice bed and offer big size of pillow with variety of softness. Wonderful services for cleaning on daily basis. Variety of menus for breakfast and the taste also great

title: Comfortable but bland
desc: Just spent a week at the Fairmont. As everyone says, the location is perfect for all Singapore has to offer. City Hall and Esplanade Xchange subway stations can be accessed in a/c comfort beneath the hotel (the latter a bit of a walk though). The very upmarket Raffles City Mall is attached to the hotel and the more mundane but larger malls of Marina Square and Suntec are easily accessible via the same underground routes as the subway. There are numerous eateries (13 I think) shared with the adjacent Swissotel as well as the myriad of restaurants in the basement of Raffles City. Check in was smooth and personable. We had a twin room in the older North Tower and were given a high floor and a rather spectacular view as requested. The room was huge with two oversized single beds.

title: Fantastic stay at the fairmont Singapore, we will be back
desc: We had a wonderful trip to the fairmont Singapore, everyone was so friendly and helpful. Ismal was particularly wonderful, so kind to our 7 year old as well, gave him a fairmont lion which made our boys day!! We will be back

title: Wonderful service and room view!
desc: We stayed for a week after I had a cornea operation. I really enjoyed Fairmont's hospitality. Because I was recuperating , I could only stay at my room for almost a week. The housekeeping managers, Ms. Baimona Amerol and Ms. Catharina, often visit our room and checked upon us to make sure everything was okay and if there's anything else they could help us with. It really shows Fairmont treated their guest with care. They also gave us some souvenirs, a-merlion-sculp-flower-vase like which is very heart warming gift. I got the room in 16th floor, with wonderful city view, so even though i couldn't go out to stroll around the city, atleast the scenery give me some comfort. The room was decorated with classic modern vibes, and even when some of my relatives came to visit the room

title: Staff was great!
desc: The room and the view from the room was top notch. Location was great, mall is just below the hotel. Shoutout to our housekeepers, Li Ying and Ya Min, thankyou for the rabbit towel, my daughter loved it. And also to the concierge staff, Wei Lin for helping my wife looking for a styrofoam box for her breast‚Äô milk. One small note though, I think they need more staff at the lobby to serve all the guests. I waited for a while to get any help from the reception or concierge staff and I saw a lot of guest are also waiting. Overall, will come back again to stay.

title: Mr Ismail is a nice person..
desc: Breakfast at Prego restaurant was exellent.. clean and delicious, and also we met Mr. ISMAIL, very humble and full of smile.. we met him about 4 years ago, and now we met him again, so happy to know that he is still healthy and strong and can serve us with big smile.. thanks Prego, thanks Mr. ISMAIL. GBU

title: Great experience in Singapore
desc: My time in Fairmint was very pleasant. The staff treated me very well. The place is very comfortable and with an incredible location. I really appreciate the support that Bern and also his colleges give me. They were very generous and kind people.

title: Quality Service at the Fairmont Singapore
desc: All round a 5 star hotel, location,comfort, variety of restaurants and most important the quality of staff service were excellent. Club Lounge was great and we were very well looked after by Simon, Nigel and the young ladies whose names we didn't catch, great service from all. Thank you.

title: Location views great dining excellent accommodation
desc: Staff were friendly and helpful the room was clean and comfortable and our views of Singapore awesome We loved the choice and variety of food for breakfast The pool is a tad shallow but good for a swim and would be great for families The location close to the city shops and MRT All the amenities and Free Wi-Fi The Fairmont is ‚ÄúDefinitely a great choice‚Äù

title: Still Great as always
desc: Experience is still great as my previous stays. Room was very stylish, luxurious and comfortable. Had a room with a great view of the Singapore Flyer, with beautiful sunrise. Just a couple of things that personally, could be looked into. Aircon does not adjust according to the temperature you desire. I had to resort to opening the balcony door as it was too cold. The fridge was FULL! Moving an item activates the auto bill to the room. The irony was, the bottom shelf was left empty for guests to store items, however, the space was the height of 3 to 4 fingers. You can't place anything in that small space.

title: Fabulous Stay
desc: Wonderful pre cruise stay. Bed pool staff and breakfast absolutely wonderful. The choice at breakfast is incredible from fresh fruits, egg station, noodle station and wonderful pastries. From the greeting of the doorman to the room attendants totally first class.

title: Rooms with WOW factor
desc: A Perfect room with a fantastic view - nice pool and helpful staff. Breakfast was excellent and not too crowded. We enjoyed our stay very much and would come back any time - thanks for the hospitality

title: Great Location & Great Hotel
desc: Fairmont is in a convenient location so we walked most places. We were celebrating our 43rd wedding anniversary & our room was decorated with beautiful rose petals & love balloons. We were given a lovely chocolate cake & chocolates. The view was amazing looking out at night we could see Marina Bay all lit up. Singapore is a great city & Fairmont was a great hotel to be based. We would definitely try & stay there again when we visit.

title: a truly happy stay
desc: When travellers think about how hospitality, it's usually the first and last impression that makes a huge difference. This was exactly the case with my check-in and check-out experience. I would like to express my appreciation by commending Front Office professionals Jamie and Alain respectively. So many reasons for a memorable stay. From the spacious room, to the therapeutic showers, to the refreshing poolside pina colada, to the little bear mascots my young children were presented with during checkout. I look forward to a return stay, and create new memories with my family.

Our stay at the Fairmont Hotel Singapore was very memorable. The service was very good, the room was exceptional, and the breakfast buffet was great. The staff was so kind, and we would like to give a shout out to Uncle Ismail, the doorman. Overall, our experience was 10/10, and we would definitely recommend it! ‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Home away from home
desc: My 2nd time staying in Fairmont Singapore and continue to be impressed by the service and room. Came back to the room after a long day at work to these cute bunnies on my bed. Thank you for making my day! This 2 cuties made me smile...

title: Perfect location and amazing hospitality
desc: This was first solo trip. I stayed for 13 days and every single day was made more comfortable than the other by the amazing house keeping staff. They made sure my room was spotless clean loaded with everything good after a hectic day at the hospital. The hotel is centrally located has its own MRT so the commute to and from all major attractions and work was a pie. It‚Äôs been a treat!!

title: A THANK YOU for MARVELOUS HOUSEKEEPING SERVICE
desc: 1. Heavenly big bed to support good recharge at night time 2. Super freeflow filtered water tap for daily drink 3. A heart-felt surprise for cute hand-made towel rabbit prepared by room service assistant

title: Fairmont staycation
desc: Great stay and good service from the staff in the hotel. Facilities like the gym and pool were well maintained and the cleanliness of the hotel is top notch. Room was cleaned promptly and the staff were attentive to the needs of the occupants in the room.

title: Great hospitality, excellent location
desc: Arrived early in the morning, after a long flight, I requested an early check in. James, the nice guy in the front desk, made the check in process very smooth, accomodate our early check in request (which I deeply appreciate, coz I was borderline sick at the moment due to lack lack of sleep on the plane). He offered gym clothes and shoes that I gladly accept (which a surprise for me since I‚Äôve been to the hotel so many times, no one has informed me this). Room was spotless, comfy beds, everything was perfect. I really love that the bath tub is deep enough to soak. Zhao Juan, our housekeeping lady, tried her best to accomodate our needs. She even left a little sweet note, a really nice personal touch. I love that the hotel has 6 eleveator, so you dont have to wait for long.

title: Robert the valetü§©üéâüòé
desc: The most perfect welcome to Singapore! Robert the valet was happy, helpful and very professional, he even paid our cab fair, as the card machine wasn‚Äôt workingüëå what a champion! He made our arrival so much more enjoyable, we really felt very welcomedüôÇ

title: Short Holiday at Fairmont Singapore
desc: Excellent hotel with good facilities and extremely courteous and helpful staff. Of particular note were Parvin at Reception, Bern at Concierge and Shakira in the Gold Lounge. They all went above and beyond what would normally be expected and I was both impressed and thankful for their efforts and assistance. I would have no hesitation in returning to the Fairmont hotel when I am next in Singapore.

title: 40th Wedding Anniversary celebration
desc: From the moment we arrived until we regretfully had to leave our visit was perfect in every way. üíù I would like firstly to make a special mention to Myra, our beautiful housekeeper. Myra kept our room spotless and went out of her way to make sure we had a first class experience. She is a very valuable asset to the hotel. Next we would like to thank all the wonderful staff in the Fairmont Gold Lounge. They were extremely attentive and nothing was ever a trouble to them. We have been to quite a few Executive Lounges but nothing compares with this one. You can have a beautiful room with a fabulous view BUT it‚Äôs the staff who make the experience magical. The food in the Gold Lounge was fresh and varied every morning and night and my husband was delighted when the chef offered to

title: Everything was great...Ismail as well!!!
desc: We stayed from 27-31/3/2023 and everything was amazing. That smell at the reception....Ismail, is such a sweet person.. amazing figure . I forgot to have a photo with him..next time..It would be better if we had a room with a view at the Marina Bay Sands , but it's ok...

title: Nice
desc: We were here for 4 days on a business visit. The rooms are spacious and offer lovely views of the city. The location of the hotel is terrific, with easy access to many spots in the city. The staff members are warm and helpful. Recommended for a stay in the city.

title: First time in Fairmont SG
desc: Great view from my room. Amazing experience even if the weather was rainy for a week. Location is very strategic and i love the friendliness of staff. Definitely a must stay in this hotel for my next SG visit.

title: Great Location to Stay
desc: First class city hotel. Located downtown near the Bay, perfect base for our first trip to Singapore. All in easy walking distance for us once we‚Äôd adjusted to the climate. Couldn‚Äôt fault the staff from reception to the concierge, all very friendly and helpful. The room was very comfortable with views out to the Raffles Hotel and the Memorial Park. Complimentary cocktail was also very welcome in the bar. The hotel is connected to the Raffles City Shopping Centre, which actually has some excellent eating establishments. We had a great stay.

title: A delightful stay
desc: We stayed 3 nights at this lovely hotel before boarding our ship We cannot speak highly enough about the staff but in particular Elvie who is a manger on reception This lovely young lady was just so extremely kind and couldn‚Äôt have done more to make our stay so good the first room we were allocated was extremely noisy from the gym Elvie moved us immediately to a quieter room apologising for the inconvenience she was just so gracious she is an asset to the Fairmont Hotel so efficient kind and delightful thank you Elvie for being just so kind

title: Pleasant stay at Signature Gold King Suite
desc: Booked a Signature Gold King Suite, first i want to compliment the lounge crew Zixin, Jamie, Simon and Nigel for making our family short staycay such a wonderful experience! RCH, treasure them! Room: lovely room, though i would call it a junior suite rather than a suite. If it comes with a bath tub it would be great. The room is very high tech, lots of sensors to track your presence with the purpose of conserving energy. Gold lounge: PERFECT. Checked in and went straight to have a nice cup of cappuccino. Nice. Evening canap√©s is superb and of good quality. The alcohol is also of very good selection! I am now missing it! Breakfast: Now is back to self serve buffet and is of good selection and quality offerings. Overall it had been a pleasant stay as an Accorplus member here.

title: Great room, great service, great location
desc: My family (especially the kids) love Fairmont! We have been countless of times and we love the service, the rooms, the location. Love everything about this hotel! The people are absolutely gracious and friendly. The rooms are spacious. Fairmont‚Äôs breakfast at Asian Market cafe is halal, which is great for practising Muslims :)

title: Stay here - you won‚Äôt regret it
desc: What a fantastic Hotel. Perfectly located, brilliant breakfast, great swimming pools, really convenient transport links, friendly helpful staff. We cannot fault this hotel, we were able to walk to most places and if we went further afield, then the MRT station was under the hotel. It was spotlessly clean and smelt amazing all the time. We arrived early , 8.45am, and they gave us one of our rooms so that we could freshen up. Couldn‚Äôt ask for more.

title: The hotel location near to city and lots of food at the basement of the hotel. The staffs of the hotel are very polite!
desc: The hotel of the front desk are very helpful and polite as they are Ryan, James, Howard, Jean wong, Desmond, Amanda, Jamie as duty manager, Alfie, Justina & Elvie. The person who is from Prego is Mr George who do my hot latte is tremendous hot and good! The concierge staffs are very helpful who are David, Robert, Mike, Ian Pereira, Sulaiman, Bern & the rest of the staffs from Concierge department. The clove who help me are Jason & Guna. The housekeeping who help me to clean my room is usually Ruby is the one cleaning my room but she is on leave and the one is Ya Min is doing good job too. The most helpful is Katherine, Ziyun, yuan yang, Shan Shan & the person who send my laundry back is Affandi. The in-room dinning is always Jason take my orders, Selvi & the rest of the staffs.

title: Good stay
desc: Check experience was good. Check-in staff, Ms Wong was very friendly. Breakfast at Prego was good. The room is clean, and the sheets are fresh. The only thing is the orientation of the bed is not right. ie facing the window. I notice this orientation is only application to this particular room no. 2329 as I have not encountered this orientation from my previous stays.

title: A good hotel but impersonal service
desc: The hotel was clean but impersonal. A typical business hotel. It was in a good position being fairly central. Staff could have been more helpful and proactive. Both in the bar and pool area, we had, along with others to wave to attract attention when we wanted service. For example were left to carry our own bags up to and down from our room when porterage could have been offered Rooms were large and comfortable We only had one meal in the hotel which was of good quality.

title: Doorman Ismail
desc: I want to acknowledge doorman Ismail who, for many years (decades), has made me feel welcome with a smile and a handshake. Ismail is immaculately presented and always knows how to brighten your day. Thank you Ismail.

title: Ismail the Hat Man
desc: Hello! I was just passing by Fairmont Singapore but wanted to leave a review. Today, I met one of the staff workers named Ismail and he greeted me with a big smile on his face while cheerfully saying ‚ÄúGood Morning‚Äù. What a great start to the day! Not only that, I thought his hat was cool looking so I asked for a photo, so he took one with me ‚ò∫Ô∏è.

title: My Singapore Home
desc: The Fairmont is not worthy of its 5* rating, based on the service of its gracious staff, it should be 6. As a frequent business traveller, this has become my home away from home thanks in no small part to Jean Wong and her team in the Gold Lounge who, every day, make my stay a pleasure. Shout out to Lydia, Rash, Zhi, Glen and my unreserved apology to those I have missed. Valerie who books my stays, Elsie on reception and Tom in the driveway make me feel like I'm friend coming to visit. My most humble and sincerest thanks.

title: Perfect location and view
desc: Rooms are as the same as Swissotel,comfortableand cosy... Nice size and good bathroom layout. Always a good choice for a short stay in the city with plenty to do and feast, nit forgetting the shopping therapy you get just right downstairs, connected to the lobby.

title: Lovely hotel at a central location - food, MRT and mall are all nearby
desc: This has been an absolutely lovely hotel. This was a short trip for Harry Styles‚Äô concert and I wanted a hotel near to the MRT line that connects directly to National Stadium. What a gem of a hotel this is. It‚Äôs connected to Raffles City mall, Chjimes which is an old building with lots of hidden bars/restaurants is just across the road, two MRT lines are nearby‚Ä¶city hall MRT is just above the hotel and the Esplanade MRT connects to National stadium which is a 2 mins walk away. And Fairmont has a room which can fit my family - all 4 of us. Wasn‚Äôt expecting much of it as I have not stayed there before. However this hotel has exceeded my expectations. Staff are friendly and helpful, beds comfy, love the tea bags from TWG and of course the coffee machine. This is one hotel which I

title: Great hotel in a convenient location
desc: Really beautiful hotel directly across the road from Raffles. Staff service was great by all we encountered. Howard was very helpful upon checking in and gave us all the information required for our stay. Room was spacious with an impressive bathroom. Pool area was expansive with good service at the Pool Bar. All up, would definitely recommend a stay in this hotel.

title: Attentive service in Fairmont Gold Lounge
desc: Fairmont Gold Lounge service staff were very attentive, proactively offering to top up your drinks during evening cocktail hours. Was offered a drink first when I stepped into the lounge during breakfast hours. Pleasant experience.

title: Once a Grand 5 Stars
desc: The hotel has passed its peak,even the newly renovated room with dark wood can't change the feeling of old that lingers. We didn't get the room we booked as shown online. The breakfast at The Asian Market is more about quantity than quality. The electric sockets at the working desk didn't function properly even after the technician had inspected. We would rather pay for a newly opened boutique hotel the next time we are in Singapore.

title: birthday night
desc: quick overnight trip for my birthday. fairmont couldn't do enough....thanks Accor membership, I think this helps too... really nice suite and fab staff and amenities. well done fairmont..thanks again

title: Outstanding Service Hotel
desc: One of the best 5 üåü hotel in the world Best Customer service and facilities üòä‚ù§Ô∏èüëç‚≠êÔ∏èüôè We travelled with family and young kids Our flight landed very early in Singapore around 3:30 am. Planned to visit Jewel in Changi Airport and spend some time before our check in 2 pm - Fairmont Hotel. But unfortunately The Jewel operating hours between 7:30 pm - 12:30 am in every 1 hour interval üòîüò≠ü•≤ So we ended up went to Fairmont Singapore, and planned to just dropped our luggages as we have quite a lot of luggages. Then we arrived around 6 am, The duty manager was ‚ÄúDesmond‚Äù (Sorry we forgot your last name, but would remembered your kindness üòä‚ù§Ô∏èüëçüôè) Desmond allowed us to checked in straight away, and also prepared us 1 extra single bed for our stay. The room very clean,

title: Comfortable and welcoming
desc: Another very enjoyable stay at the Fairmont. Thank you to the lovely staff, especially the cheerful Ismail who greeted us with smiles and thumbs up each morning. Also thank you to Sau Ling, our room attendant, who made our stay so comfortable. Many thanks to all!

title: Nice experience in Fairmont Singapore
desc: Everything is perfect, the house keeping team are excellent they even made the towel nail all for me. We are very happy about their service. The only downside is probably the occasional noise from the fridge.

title: Super friendly and helpful staff
desc: I stayed for just 4 nights and some friends stayed at Raffles and I have to say the service I had at The Fairmont was so much better. Every person is given the same courtesy and respect at The Fairmont and the facilities are lovely. Everyone went out of their way to help as much as they can and being my first time overseas on my own for some of the trip, it was nice to be so well looked after in such a wonderful and welcoming environment.

title: Nice location
desc: Located just few walks away from city hall station, connected to a mall. room was nice however theres this group of indians who checked in beside our room, they were too loud we can hear their loud voices laughing and whatnot, they were up until 4am. They were in and out of their room banging the door behind

title: Great hotel
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont in Signature Gold Suite on level 23 from 1-5 April. The room was very clean and was serviced twice daily. The gold lounge was excellent. Would like to say thank you to Lydia, Howard, Simon, Nigel and Zhi Xin who were always friendly and always went out of their way to make us feel welcomed especially when we visited the gold lounge daily for our multiple cups of tea. We will definitely be visiting the Fairmont again.

title: Super Helpful Guest Service Counter
desc: Just experienced an incredible service at Fairmont Singapore. Even though there were some issues that we needed help on, Mike from Guest Services Counter was super helpful in coming out and making sure everything went well for us. We are truly grateful! A very big thank you to Mike, and a shout out to Fairmont to please take care of wonderful staff like this. These experiences are what make good hotels great!

title: Adventure Before Dementia - Too Late for One Of Us
desc: This is the first time my daughter and I stayed here, accompanying my elderly father with dementia. We chose this hotel as he has stayed here many times and hoped there would be some memory, which there was. Staff were very accommodating and made sure they assisted anyway we needed. Thank you Hang for always making up our room impeccably, plus our towel rabbit ü•∞

title: Great Hotel - super location
desc: Our stay was amazing. The toom was great with a breathtaking view of the Marina Sands Bay and the Marina. Special mention to Mike at the concierge who gave us great recommendations on good local food and made reservations for us. The staff was very helpful and courteous. The hotel has a great location and is interconnected to the Raffles City Mall and City Hall Mrt. Highly recommended

title: Superb multi generation family getaway
desc: We stayed in the higher tier rooms (renovated) and they were fantastic. Great location, staff were all impeccable. Morning breakfast buffet in Prego was delicious. We had our two year old daughter staying with us in the suite and the room attendant Hang was so amazing every day. She tidied a pretty sprawling family mess into a room befitting a photoshoot. Thanks Hang and all the team.

title: Experience would have been Excellent
desc: It would have been a 5/5 if not for the lack of a bidet at the toilet. To wash after using the toilet, I had to climb onto the tub and use the shower. The temperature is not easy to control standing inside the tub. The entire experience would have been excellent if not for this safety issue.

title: Poor check on. Nice hotel
desc: The hotel is great and the pool lovely. Our only problem was a very poor check in. We asked for connecting rooms in advance. No one responded to our email. On check inwr were told none were available. Didn't even give us rooms close by. On checking ourselves connecting rooms were available. A Manager sorted it for us. A shame it was so badly handled

title: comfy clean and luxe
desc: Very comfy, room is stay nice, spacious and clean. Being located on top of 2 MRT station is very convenient. The staff were very friendly. I would highly recommand this hotel. Two different pools for people who want to relax and those who want to swim is a nice touch.

title: Signature Gold Room
desc: While the building is dated, and I believe some rooms may continue to be, based on pictures, the Signature Gold room was excellent in all aspects- design, cleanliness, upkeep, and amenities (specifically le labo rose is awesome) Happy hour offering is decent and takes place in a cozy lounge of the higher floors, offering a good view of the area. Breakfast was also great, with a very wide selection of food in a nicely decorated restaurant. The entire ambience created has the makings of potentially a nice staycation destination

title: Amazing hotel staff!
desc: Great hotel and special mention to Rusyaidi (Russ) for making my stay such a pleasant experience through his attention to detail. He was definitely one of the most dedicated staff I‚Äôve come across and went above and beyond his role

title: Fairmont Gold
desc: Been staying in Fairmont Singapore. Rooms are cleaned, sleek and comforty. Always love South tower rooms because the room equipped with wate filter system, no more usage of water bottles. Only regret that they do not have bidet in their toilet. The Team in Fairmont Gold Lounge are super attentive, helpful and never disappoint our request.
