And to comment on Ms Pinky Yee from Reservation Team, she is always there whenever i needed help with hotel services. Fairmont Singapore is one of the best because location is in the Centre of Shopping Paradise.

title: Tiny room
desc: I was reluctant to write a review. I think they were understaffed and didn‚Äôt have many guests ‚Äî the Fairmont Gold Lounge was basically empty for our entire stay of a week‚Ä¶ never more than a few other tables at any time. I had Accor Gold at the time of the stay ‚Äîand the hotel has their own list of what they will upgrade people to and I was booked in the highest room they would have potentially upgraded me to‚Ä¶so effectively no room upgrade (even after them re-assigning us to a new room because of a very leaky air conditioner). Also, be aware that if you plan on using Accor points toward your bill at check out, the hotel caps that at 10000 points (I have never experienced that anywhere else before‚Ä¶you can usually use as many points as you want.) We had a Signature Gold King Suite

title: PROFESSIONALISM AND PERFECTION
desc: Professionalism of the highest order. Room was exceptional and views over the Harbour were breathtaking. Every aspect of our stay was quality, quality, quality. would not hesitate to recommend Fairmont Singapore and its staff for any future stays : Alan and Linda ( Australia )

title: Great place to stay while in Singapore
desc: Great location, suitably priced, opposite the back of Raffles. The staff are brilliant and it is very convenient having a huge number of shops underground of the complex. A couple of pools to use and plenty of options for dining. Very conveniently located to the hop on hop off tourist bus route.

title: Our stay at Fairmont
desc: The staff are so friendly & helpful. So professional and always happy to help. Room attendant Hang was so help & assisted with any questions about our rooms. She does a wonderful job. I‚Äôll be coming back to the hotel it is so clean & just beautiful. So handy to everything. Keep up the wonderful work. üëåüòÄ

title: Excellent
desc: Ace Foo and Elvie were fantastic. The effort they put into our daughters birthday was incredible. The room was to the highest standard of any 5star hotel we've stayed at in Singapore. The little details made the difference.

title: Very good
desc: Good service. Friendly and professionals staff. Our room attendant was Hang. Enjoyed the food too. Stayed in the hotel for five days. World definitely come back and recommend to family and friends. Thanks

title: Fairmont Stay
desc: I love the amenities of both Fairmont and Swissotel. Conveniently located with great dining options. Staff is also very attentive (Alain in this particular trip) and detail oriented. Will definitely stay here regularly for business or pleasure.

title: Fairmont Gold Luxury
desc: We had a 5-night stay in a Fairmont Gold, harbour view king room to celebrate my wife's birthday. The views from our balcony on the 24th floor were simply stunning, both day and night. Daily housekeeping was immaculate, our room always looked clean and fresh on our return each day of our holiday. And thank you for the delicious birthday cake! The Fairmont Gold experience included exclusive lounge access on the 25th floor, which has panoramic views of the city skyline and the busy harbour. The lounge service at breakfast and in the evening was the best we have ever had, in our opinion even better than at the prestigious Langham hotel in Melbourne. I would like to mention Simon in particular, who made our stay very special with his excellent attentive service, and thoughtful

title: Luxury services
desc: First of all, we arrived with such warmest and cheerful welcome by Mr Robert. Opening the door and taking care of our baggages and leading us to check in. Lobby staffs were so so welcoming. We stay in the double room. Very spacious room. Sad part, no bidet spray in the toilet. The house keeping fantastic service. You really feel like home. Each day I left the hotel and returned I was greeted by Robert with happy smiles and lobby staffs. The hotel is super convenient with foods, shopping and MRT station (City Hall). It was worth our stayed.

title: Great family city stay
desc: Amazing and attentive and amiable hotel staff. Situated in a convenient location, within walking distance of lots of shops and eating places and tourist attractions. Fantatic views from the room. If it is someone‚Äôs birthday or a special occasion, they send a cake to your room with a card of well wishes.

title: Well Located and Convenience.
desc: Well located and practical hotel. The hotel is well located right above City Hall MRT which is very central and convenient to go out and about. The room make up/cleaning lady is doing an excellent job cleaning our room. Well placed to shop and eat. Will definitely come back when visiting Singapore again. The pool and spa facilities are also well equipped.

title: Stayed at Signature Gold King Suite with Gold Lounge Access
desc: My family of 4 stayed at the Signature Gold King Suite for 4 nights at our Singapore stop-over. The room was very spacious as well as the bathroom (we appreciated the Le Labo toiletries!). Customer Service was on-point. All staff were very helpful and quick to attend to our needs. A special mention to Alain at Front Desk; who provided us a smooth check-in process and assisted us with any requests. Thank you! Also all the staff working in the Gold Lounge - who were always very friendly and very attentive to our needs. My family and I always felt so relaxed hanging out at the lounge after a full day of sight-seeing. Lastly, the location - we found it so convenient being attached to Raffles City. We would definitely stay here again.

title: Food ease
desc: We were highly impressed with the service provided by Siva at the Prego restaurant as he made sure our kids were at ease and were given comfort food as per their taste. Thank you for making our stay comfortable.

title: Family Stay from Australia
desc: The room is of decent size and the location of the hotel is fantastic. Easy walk from hotel to Raffles place and MRT. The kids loved the big bath and hubby and I thought that the rain shower was amazing...a good amount of pressure. Breakfast at Prego was very very good...eggs your way and the waffles...yum!! Our daughter injured her finger at the pool which required stitches. The hotel staff were amazing. They organized a taxi right away to take us to the Raffles Hospital. We were reimbursed the initial medical bill as well as given a dining credit, thank you Alfie. Thank you for remembering Sienna's name and asking about her wellbeing...very thoughtful. We are spending the last part of our trip in Sentosa. After taking the kids to SEA Aquarium this morning we came back to our

title: Stay at the Fairmont for an amazing time in Singapore!
desc: My week at the Fairmont was wonderful! My room attendant, Hang, made sure to keep my stay clean and tidy and she went above and beyond to always make sure my room was welcoming when I returned from a long day. The concierge, Bern, was also a great help with printing out my documents in a timely manner. The buffet breakfast ant Prego was great with a wide international selection. I also ate ay the Japanese restaurant Mikuni and the staff and food was phenomenal. All the staff was amazingly friendly and very personable so it felt like I had a bunch of friends ensuring my stay was excellent. I would love to return to the Fairmont in Singapore again!

title: Amazing dinner home away from home
desc: Had a dinner in Prego service staff Lisette gave us a wonderful service she made us feel at home and take good care of us during our dinner she even recommended very tasteful dishes for our dinner and drinks pairing we will definetly come back for our next celebration and we hope to see her again .Thank you lisette for a wonderful expirience in prego see you again üòÅ

title: Excellent service by lisette!
desc: Amazing dinner at prego , we had a fantastic experience lisette gave us a top notch service for menu recomendation it was a splendid experience a very cheerful and warm service kudos to her she gave us a memorable dinner experience. We will for sure recommend this place and come again.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: We love this hotel. The location is central and close to Orchard Road, Marina Bay, the Padang (where history was made), the Financial district and the Cityhall station. The staffs are friendly, attentive and efficient. They even gave us a small Easter gift which was a nice surprise. It was a delightful stay.

title: Great hotel!
desc: Really great hotel, everyone who works there very kind specially Zoey Lim from front desk! She was great with everything and very kind! The bed is amazing and the pillows so fluffy. Breakfast is delic

title: Fairmont Singapore great location and helpful staff
desc: Great city location near a main MRT station. Staff helpful and friendly especially Ismail who greeted us happily at breakfast every day in his Top Hat. Large room for 3 people. Close to Raffles hotel and a 8 min walk to the Merlion. Various eating options close by. Great views of city including Marina Bay Sands.

title: Kind, attentive Staff
desc: Overall, a relaxing stay. The room service staff were very considerate, attentive, modest people. Any issues with translating our requests were remedied very quickly and very well. We were impressed with room service staff. We loved that the Hotel had a pool (next time we will ask to be located away from overlooking the pool, as it can get noisy in the evening - pool closes at 2100hrs). There was a female screaming from the pool area one evening at about 8.30, which I felt the need for staff to check on. It wasn't a person in difficulty, thank goodness, but it was quite a distraction. Again, staff were responsive and followed up with me. I thought that was very good.

title: Great stay, fantastic views.
desc: We stayed for 6 nights and our room was clean and comfortable with fantastic views of Marina Bay Sands and the business district. The hotel is in an excellent location with easy access to City Hall MRT and Raffles City. We had breakfast in Prego restaurant a couple of times which was very good. Staff were friendly and helpful. One evening during our stay my husband left his wallet in a taxi by mistake. The taxi driver drove back to the hotel to hand it in to the concierge. We were extremely grateful for his honesty. A special mention for the professional and caring service of the receptionist, concierge and doorman that evening. We are sorry that we cannot remember your names. We would recommend the Fairmont, we thoroughly enjoyed our stay and hope to return in the

title: Fabulous hotel.
desc: Without a doubt this is one of the BEST hotels I have ever stayed in. Faultless. Perfect. The bed,the buffet breakfast,the staff‚Ä¶the staff at the hotel desks are very helpful,the rooms are spotless. It‚Äôs a beautiful experience to stay here. Highly recommend ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Always relaxing
desc: Been staying at this hotel for work on and off for 23 years. Never fails to be one of my favourite hotels in the world. For as long as I can remember, I have been welcomed by Ismail on the entry through from the mall. That guy is an icon of Singapore!

title: Fantastic Fairmont!
desc: A great location with customer friendly staff. Great amenities and directly above City Hall MRT station. The kids loved seeing Ismail every morning and breakfast at Pregos restaurant cannot be beat!

title: Perfect stay: Comfort, Service & Amenities
desc: I arrived at the hotel around 830am wanting to deposit my luggage at the concierge first but when I reached the check-in counter, James attended to me and helped me to check if my room is available. After checking, he said that he was able to check me in as my room was available, this was the first time I am able to check-in to Fairmont so early. After completing the check-in procedures, he then asked me if I would like a late check-out as well. Of course I wished for a late check-out, he then offered me a late check-out at 2pm. This was the first time the front desk staff gave me late check-out and a very early check-in after staying in Fairmont for so many times. I would like to compliment him for the excellent service that he provided. Thank you James Next would be the

title: Friendly staff
desc: Ismail greets every guest with a friendly smile and has been doing so at this hotel for as long as I can remember.. around 35+ years that I have stayed at this hotel. So nice to have him here. Scott B

Service was excellent. Front desk was extremely helpful and gave us everything we need without us having to ask for it. Prego was great. Made even better with Accor plus. Room felt newly furnished, clean. Good vibes, good lightning. Will be back

title: Surprisingly Beautiful Room. Pleasant Staff.
desc: Initially checked into a standard room. Met front desk staff Alain, who showed me the other rooms available. Alain was very patient. He showed me the varied rooms in Fairmont, including the beautiful lounge. There are indeed rooms with stunning views of the MBS and port. Some rooms are facing the F1 tracks. For a small fee, I decided to upgrade my room to one with MBS view. Thanks to Alain for sharing the rooms. He did a good job upwelling it to me.

title: Nice hotel at singapore
desc: Love the location‚Ä¶ beside the mrt city hall station Great staff and service‚Ä¶ all the staff really nice and helpfull. Nice room‚Ä¶big and nice view‚Ä¶ Good wifi‚Ä¶ Will come back here soon for the forth time‚Ä¶

title: My Review on the hotel
desc: The food is really delicious. Room is really spacious. A good outdoor view from our room. Great towel art work. The room service is very fast. The background sounds/ambience is really nice, perfect spot for a balcony if you ask me. Overall, very nice hotel.

title: The F in Fairmont is for First Class Service!
desc: 10 out of 5 stars. Having just checked out after birthday celebrations and staying for the first time since the premises was rebranded as Fairmont, I can say that the service and extra touches shown throughout are out of the world. From the complimentary decorations in the room, to the affording of an early check in. Through to fast response time (5 mins or less?) for a third rollaway bed. Room was well appointed and well maintained. Staff were pleasant, attentive, eager to assist that made me and my family already start thinking and planning for our next stay. I'm indeed well and truly pleased to both being an Accor plus member as well as having stayed at the establishment. Thanks to all at Fairmont for making the stay one that is hard to beat anywhere else.

title: I feel I am just at my home.
desc: Just cool and lovely environment. Well behaved staff as well. Pillows and bed reminds me my sweet home. Well decorated and well furnished room layout sparked my mind .l love food and this hotel robbed my heart. Thankyou.

title: Wow, look at the view !
desc: Excellent base for visiting Singapore on a short break. This hotel is centrally situated for visiting all the sights and convenient for shops and Metro station. Fully air conditioned with access 24 hours per day. Just round the corner from the famous Raffles Hotel and the Long Bar there, where you can get the famous Singapore Sling cocktail.

title: Central Location, A little pricey for the experience
desc: Hotel is nice. Stayed here as we are Gold with ALL program. Check in was a long experience. I had 2 different ladies checking me if saying different things so I was all confused. Not sure if there was training happening or something. Room was nice although felt a little dated. Hot water was hard to get on or keep the temperature right. Expect something a little less annoying from Fairmont. Pool area was nice, didn‚Äôt use but had a drink at the pool bar. We checked out early in the morning. There was no concierge available to get a taxi to Changi, so reception tried to call. Couldn‚Äôt reach anyone. In the end the nice receptionist ended up having to stand on the street to hail a taxi. About a long check out experience. Hotel is nice central location and close to bus stop and

title: Top notch service
desc: Stay in Fairmont only 2 nights but I was really impressed by the hotel service. Staff were amazing, attentive and helpful. The room was very good, spotlessly clean and well equipped with great views. Breakfast variety and quality was excellent. The staff in the restaurant is very friendly. Concierge staff were very friendly, professional and helpful. I would definitely stay here again. Highly recommended this hotel to everyone. Thank you all again for bring us a great stay!

title: Great location, comfy rooms
desc: Pleasantly surprised as the hotel was upgraded with new bathrooms etc. My room was facing the Marina Bay Sands so amazing views, beds were strategically placed to give you a nice view. Rooms all have a balcony however without a seat so you can enjoy the view but not sit down. Most people might find it too hot and humid anyway. Room came with good tea and coffee facilities and a special tap for drinking water instead of providing plastic bottles. Very well located with the Raffles City mall for shopping and food options, breakfast in the hotel was great though with plenty of options including healthy options. Staff were amazingly friendly and I will for sure book again for my next trip

title: Fantastic holiday!
desc: We choose this hotel following our lovely stay in Fairmont Dubai last year and Once again Fairmont lived upto it‚Äôs reputation. We had a lovely stay to celebrate a 40th birthday and anniversary. A big thank you to Bernice and Elvie from front office for the cake and beautiful decor and a shout out to David the doorman for his hospitality and kindness he was wonderful- always there to help us. We ordered evening food from the Prego restaurant downstairs which has dine in or takeaway but we were too tired so opted to order and collect and what can I say the food was amazing! Loved it. The morning buffet breakfast was also served in Prego which again had a great deal of choice. The hotel is connected to the Raffles City mall which was huge and very busy but an excellent choice

title: Amazing staff and location - home away from home
desc: The location and staff were amazing. There is a shopping centre attached to the hotel and the mrt is downstairs. Ismail the greeter downstairs chatted to our kids every morning and made us feel welcome. The location is very central. Whenever we go to Singapore the Fairmont will be our home away from home!

title: Skilled support in an emergency.
desc: Great room, wonderful bed, great view, excellent amenities. I became very unwell and needed hospitalisation. The support for me and my husband from the Duty Manager and other staff was exceptional; fast, well executed, supportive and caring. I cannot praise them enough. Thank you.

title: Wonderful Stay
desc: Wonderful stay at a great hotel that has hospitable staff with modern connectivity and amenities expected of a recently renovated hotel. Lucky to have secured a harbor view with the help of the excellent check-in staff, Bernice, that allowed me to enjoy the NDP Preview show and fireworks straight from my room!

title: Top Class Experience
desc: First time at the Fairmont and I was really impressed. Staff were amazing throughout the entire hotel and the rooms were very good, spotlessly clean and well equipped with great views. Breakfast variety and quality was excellent. Concierge staff were very friendly, professional and helpful. I would definitely stay here again.

title: Not 5 ‚òÜ in my eyes.
desc: The concererige men were so wecolming but the rest of the stay was disappointing. We had to move the room thrice in our 2 night stay. The 1stroom which was an upgrade was awful. It was dark, no bath and facing out the back towards the Raffles. The 2nd room was better it did have a bath but no suite area but it was nicer than the previous room which was supposed to have been better than the one we got. It was also facing the Marina Bay sands hotel and at night the skyline was amazing. The only draw back was the airconditioning unit on the road below. It was a huge circular unit that was so loud it kept us awake all night. We were then moved to another room another 12 floors up. We went from floor 12 - 24 but the automatic hot water heater that you can make tea and coffee with

title: A five day visit to Singapore staying in the perfect location.
desc: We have stayed at the Fairmont a few times and have always had an excellent experience. The staff are friendly and very helpful and our room was perfect. Loved the cold water on tap. We find the location is excellent for getting around. Highly recommended.

title: Great place in Singapore!
desc: Excellent hotel, place, location, staff, room‚Ä¶ for the price you pay, it‚Äôs all well worth it! Having a mall connected to the hotel was also great as I did not have to leave the hotel ‚Äúarea‚Äù to buy what I needed.

title: Very nice experience at the Fairmont
desc: The fairmont had a great location at the centre of singapore, with equally short distances to most attractions. I was able to take a walk or get a short grab ride to most of my destinations. I had a three night stay there. The room was big enough and the balcony had a great view. The hotel also had everything you would need for your stay: from diversified restaurants to an amazing gym and pool. The customer service was excellent and efficient. For example, Robert at the front door was very friendly and helped us a lot with our large amount of luggage when we came and left. He always had a huge smile on his face. I also got slippers from the customer service desk at the lobby delivered to my room very quickly. Overall, it was a very nice experience except for the fact that some

title: Great visit to the Fairmont
desc: Absolutely great hospitality and extremely clean rooms. Our room daily room cleaning staff member named Hang was accommodating to our schedules and did a great job . Would highly recommend a stay at the Fairmont.

title: Great stay - again
desc: Alwys stay at the Fairmont when in Singapore and have done for many years. Great location and just the most amazing staff who deliver exceptional service with a smile ! We stayed in the gold rooms as one of the things we love the most is the lounge access and we were not disappointed with the lounge again this year. Simon and shakira were stand outs ! Couple of minor gripes- only one sink and for the price would be good to have two, lack of power points ! Otherwise will keep returning !

title: Great customer service
desc: My stay at Fairmont has always been pleasurable. I come back each time and have Robert at the front of the hotel greeting me as if I‚Äôm coming home which is one of the reasons why I always come back. And in the club room, the egg chef is very talented and another reason why I choose to stay at Fairmont. At Willow Stream Spa, Rossman was the star. He was very hospitable and represents the hotel in the highest regard.

title: Perfect service and team
desc: Lydia, Simon, Rushaidi and Glen at the club lounge was very welcoming and friendly. Making breakfast so enjoyable that‚Äôs why we keep coming back. Wang Jing and Xa min ensured our room was neat and tidy, even made us a towel dog. (Which is so cute and nice) Services like this makes you feel like you‚Äôre actually coming home. That‚Äôs why I would recommend people to stay here and would definitely be returning again. We have been staying at Fairmount Hotel SG since 2013. Love this place and the team.

title: An Enjoyable Stay
desc: Pleasant Stay .. excellent location.. good service .. the team at the golden lounge were very attentive .. they react quite spontaneously to our requests and make a conscientious effort to rmbr our daily preferences, esp in our personal preferences in food & drinks ..

title: Home away from home
desc: As usual, top notch service and amenities. After staying here for multiple times, I could say that Fairmont has consistently hold up the high standards. Shout out to the houskeeping team Yamin & Shanshan for providing great service. Always a pleasure to stay in Fairmont Singapore.

title: Mr George and Mr Ismail from the Fairmont hotel
desc: One of the best things with the Fairmont is that special smell when you arrive into the lobby, the rooms are just perfect, the breakfast is superb with George that is always there to greet me and knows that at 6h30 i only take decaf, who is always so present and available and there is also Mr Ismail who every month also greets me with a broad smile and a welcoming good day. Those two persons are very professional and also very giving and when one is so jet lagged it makes all the difference to be recognized.

title: Home from home for us!
desc: We first stayed at the Fairmont in 1995 when it was the Plaza. Since then we‚Äôve been back every couple of years. But with COVID we‚Äôve not been here for 5 years. Since then the hotel has had a facelift and feels great. The view from the room must be one of the best in Singapore. The room has everything we need and the service has been excellent. Rooms are cleaned while we‚Äôre at breakfast and the staff are always fabulous. Best breakfast at Prego‚Äôs We‚Äôll just keep coming back. Great pool and gym. Love it. Home from home!

title: Rude and Defensive Supervisor (Sasinteran) at Prego
desc: THE GOOD: Good room size, modern marble bathroom design. Service requests were handled promptly (ice buckets, extra coffee pods and tea bags). THE BAD: Went for lunch and met an extremely rude and defensive supervisor by the name of Sasinteran at the Prego italian restaurant, located at the lobby. Asked to speak to the general manager and Sasinteran said "you're not giving me the chance to explain myself". Fair enough, subsequently asked him to explain himself and he said "I don't want to talk to you". Terribly rude and defensive attitude, not sure how he could speak like that to a customer and become the supervisor. THE SERVICE RECOVERY (by another manager Claudio): The other restaurant manager Claudio however was excellent - he was appalled at Sasinteran's attitude and

title: Best staycation at Singapore
desc: Love the view (MBS, garden by the bay, singapore flyer),room very clean, the receptionist jamie chan very nice and welcome. Love the location because it close to city hal MRT station. love the welcome drink for my kids.

title: Highly recommended
desc: Amazing location and service. The rooms and service are of highest standard. Everything is really close by with MRT/BUS station being nearby. All service personnel are always ready to help. Breakfast spread is really nice. Service: 5/5 Rooms: 5/5 Location: 5/5 Value: Rates were higher due to vacation but reasonable (maybe booking in advance will help)

title: Fantastic Fairmont
desc: I had one of my best SG holidays and the Fairmont Hotel was one of the reasons. From the time I arrived to the time I left, I had a fantastic experience at the hotel. The hotel lobby was warm, and inviting, the room spacious and comfortable with a lovely view, and the facilities were good. And best of all, the service of all the staff I encountered was excellent. Special mention to Ismail, the long serving doorman, Previn at the front desk, and the very friendly Ian Pereira from customer relations. I will definitely be back!

title: Wonderful stay for location, views, hospitality
desc: The view was stunning from our harbour view room on 19th floor South Tower. We could gaze out into the magnificent Marina Bay skyline all day. Loved the filtered water tap in the mini bar with cold water on demand. The location is perfect with attractions in walking distance or a short taxi ride (when the weather got too hot or wet). Raffles City mall below was perfect with all day access to food halls, restaurants, supermarkets, and shopping. Rooms were clean, modern and the electronic system for curtains, notifying housekeeping, controlling lights the most sophisticated we‚Äôve seen. Bed was king sized and super comfy. The TWG teas in the room were delicious. Compliments must go to Robert at the door who was the most helpful and friendly arranging taxis and advice, the

title: Great stay at the Fairmont!
desc: We recently had a lovely stay at Fairmont Singapore. The rooms were very clean and comfortable. We also really enjoyed a really nice massage with Janet. Breakfast was always delicious with a wide variety to choose from. The staff at Prego during breakfast were generally friendly especially Yoges. He often greeted us with a smile each day. It was a pleasure to meet him. We also enjoyed being greeted by Ismail daily wishing us a great day. Overall, it was a great stay. This was our second stay at the hotel. We‚Äôll be happy to stay here again on our next visit.

title: Commendation for Robert‚Äôs service
desc: We would like to express our heartfelt gratitude and admiration for the exceptional service provided by your staff member, Robert, during our recent stay at Fairmont. Following our wedding celebration, my spouse and I were overwhelmed with the task of loading and unloading numerous items, gifts, and personal belongings. It was during this time that Robert's unwavering dedication and initiative truly shone through. His exceptional assistance and willingness to go above and beyond made an enormous difference and significantly alleviated the stress of the situation. From the moment we approached Robert with our concerns, he displayed a genuine eagerness to help. His friendly demeanor, professionalism, and attentiveness immediately put us at ease, assuring us that we were in

title: Great Hotel and Location
desc: Loved this hotel! The location was fantastic - easy walk to many tourist attractions and museums as well as metro. Area was great for exploring - not overly crazy busy like at the Marina Bay Sands hotel. The breakfast buffet was amazing! Loved the comfortable room, bed, and the shower was the best. Hotel and room kept extremely clean. The staff were all lovely, friendly and helpful. The hotel is connected to a 3 story mall as well as to the Swiss Hotel which made easy access to restaurants and shopping. Would definitely stay there again.

title: Exceptional Staffs
desc: Fairmont Singapore has always been our "go-to" hotel in Singapore, it never disappoints. Our latest stay is no exception. All the staffs we met were friendly and helpful. Both Uncle David and Uncle Ismail's smiles and greetings always light up our days. We want to especially compliment our room attendant, Hang, who had left us nice little notes expressing her appreciation for our small token of gratitude, and wishing us a wonderful stay and holiday. Congratulations to Fairmont Singapore for their exceptional staffs.

title: Weekend stay
desc: Staycation at Fairmount was a blast. Utilized Accor membership to complete the free night stay last weekend. Praises give to front desk Zoey. She was professional, helpful and tried her best to meet our expectations. We stayed in many Singapore hotels before and was surprised Fairmount surpassed all others. Cleanliness was tip topped, housekeeping was prompt in action and room was well maintained too. We love the auto tap, bed linens and shower pressure. Well done Fairmount team.

title: COmfortable stay with thoughtful service
desc: Comfortable stay with thoughtful service- was granted early check in and late check out. Staff remembers you upon return visit- we had prompt room service as well as a in room water dispenser so we did not have to keep boiling water. A rollaway bed was also prepared so it was enough room for all of us . THe couch at the premier harbour room is good enough for a child to lay and sleep comfortably too!

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: We stayed for 5 nights. We absolutely enjoyed our stay. Very beautiful hotel. The room was spacious, modern and exactly how it was described and advertised in the website. We very much appreciate the cake and decorated room provided by the Hotel to mark our wedding anniversary. Very friendly and helpful staff at reception. The hotel was kind enough to give us early check in. House keeping staff in particular Zhan Juan who serviced our room most of the time was very professional and always did an excellent job cleaning the room. Breakfast in Pergos was very good. Will certainly stay again

title: Coming Home
desc: The experiences were simply satisfied and comfortable as if coming back home. Every passing hotel staff greeted the guests with respect which made oneself feeling great and welcome. Excellent location easily accessible to museums, shopping malls and many/various F & B outlets. Also accessible to public transport including a train station. Specially mention and applaud the following staff for their attentiveness to serving with details and passions. Front Desk : Jean, Nicholas, Pravin and A-Sa Reservations : Norman Spa / Gym : Kathy & Team; Alvin, Tony, Rosman, Sazali and Chia Housekeeping : Myra Will be back again.

title: Great location, very clean but incredibly uncomfortable. Wont stay again.
desc: Great location, close to shbopping centres, train station, 24/7 coffee, etc. Very clean, bathrooms were spotless, under the bed was clean! Beds are awful. Sheets fine and a variety of pillows offered but the mattress was incredibly firm and rigid - like sleeping on a carpeted floor. WiFi fast but you can only use your browser.

title: A great way to spend 4 nights on the way back to Australia.
desc: Book a gold room. The lounge upstairs is next level for service. The friendly staff are always willing to help, rooms were clean, toiletries provided were awesome with great quality and fragrance. Ask for a Harbourview.

title: Love it
desc: I will be back. I sound few days for business and the room was great just like breakfast and everything else. Not sure this is the best location for a tourist, but it was perfect in my case.make sure you get an high room with view as it is worth it!!

title: Lovely Hotel in convenient location
desc: Conveniently located above Raffles City Shopping Centre & an MRT station. Very Spacious lovely, comfortable rooms. Very attentive staff. A special mention for Ismail who greeted us warmly like a friend every morning. Ismail gives a special charm that makes the Fairmont a memorable place! Prego restaurant has an excellent buffet breakfast. We enjoyed a buffet dinner at the Clove restaurant too. Would choose to stay at the Fairmont again.

title: surprise: NO complaints
desc: I have lived in Singapore for many years, so I know my way around. And I also know the "old Fairmont" with its sister Hotel (Stamford, formally Westin Stamford) - yet had never stayed here. Surprise: very nice, spacious room on level 26. Large Bathroom, only remark: a separate toilet would be much nicer, at least separate it with a door from the bathroom itself. Large TV screen, coffee-maker, little bar with freshwater supply (cold or hot), a sofa, a desk - everything necessary was there. Wooden floor - I like that. Gold Lounge on Level 25 - it would be good, if one could use the stairwell instead of always taking the elevator for just one storey. Other than that: breakfast offered a good choice, friendly staff, all good. Location: of course - absolutely brilliant on top

title: Fairmont Singapore superb experience
desc: Fairmont Singapore has very good location, and value for money for such excellent service and very accommodating hotel staff. The facilities is so nice. Food and all the amenities are top notch. I highly recommend this hotel

title: Fantastic Fairmont Singapore
desc: Our stay at the Fairmont Singapore has been faultless. It is truly a very worthy deluxe 5+ star hotel that you should stay at. All facets of the customer service has been excellent from being given a warm and happy welcome from Ismail, very efficient check-in, attention during our stay, faultless service from the Room Attendants, and Club Lounge welcoming. Special mention to the club lounge staff Howard and Zhi who provided a friendly but very efficient and professional service to us and other guests with a smile. Thank you and congratulations to all club lounge staff. Thank you Jean (Director) for taking the time to have a small chat with us. With these staff in place it is assured that the Fairmont Singapore will continue to provide a faultless hotel experience to it's

title: Great Gold Access Lounge Experience
desc: Gold Lounge access is one of the best experience that I encounter. Clean rooms, nice food and friendly staffs. As we travel with kids, gold access lounge from 5.30pm to 7.30pm are not permitted for kids under 12 as they served alcohol, the staffs offered to pack the snacks and beverages to our room so we can still enjoy with our family.

title: Thank you very much
desc: The animals made of towels are so cute. My daughters loved them.Thank you for cleaning well. We came from Korea and we definitely want to come back.The staff is friendly and I think this hotel will make happy memories.

title: FANTASTIC FAIRMONT SINGAPORE
desc: The staff were so helpful and friendly from the doorman to the reception. The view from our room was fantastic. The Asian Market Cafe on site had an amazing buffet with a fantastic array of food. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to anyone who wants to stay close to the Gardens by the Bay.

title: Best service
desc: Early check in and late check out convenience , helpful staff, perfect location, near mrt and mall, Our favourite place to stay at Singapore, and the harbour view is a million dollar view. The price also reasonable

title: Great staff
desc: The best service I have received. We arrived early after an overnight flight. Staff helped us check in early which was literally a life saver for me and our family. The staff saw our need for help and did it without question. Service to me is everything and we are so grateful. It adjust continued every time we needed.

title: Great hotel but noisy
desc: The hotel staff service was great. They were all very polite and prompt in meeting our requests. The noise in the toilet however was unacceptable. We could hear the loud flushing noises from the adjacent toilet which woke us up several times a time and early in the morning. Great staff an service but the noise was a letdown.

title: Loved it to the Max!!! The place is convenient, the service is superb, the view is spectacular! Loved to room
desc: The hotel location is great, super convenient, many eateries, great pool, loved the upkeep, loved the service! From the time we arrived and how the service officers make us feel welcome!!! Something that I do not take for granted!!!! The service is great! Ordered room service and the experience was a big *thumbs up*

title: Wonderful service
desc: A wonderful staycation experience. Besides the convenient location and beautiful Gold Signature Room which we were expecting, it was the lovely service we received that throughly made it memorable. From the warm smile from the doorman who made us feel welcomed the moment we arrived, to Claudia at the front desk who ensured our stay arrangements would meet our needs, to Nigel and Howard at the Lounge who were so welcoming and attentive. Thank you Fairmont team for the hospitality.

title: Great trip
desc: The rooms were clean with everything you need when traveling. The view of the city was also great. The staff was very helpful and friendly when it came to personal touches in your room, restaurant recommendations, and transportation.

title: Fantastic!
desc: Our family stayed at the Fairmont last week - it is excellent in every way. The staff are great- very helpful and friendly, our kids felt very safe there and loved the food, the rooms are very spacious and well presented, it is also well located to see the city and there is a mall in the complex which made things handy when we needed anything. Overall I‚Äôd say it‚Äôs fantastic for any travellers and I‚Äôm looking forward to head back there tomorrow from Thailand for the final leg of our trip

title: Fantastic Fairmont
desc: The service is personal and exceptional.. Myra in housekeeping goes above and beyond..Lydia and the Gold Lounge team make a simple stay exceptional .. many 5 star hotels ‚Ä¶ few deliver like the this Fairmont team.. excellent location, views of Marina Bay Sands ..hard to beat as a business hotel..

title: Not upto the mark ..no luxury & comfort
desc: Very Disappointing...paid 2000 SGD for 4 rooms...requested 7 days in advance on mail to front desk to give rooms on same floor. Mr Ace foor was not in a mood to help....earlier he told there was no request , later on showing mail , he replied tgeres no availability.....but then took 60sgd extra per room to give 2 rooms on 1 floor & 2 on other ..i cant understand after charging 500 SGD , which luxury hotel charges 60 sgd for giving rooms on same floor ..also 45 min process at time of checking in was a disaster... guest expect luxury after paying so much...then we headed to in-house restaurants prego for foods as kids were hungry...lady in prego was in no mood to serve us ...she first told they have limited menu available...then limited seats( restaurants was 90 %

title: Very friendly and nice room attendant
desc: Very nice service. Loved our room attendant Kiki, she‚Äôs very pleasant, friendly and nice!! Always greets us happily which makes our day. Hope Kiki will still be our room attendant when we come back :)

title: Amazing stay, wonderful view, thoughtful amenities.
desc: Amazing stay with beautiful view of the harbour. Our room was beautifully decorated by Li Ying and Ella. Lovely chocolate cake was served to celebrate our anniversary. They even provided kids shower amenities, slippers, colour pencils, and colouring paper for my little one. Spacious for my little one to run about. Love the water dispenser in the room for quick access to hot and cold water. Will definitely come back again!

title: Wonderful Service at Gold Lounge
desc: We must commend the staff of Fairmont for their exceptional hospitality during our stay there. In particular, those stationed at the Gold Lounge displayed impressive standards of service. Howard was incredibly accommodating, and we are thankful for his polite and composed demeanour in attending to some of our requests. Alongside him, we would like to highlight Simon, who took initiative to attend to our needs, and Manon, who was meticulous in her presentation of the dishes served. We thank them for their professional excellence, and look forward to our next stay at Fairmont.

title: Re : Rejuvenating Staycation
desc: I decided on a 2 night staycation to ‚Äúde-stress‚Äù and Fairmont was chosen for it‚Äôs location, view and also facilities. This hotel and the sister property Swissotel Stamford sits on top of the Raffles City Mall and the transport hub of City hall subway. Arrival Upon arrival, there was a short wait to check-in as the check-in counters were busy. Check-in was ok and the staff that checked me in also escorted me to check out the Executive Lounge. I was pleased with what I saw and decide to add executive lounge access for one night for my stay for a very reasonable charge of S$100++. I was assigned room 2032. There was a small problem upon entering my room as unlike what was shown in the website, the room assigned to me felt smaller and has no writing desk and the view while face

title: Fantastic stay
desc: Had great views of Esplanade, MBS and NDP fireworks. A little dates but clean and well maintained. Service was prompt too. Housekeeper Chun Ping added the special touch with her customised bed decor :)

title: Exactly What We Needed
desc: After a few crazy weeks touring the UK we had a short stop over in Singapore on the home and decided to spurge a bit and stay and the Fairmont. This was one of the better decisions of our entire trip with it being exactly what we needed. From the moment we arrived until check out it was fantastic ‚Äì the room was great, the view outstanding and all members of the staff 10/10. Special mention to Troy at Check who greeted us warmly and with patience after our long flight from London and Mike at Concierge Desk who was extra special with his recommendations etc on the best places to go to see the sights given our short stay ‚Äì the hotel should be proud of both as true industry professionals . I really cany fault it whole time we were there with the only recommendation that they

title: Fantastic hotel
desc: This hotel is awesome. From the very first moment we arrived by taxi, the staff were there to open our door and greet us. They they were very friendly and attentive at all times. From the car service attendant to the front reception staff they were amazingly helpful with my bad international card that didn‚Äôt work with Optus. They fiddled with and helped my go to Singtel inside raffles city which was attached to hotel.it was awesome as well came in very handy for meals and things to buy from fantastic supermarket. We bought lovely meals from there and took it back to our room to eat. Plenty of places to eat and buy goodies from. The room was brilliant had everything you needed beds comfy but house keeping were very good as well from bed making to replacing things in bathroom.

title: Great Stay!
desc: Great location ! Mentioned it was a birthday staycation and they did up a simple birthday decoration! It was a very pleasant surprise. Checking in and out are easy and seamless. Great staff with friendly smiles at all times!

title: Great family hotel with excellent staff
desc: Great family hotel connected with Raffles city center. The staff is very friendly and professional. Room service is quick. The cleanliness is top notch. Less crowds then the sister swissotel Stamford. Duty managers are visible and forthcoming.

title: Wonderful Service
desc: Wonderful service by all the concierge, especially Robert and Ismail who made a conscious effort our whole stay to make us feel extremely welcome and always greeting us with a wonderful happy smile. We stayed at the Fairmont for 7 nights and would highly recommend this hotel mainly due to the wonderful workers here. The hotel is also in a great location, with an extensive and great breakfast buffet at Prego‚Äôs.

title: Thanks Fairmont Singapore!
desc: Stayed here at the deluxe double (south tower) room for 3 nights. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Everyone from the front desk to the restaurant staff were friendly, helpful and courteous. We were very impressed with the service provided. The room was spacious, clean and modern with all the amenities you‚Äôd expect from a 5 star establishment. The buffet breakfast at Prego was amazing with a large variety of local and continental offerings. We also used the concierge service‚Äôs limousine airport transfer - $120 for an MPV one way for family of four. Reservation was easy through the hotel and charged to the room. Very happy with the ride and ease of organising. Best thing about Fairmont? It‚Äôs right inside the Raffles City Shopping centre and connected to other malls via

title: Awesome Experience with the Fairmont Singapore
desc: The Accommodation at Fairmont Singapore is wonderful. The House Keeping people made Elephant & Dog Shaped Decorations for my two girls. The girls were so happy when they saw the towels decorated with Elephant & Dog. Will definitely come to Fairmont Singapore in the coming future. Thank you Bharathi Yaganti

title: a pleasant and memorable stay at Fairmont Singapore
desc: stayed here with my family for 3 nights. we arrived slightly before 1 pm and the receptionist, Mr. Li, was kind enough to let us check in early and gave us the room key. since we brought our 2 kids with us, he kindly offered us an extra bed, free of charge. the King room was spacious, located on the 12th floor with a balcony overlooking Singapore's CBD skyline. the King room comes with a Nespresso coffee machine with capsules and TWG tea bags, and they were complimentary. we came back to our room in the evening and found a chocolate cake placed on the desk. what a nice gesture! the buffet breakfast can be chosen either at Asian Market or Prego Italian restaurant. Needless to say, both restaurants offer plenty of options and all the food and beverages served were really good.

title: Great Stay Close to the Marina
desc: Great and friendly staff and I especially enjoyed discussions with Ismail each morning. He was always there to help. Incredible breakfast buffett with a large selection for every taste. Nice lucurious room.

title: Meets expectation and Enjoyed the stay and experience
desc: As expected, meets expectation. Positives: 1. For early arrival and late departure, the hotel offered its guests to stay at its hospitality lounge free of charge. I appreciate this amenity, shows thoughtfulness of the hotel. 2. Fast check-in and fast check-out 3. You don't need an electrical outlet adapter/converter, the hotel designs its rooms with plenty of USB outlets available. 4. Convenient and strategically located - Greenline is right underneath the basement, and Circle Line is diagonally across the street. I spent 2.5 days researching a wide range of hotels in Singapore Bras Basah area and concluded that this is the best combination for price, location, convenience, and view. Glad to know that I was right and made the right choice. 5. Wide selection of foods for in

title: Great Hotel
desc: Bed and pillow match perfect. Great staff. A very good hotel with exceptional staff service. I have no hesitation in recommending Fairmont Singapore and will definitely stay again in the future. 10/10

title: Good house cleaning!
desc: Room service is very thoughtful. The boy who need to clean our room even learnt about our routine. So, every time we went out, the room would be ready when we back. He also cares about sustainability which can be reflected by a lot of details.

title: Delayed check in...not worth the wait
desc: Arrived at hotel and was delayed at check in due to room not ready. Being gold member of this hotel group obviously doesn't mean anything. Mentioned to the check in agent this is the second time a delay at night time check in has occurred. Another staff member came over to assist and when we started to complain about the delay the female staff member told us "there is no problem, your room is ready" and when we asked why we don't have our room key yet it took another 5 minutes of the 2 staff playing with the computer and muttering to themselves. The room key was handed to us with no apology and when we got the the 21st floor the room key didn't work (surprise surprise NOT). Back down to the front desk. The initial staff member had to personally escort the key back up to the

title: Treat yourself with a stay at the Fairmont...You're worth it!!!
desc: You will be spoiled in this hotel! Certainly it shows Singapore's hospitality industry at its very best. One of the Concierge, Azlan, had a dignified, informative and fatherly demeanour that was a great comfort to a lady travelling alone. This hotel is exactly opposite the world famous Raffles, so as a guest, you have the advantage of being in a choice part of town. Not a cheaper option, but if you can, experience

title: experience feed back
desc: Very well located hotel, second stay at Fairmont Room very clean , nice view Great welcome and service, special thanks to Bern, very helpul and professsional concierge Will come again for next stay in Singapore

title: Best Hotel in Singapore
desc: We‚Äôve stayed at the Fairmont a few times. It‚Äôs a fabulous hotel to stay at. Close to everything, amazing service by all the hotel workers, that go above and beyond. Hate ti single out anyone because they‚Äôre all fabulous, but Ismal, brightened our day EVERY morning and Robert, organizing taxi s was outstanding üôåüèº PS book the fairmont Gold rooms. You get included the most amazing breakfast at Pregos and complimentary drinks and canap√©s at night for 2 hours üôåüèº

title: BEST STAY
desc: Always never disappoint. Stay for releasing of work stress. Rooms are always clean. Room ECO System may come as a nuisance at times, will auto shut off all aircon and curtains, and we have to activate the whole system. Maybe if this can be improved, will be good. Everyone in the FAIRMONT GOLD LOUNGE ARE SUPER HELPFUL, ATTENTIVE AND AWESOME. Always surprise us with beautiful decor with foods and chocolate. Ms Pinky Yee from Reservation Team are super awesome, She will do all her best to accomodate our request.

title: Great hotel, well located close to shops, bus routes and MRT plus good facilities and great staff
desc: From the check in process to attention to minor problems such as flat TV remote control, through to check out, the staff were graciously helpful and friendly. Only gripe was poor TV channel selection available and fairly high cost of drinks and food.

title: Exceptional hotel
desc: Impeccable service. Food exceptional, care of the room ! Easy for a young family. Beautiful hotel and the cleaning service made our room so nice each day. Special mention to Jan Mei and Wang Jing who made our room so pretty when we came from our day out- elephant and apple with towels!

title: Luxurious hotel in great location
desc: Luxurious well located and very friendly and accommodating hotel in the Marina Bay area. Plenty of restaurants in the area, a walk across the road to Raffles and very close to great buses and MRT system to get around city and sights. Beautiful spa area with steam snd Sauna rooms snd spas in seperate male snd female settings. 2 pools, one for kids.

title: Satisfy customer
desc: Will come back to this hotel , awesome service , very satisfy with how they cleaning my room, best view with balcony facing MBS, love the bar area, love the bathroom , toiletries ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è, good location , best service , friendly staff ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Good service and location
desc: Everything was easy and faultless. The staff were all extremely helpful and operationally it was slick - shout out to Ismail for the cheery greeting every morning. So useful being above a mall too. Only critique is that the pool gets crowded early at weekends

title: Great location, wonderful staff, beautiful hotel.
desc: Fabulous hotel in a great location. Great welcoming and attentive staff, wonderful comfortable bed, beautiful room with a large bathroom. Close to shops, and eateries. Incredible views from some rooms. Very clean and beautifully decorated throughout.

title: Amazing stay!
desc: The Fairmont Singapore was perfection from top to bottom. I have Accor status and typically choose Fairmont around the world. This property did not disappoint. The staff in the Gold lounge took amazing care of me and our group, especially Lydia, Nigel, Syakirah, Simon, Rusyaidi, Khai, and Howard. They were so attentive, kind, and helpful. The hotel is perfectly situated in the city, connected to Raffles City (a shopping centre) and close to the Suntec Convention Centre. All attractions along the water are close by. Big thanks to the team in the Gold lounge for making my trip (and my birthday) so special!

title: Stay at Faimont
desc: I have booked Deluxe, 2 doubles with balcony. The room is cozy with a touch of luxury feel. The bath tub is great and deep. the pillow was a little too soft for me. The advantage is that Fairmont provides complimentary parking to locals for staycation, subject to availability.

title: Amazing stay
desc: The service I received from staff across all departments was absolutely faultless. The service was so personable, which for such a large hotel can be hard to achieve. The Gold Lounge is definitely worth visiting. The view is unbelievable and once again, the service was beyond all expectations. I would particularly like to thank Danish and Syakirah - they were attentive but unobtrusive, professional and personable. All the team in the Gold Lounge should be commended.

title: Fantastic Fairmont
desc: A fantastic modern hotel. Super friendly staff. Amazing location. Club Rooms were fantastic. Fairmont Gold Club was sensational and great value for money. Super attentive staff. A massive thanks to: Rusyaidi, Lydia, Simon, Syakirah, Howard, Nigel and Zhi Qi. You are all wonderful people!!

title: Fairmont Singapore
desc: This is our family vacation to Singapore. We stayed at MBS for one night just for the iconic pool experience but chose Fairmont for the remainder 5 days. In comparison, Fairmont was much more intimate and the entire staff team at Fairmont gold lounge was beyond exceptional and professional. Nigel, one of the staff members, was particularly attentive and helpful. As a frequent business traveler myself, Fairmont Singapore stood out as one of the most memorable. Thank you for everything and I look forward to staying at your property next time we visit the lion city.

title: Fairmont best service in Singapore
desc: The Fairmont in Singapore has been our Go-To hotel since it opened. In fact, even when it used to be the Westin, we loved that hotel for its location; now that it‚Äôs the Fairmont, we love it for the comfort, the dining choices, and especially for the absolutely impeccable service/standard of staff interaction. Incidentally, the room I booked was even better than I expected! Will definitely stay there again and recommend to others.

title: Great housekeeping
desc: We stayed 6 nights at Fairmont and this has been our second stay with Fairmont Singapore this year. The service throughout and attentive details are trully amazing. Out room is being cleaned throughout our stay and more. Thank you Yunzhi Thao for keeping our room super clean and comfortable throughout our stay

title: Fairmont Gold Singapore
desc: Perfect stay with Fairmont Gold SG 1. Perfect Room & Bathroom 2.Perfect amenities 3.Perfect Concierge 4.Perfect Club Lounge with the staff Simon & Zhi chi 5. Nice food and drinks at the gold lounge 6.Perfect spa at willow stream 7. Perfect facilities like swimming pool and hospitality lounge 8. Perfect position above mrt station and mall 9. Amazing view from the gold lounge 10. Perfect stay overall Score 100/100

title: Good location
desc: Great service and clean room. Breakfast also very good. They let me checked in early without additional charge. The size of the room is a good size. It's too bad, we did not get a chance to have dinner at the property

title: Staycation to remember!
desc: Good customer from the time we checked in and checked out. Staff was attentive and lovely to talk to. We got a higher level as we requested and as a result, we got to see the fireworks from out room! We also received a complimentary b‚Äôday cake even though we didn‚Äôt ask for it, which made it a very nice surprise instead!

title: Terrific hotel and location
desc: My wife and I stayed in a room with a king bed for 8 nights while I was at a conference. The room was spacious and nicely appointed. The bathroom was well-designed, including placing the shower such that it didn't share the same wall as the bedroom which minimized disgtrubing my sleeping wife while I showered early in the morning. Housekeeping was unobtrusive and very responsive to our requests, as were all the hotel staff we interacted with. My wife very much enjoyed the spa and pool, and we both enjoyed the breakfast buffet at the hotel's Prego restaurant. My wife declared that restaurant's eggs Benedict the best she has ever had (and she has had a lot!). The location is a plus, adjacent to the many stores and eateries of Raffles City, and a brisk 12 minute walk to

title: Recommended
desc: Very good view of the rooms, extremely good location of the hotel, alking distence to majority of the touristic sites, Access to metro system, Raffles City Mall shared where one can find almost everything

title: Like a starry sky
desc: I am so excited to write this review, thanks to it maybe other travelers will experience a stay at Fairmont SG. I was at Fairmont with my two friends, we shared a spacious room with the nicest beds ever and a beautiful view of the city. It‚Äôs like the city and its lights change every night, offering new thoughts, bringing new dreams and revealing new stars. We loved the breakfast there, it was at the Asian Market Cafe, 2nd floor, with a view on Marina Bay Sands. Every morning was a discovery, although it was a buffet. We didn‚Äôt try the other restaurants like Preto but I am pretty sure it is as good as the meals served for breakfast. There is a beautiful pool surrounded by trees from where pleasant flowers fall. It is always calm and welcoming. The hotel is attached to Raffles

title: Efficient and Enjoyable Business Trip to Singapore
desc: I keep returning to this place, and it always feels like coming home. The warm and welcoming atmosphere here is truly exceptional. Whether it‚Äôs the friendly staff, cozy ambiance, or the delightful food, it‚Äôs a place that keeps drawing me back. Highly recommended!

title: Prime location within CBD, MRT and Raffles City
desc: We love the buffet breakfast at Prego and the 24 hours Gym. We stayed 2x here, first at the Signature Suite and deluxe room. Although Signature is big, I find that the deluxe room from the South tower is newer, even the set up is way better. Overall, this hotel is at prime location, everything is just nearby and there are lots of restaurant at the Raffles City mall, this is just beside City Hall mrt and walking distance from Suntec, Marina, CBD area.

title: Excellent service in every department
desc: Centrally located the Fairmont provided a large room with a fantastic view. The room had everything we needed and particularly a large comfortable bed. We enjoyed breakfast here and every interaction with staff was excellent. The housekeeping staff even decorated our room with decoratively folded towels, orchids and butterflies in acknowledgement of our wedding anniversary. Would love to come back.

title: Nice and quiet rooms.
desc: Rooms were great and spacious. It was quiet and I enjoyed the huge shower space. Do bring your own trash bags though as the hotel does not provide. Additionally, do not expect lounge access as standard for typical suite rooms.

title: Fourth Stay at Fairmont - Deluxe Room
desc: This is my fourth staycation at Fairmont, with my first stay at the Signature Suite room and my subsequent three stays at Deluxe room. I really love the Deluxe room as it is more modern, complete with balcony, bathroom with rain shower + bathtub, large screen smart tv, work desk, reusable water bottle with water dispenser, automatic blinds, ambience light selections and last but not least, the really comfortable bed and pillows. The room size is also pretty large at 45 sqm. At level 8, there is a gym and two swimming pools: one normal large sized pool and a kids pool. The pools are pretty popular and can be crowded at certain hours. Plenty of chairs to chill around. Located next to Raffles City, it is convenient to shop, dine and even explore other places through City Hall

title: Second visit as good as the first
desc: This is such an excellent location, near lots of attractions, and above an MRT station for easy access everywhere. It's also joined to a mall with endless shopping and eating opportunities. The facilities are second to none, refurbished rooms with incredible harbour views, excellent staff, pool...it's all fantastic.

title: Very pleasant for business in Singapore
desc: Fairmont in Singapore has a fantastic location, near to Chijmes and its many dining options and across the road from Raffles. Reception sometimes seemed overworked and slow, but the rooms, views and cleanliness were top notch. And a special mention for the excellent Ismail, who greets breakfast customers at Prego restaurant.

title: Wow factor
desc: I cannot recommend The Fairmont Singapore highly enough. The service from staff is amazing in particular a shout out to Gold Lounge. Concierge was most helpful every day to get us where we wanted to go. I would love to come back one day‚ù§Ô∏è

title: The best doorman ever
desc: As an Air France crew member, I‚Äôm staying this time at the Swiss Hotel but I‚Äôm having my breakfasts at the Fairmont at the Clove. It‚Äôs always a delightful moment to speak with ISMAIL. Always smiling, very courteous, it‚Äôs every time a pleasure to spend a moment with him. He represents the high standard of the Fairmont hotel and I wouldn‚Äôt imagine him not around when I come here. Please send him all my regards and my highest sympathy Sincerely Mrs DIEBOLD Catherine Chief Purser Air France

title: Impeccable service, always expected, never fail to deliver
desc: Always a pleasure coming back to the Fairmont Singapore, this time over the National Day week. Service is impeccable as usual, and I‚Äôd like to commend the check-in staff (her name was Jane I think) as she helpfully accommodated our early check in and helped find us a harbour facing room to catch the National Day Parade! She was very warm and friendly and a nice welcoming presence in the morning for my wife and I. A warm sincere reception goes a long way in making the stay a great one! The valet team as well, including its manager, for calmly explaining the parking situation at the hotel - I usually valet throughout the duration of my stay but couldn‚Äôt this time due to the vehicular parade coming through Bras Basah road. They have nicely set aside a lot for me the day after (I

title: Highly recommended!
desc: I would like to give a BIG Thanks to the Housekeeping staff DINI AFIQAH and VASANTHAN !!! My earring dropped to the washbasin, they worked hard to take it out !!! It is not too expensive one but is important to me! Thank both of you!!! Fairmont absolutely deserve to have!!!

title: Compliment for Mr Robert
desc: Compliment for Mr Robert Over these years , Mr Robert has extended his helping hand to my family especially my old age wheelchair mum on boarding and alighting the car . His warm helping hand is much appreciated. Looking forward on meeting you in person again Mr Robert

title: Comfortable and good location
desc: Fairmont hotel is highly recommended. I had a comfortable stay and the location is really convenient. My room attendant, Hang, especially made the room properly clean and was friendly. I would definitely stay here again. Breakfast has a good variety.

title: Wonderful experience at fairmont Singapore
desc: It was happiest moment staying at faitmont Singapore. Room was Comfortable and clean so we felt comfortable. when we checked in one employee who is named Lizam was very kind to our family. He gave some gifts(lion doll, chocolate) to my two sons and my children were very happy about it. I appreciate that Lizam‚Äôs warm kindness. Thank you for giving my family happy moments during 4nights and 5days. I hope we will visit again fairmont Singapore again.

title: Good have been really great.
desc: The location was great. The suite had a great view, was clean, comfortable and a delightful finish on our return home from 10 weeks in Europe. The breakdown of something as basis and essential as the water pump in our suite was disappointing. We really needed it for our normally constant drinking of cold water, our daily teas & coffees. The office was notified immediately on day one and it wasn‚Äôt fixed when we left 2 days later. There were no apologies on check out. No discount was offered. We had to ask for bottles of complimentary water- which just wasn‚Äôt what we paid for.

title: Good but nothing amazing
desc: It‚Äôs a nice place centrally located, next to a mall. Soundproof needs improvement (windows for instance) Rooms are nice and spacious, outdated a bit though. Breakfast, fitness excellent Concierge useless Reception efficient and friendly Bit expensive for what it is

title: Good hotel with good room options for singles to families
desc: Loved this hotel, close to most attractions and easy to travel around thanks to the MRT or taxis. Staff are supper helpful and nothing is to much trouble. Plenty of dining options close by if you don't want to eat at the restaurant's at the hotel. We chose the signature gold suite as a last bit of luxury before heading home, which was nice but there are many rooms to suit your budget,all in all a great stay

title: Disappointing stay
desc: More a 3-star than a 5-star. Starts with no printed material for reference, only QR scanning for service directory and in room dining. I get that during Corona times, but now, really?! You want your guest scavenger hunt for QRs in the room? Lack of attention from staff throughout. Front desk deserted at 8pm arrival. Pool without any service, lounger tables cleared only after long time if at all. Laundry next day service is by 6pm as stated by laundry slip, yet had to negotiate and reconfirm with staff, as they kept saying 6-9pm would be standard. At 5.30 I asked and staff said it would be delivered to room, nothing came until 6pm despite several calls. Received laundry only at front desk checkout at 6.10pm and had to pack laundered items into my luggage in the lobby.

title: Amazing view, conveniently located
desc: Very spacious rooms. Try and get a room on high floor and ask for one facing the Marina Bay. Spectacular view and you also get a balcony. Bed was very comfortable. Would definitely stay here again. Service was excellent and the hotel is conveniently located right in between the CBD and orchard.

title: Best service and the not so best
desc: Thank you to Bern, concierge of Fairmont Hotel. Our suitcase arrived at the hotel with missing zip opener. We asked Bern to help us organise to fix this and within a day it‚Äôs all done. We had breakfast at the hotel, unfortunately here we didn‚Äôt have as great service here. Clove was so busy, I can‚Äôt believe we have have to make our own noodle soup .. other hotels in Singapore have a chef make this for us üòî The breakfast staff doesn‚Äôt know what is single shot latte. After 3rd goes, the ma√Ætre‚Äôd of breakfast restaurant tried to teach me how to drink latte? Me who is a coffee snob.. just smiled ‚Ä¶ I have been drinking latte for 30 years üòÇüòÇüòÇ

title: Superb service overall
desc: This was our first time staying at the Fairmont. We would normally stay at Four Seasons when travelling but there was so many wins about the Fairmont. The location is great, it is connected to a shopping centre. The service desk has amazing clear communications and nothing was a problem, she made things very easy and smooth. Even cleaning staff are friendly and would say hello to you when you walk past them. The valet attendants were fantastic! They had so much energy and character and we were always greeted us with warm welcomes when they see us needing a cab. We stayed here from late August to early September, and everyone there has made our first stay a beautiful one. We will be coming back.

title: Busy but nice
desc: Quiet room and comfortable bed. Busy hotel but staff were efficient and friendly. Pool area is nice but gets busy with lots of children. Good location and walking distance to marina. Recommend and would stay again

title: Love love love the hospitality and the location!
desc: Love the stay at Fairmont Singapore! The staff and hospitality were amazing. Kudos to Ismail and Bon at the Breakfast buffet. They are amazing!! Made me feel very welcomed and made sure I get the best time there, and I very much did.

title: Perfect perfect perfect
desc: I have been staying at this wonderful hotel for 18 years and every time I visit I love it even more. Everyone who works there is friendly and helpful, the rooms are beautiful, the exec lounge is one of the best I have experienced, the location is fantastic. Thank you Fairmont for making me so welcome and for excelling for so many years

title: SUPERB HOTEL
desc: FANTASTIC STAY. EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE IN ALL ASPECTS - RECEPTION, LOBBY/BAG AND TAXI SERVICE, CLEANERS ETC. VERY CLEAN ROOMS AND ALWAYS CLEANED VERY WELL EACH DAY. QUALITY PRODUCTS USED IN THE BATHROOMS WHICH GIVES THIS HOTEL THE EDGE EG LE LABO PRODUCTS WHICH FELT LUXURIOUS. HOTEL WAS PERFECT FOR A LONG STAY. SPECIAL MENTION TO ROBERT IN THE TAXI SERVICE AREA WHO WAS SO FRIENDLY, PROFESSIONAL AND EXEMPLIFIES EXCEPTIONAL CUSTOMER SERVICE.

title: Excellent Refined Business Hotel in great location
desc: Compared with its sister hotel Swissotel, the Fairmont is more refined and luxurious. The rooms and lobby is well finished, with dark brown accents. Service from the concierge to the reception staff are friendly and helpful. Buffet breakfast at the Prego outlet has a wide selection & a bright vibe. The Fitness Center is large & well run. There is also a very good Chinese restaurant ‚ÄúAsia Grand‚Äù on the 3rd floor. Coupled with its convenient location, (being close to the MRT City Hall Hub); this Hotel whilst not cheap, is highly recommended

title: Great hotel, thoroughly recommend
desc: Everyone we have come across at Fairmont has been helpful, welcoming, friendly and professional - from check-in staff, to concierge, doormen, house keeping, pool bar staff and spa staff. Housekeeping staff in particular can perform miracles to our room, and bring order to our untidiness that comes from living out of suitcases and small children. It was always a joy returning to our room each day. Breakfast was varied but largely the same each day. But something for everyone. Location is brilliant. Virtually on top of city Hall MRT Station which makes accessing Singapore easy, and also on top of a mall that has food courts, shops, supermarkets, everything you need and all air conditioned. Our room had a partial sea view and city view, which was perfect, interesting and

title: Kind and comfortable Hotel with nice people
desc: Very kind hotel. All staffs are very nice and willing to help. Especially, Robert from front door made us smile every day. :) Hotel is not too big, so not crowded at all when we ask some support. Vice view is additional benefit from this Hotel. Willing to stay here more~

title: VERY NICE HOTEL!VERY GOOD SERVISE!VERY POLITE STUFF!THE BEST LOCATION!
desc: Hotel back to his fame, its after renovation , very nice design and service, first of all in Hotel works profesional, polite and helpful team - i think one of the best in Singapore. perfect housekeeping .very nice fitness and spa. exellent team at golden lounge - offer great standard and choice of meals . Special tajnks for Mr William and Mr Robert for the way how They honor loyal Accor members. With pleasure i will back in future. I recomended room with golden lounge acces where is best team and great food - especially private breakfast with chef who makes perfect eggs

title: Amazing bed display
desc: Absolutely amazing service from the ladies who made our room up. My daughter was so happy, with the treatment of her cuddly toys and the artistic display on her bed. Thanks so much Wen Jing and Ya Mim, you are awesome.

title: Great hotel
desc: Great hotel with excellent service, nice restaurants and pool. Close to all amenities and all that Singapore has to offer. Above a wide variety of shops and restaurants as well as the railway station.

title: The Fabulous Fairmont!
desc: Top notch service, very friendly and helpful staff, wonderful facilities, great location - especially our doorman, Ismail. Good choice of dining options and lovely shopping below. Highly recommend! üòä

title: Transport, Food, Views, Lovely Rooms - This Hotel Is The Complete Package!
desc: Love this hotel and keep coming back. Has fantastic views, well-appointed rooms, is very clean and well maintained as you would expect from this brand, has different dining options and choices of restaurants within the Fairmont and Swissotel. I believe this hotel is one of the best in Singapore with the MRT station under the hotel it is possible to go nearly everywhere in Singapore. I will definitely continue to return to this hotel whenever I am in Singapore. We received amazing customer service from Ms Chezza during our stay, thank you Ms Chezza. Also received excellent and patient service from Mr. Norris in reservations with our complex reservation, thank you Mr. Norris.

title: Fairmont at its finest!!!
desc: Fairmont Singapore was just fabulous! The hotel is beautiful and location was absolutely the best. Shopping center with many restaurants, retail stores and very easy access to the public train stations. We had the Gold Deluxe room, with the most beautiful views of the city and the Gold breakfast and cocktail service was impeccable! Would easily return to this hotel!!

title: Exceptional hospitality yet once again
desc: A truly remarkable stay! Thanks to Jean and her team for their thoughtfulness in anticipating my needs and creating an exceptional stay experience despite my hiatus of over two years. Kudos to the team!

title: Excellent as always
desc: Always a pleasure staying at The Fairmont Singapore. Everything is clean, spotless even. Beds and pillows comfortable. Really convenient location too seeing as the hotel is right next to a mall, a train station, and bus station as well. They even gave my bed partners companions! Til the next stay. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Excellent Location and Awesome Stay
desc: We booked 2 connecting rooms for our family holiday. The Signature Suite has a very great view covering the MBS, Esplanade, Merlion and Marina Bay. However the bathroom is quite small. Le Labo Rose 31 series is used for the shower amenities. The location is very convenient as the hotel is connected to Raffles City and City Hall MRT Station at the basement. You can go to other malls via underground to Suntec City, Marina Square, City Link, also to Esplanade theater. Gym is very good and openfor 24 hours, using Techno Gym brand. We love having breakfast at Prego rather than Asian Market Cafe. The breakfast is awesome. Lastly, we give our stay 5 out 5 ratings. Extremely satisfied ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

title: Excellent Experience
desc: Had an excellent experience with Fairmont Singapore. Mr Yuan Yang, the housekeeping manager and the whole team at the Fairmont were very efficient and welcoming. Will be choosing this Hotel again. Cheers! Room 935 & 936

title: I'm going to bring a good memory.
desc: It's a well-located hotel and the staff are friendly. It was connected underground, so it was convenient to move to another building. Above all, I was very satisfied with cleaning and organizing the room. I was lucky to meet a very kind and talented housekeeper while staying at the hotel.

title: Centrally Located in Singapore
desc: Excellent rooms. All the staff were attentive to our requirements. The buffet had a very good selection for every dietry requirements. The location of the hotel is above City Hall and conveniently linked underground to Raffles Links, Suntec and Marina Square. There are a good selection of food outlets in the basement of City Hall hence you will not go hungry. Highly recommended.

title: Nice hotel
desc: Great hotel. We booked last minute and everything was set up great. Loved our rooms and the views. Would definitely stay again. Great location as well in Singapore so you can get to every spot easily and conveniently

title: An enjoyable stay
desc: The Fairmont is well located for our visit to the F1 Grand Prix. We also like it‚Äôs convenience to the MRT City Hall station and Raffles City shopping centre.
