We found all staff to be friendly and helpful. On arrival Bernice checked us in and happily dealt with some changes we made. By happy coincidence she was also on duty when we checked out. Breakfast each (weekday) morning started with a welcoming greeting by Ismail at the doorway to Prego. Housekeeping were great with tidying our room each day, leaving things, even our phone charging cables in proper order. A highlight one day was to find a towel wrapped to look like an elephant - thank you Xuan Hammin. See photo. We enjoyed our stay, again, & have penciled in The Fairmont for next year‚Äôs Grand Prix.

title: Best Hotel for Formula 1
desc: Great service. Rooms in the south tower are exquisite! The attention from all the staff is unmatched! Great view of the F1 track from the room balcony. The bar at the lobby has a great ambience. The best!

title: Best hotel in Singapore
desc: It was one of the best hotels I have ever stayed in . The staff were great hope sometime we can go back . We had the best view of Singapore you could get . The swimming was fabulous.the food was very good .

title: Outstanding Customer Service
desc: The staff at the Fairmount hotel are outstanding and I mean outstanding! They greet you with a warm smile and nothing is a problem. I have stayed at many hotels and I must say the staff go above and beyond to make your stay that little bit more special. A special mention to Bern & Mike ü§©

title: Excellent location, comfortable for families
desc: We arrived at the hotel around 11am straight off a 14 hour flight. i already knew checkin wasn‚Äôt until 3pm however the reception staff checked us straight in without any mention of it! I cannot express how good it was for our whole weary family to be able to get a few hours very restful and comfortable sleep to refresh. The 2 x double beds were really not much bigger than a king single each however the hotel reception staff also proactively mentioned this and asked if we would like an additional fold up bed. Hubby and I had a ‚Äúdouble bed‚Äù each whilst each of our 10 and 12 year old boys had a fold up bed each and we were all very comfortable. We awoke around 3:30pm and had plenty of energy and enthusiasm to enjoy a lovely walk down to the Marina Bay and Gardens by the Bay we were

title: Our favourite hotel in Singapore!
desc: We have stayed here many times and it never disappoints. Always a warm welcome, efficient and friendly check in, stunning room. The views this time! ‚≠êÔ∏è It can be hard to find a sunbed round the pool which is the only frustrating part of staying here, however it‚Äôs location is second to none and you don‚Äôt visit Singapore to sit in the sun! We love everything about this hotel, and have stayed at many more in Singapore, we always gravitate back here.

title: Overpriced and not in the slightest bit friendly
desc: I booked this hotel (3 rooms) back in early 2022 for 3 days to break up our (there was 10 of us) journey from Thailand back to the UK. Positives .. the location of the hotel is central to Singapore with some fantastic views of the city. I found the reception staff and conceirge services excellent. There was always a friendly smile and conversation from the door staff. Negatives - unfortunately the friendliness of the reception staff was where it ended. Bar staff , particularly the female bar tender at the pool where rude, unapproachable and did nothing to support the good name of the hotel. Drinks are generally ridiculous in price ¬£10 for a bottle of tiger beer !!!! ¬£30 for a margerita pizza!!!! The rooms were clean although the AC does not go below 20 degrees. Breakfast

title: Happy to return again
desc: It was a much needed 'Me-Time' break for me. The staff were friendly but not intrusive. The location serve my purpose with retail shops and eateries within walking distance. I had a good time. Thank you.

title: Family friendly, good location hotel!
desc: Brought my family for a birthday staycation at fairmont & it was the best. Hotel gifted me a cake & gave me a room with beautiful view. Was given a rollaway bed & it's as comfy as the king we have. Room was clean & spacious too. They have a wading pool, 1.2m deep pool & even provided pool noodle.

title: 5th wedding Anniversary
desc: The staff was amazing, they gave us a really pretty surprise as well as a cake that we get every year. We got married here and celebrate here every year since. Room is big, staff is friendly, amazing views, location is central.

title: A wonderful stay at Fairmont Gold Room
desc: The overall staycation experience was good. The hospitality provided at the front desk, Gold Lounge and housekeeping were excellent! Thumb up! My family has decided this will be the hotel for our annual staycation.

title: Good location
desc: The hotel is connected to shopping centres and food courts allowing diverse choices. Views of the city are spectacular. Shower is spacious and good water pressure. South tower is more updated than North tower. Ample water is supplied in room for day trips. Very good service from front staff in getting taxis. Prego Restaurant for breakfast was decent but I expected better pastries from this caliber of hotel. The other buffet was not as good.

title: ISMAEL made our day !!
desc: The nicest person that can greet you at the entrance of Prego Restaurant. Always very happy and educated person, nicely and elegantly dressed . Unfortunately I could not see his face because of the masks regulations.

title: Comfortable Stay & Great Location
desc: We had a relaxing and enjoyable stay at the hotel. The room is comfortable and have an amazing view of Marina Bay. The room is spacious, large and nice bathroom. The shower has excellent water pressure. We will return again.

title: Pre- Cruise stay
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont for 3 nights prior to boarding a cruise. Even though we arrived from the airport at 8 am, our rooms were ready. A wonderful thing since we had been traveling for over 30 hours!! The hotel is absolutely gorgeous, spotlessly clean and in an excellent location. The staff is extremely helpful and courteous. They go out of their way to assist you in any way possible. Special thanks to Jazlina at the reception desk for getting us checked in quickly and with great kindness to our jetlagged group and Robert the doorman. Robert always greeted me with an amazing smile and sincere welcome. I truly hope to visit Singapore again and have the pleasure of staying at the Fairmont!

title: Best doorman ever
desc: Always smilling and have kind attention. Happy to see Ismail every time I come to Singapore Fairmont Hotelüòâ This man make my day every time I see him. I‚Äôm very glad to see him after 4 years without coming in SG

title: Excellent pawcation
desc: Warm, friendly service, super clean great sized room Great location, wonderful in-dining meals (perfect ribeye and great breakfasts) all cheerfully served, beautifully presented and hygienic Fantastic views

title: Excellent Service
desc: My family and I stayed the Deluxe Harbour room from 16 to 18 December and we drove our own vehicle. We were not aware that there is no complimentary parking available and our plan was to get around town via the accessible MRT. We checked with several front desk and were told there is no complimentary or discounted parking as it was under Raffles City. However, we tried our luck again when we returned back at night and spoke to Ilham. He explained the situation and also suggested that we use the self service valet that would cost cheaper. While we were deciding on that, Ilham went to check around and came back with a complimentary coupon valid for 24hours. The next day, we tried our luck again but to no avail. Upon our return in the evening, we saw Ilham again and seek his

title: Fair
desc: A one night stop in a very busy hotel. Great location opposite Raffles. Excellent check in process. Very welcoming and informative. Room ok. Booked via Silversea as joining cruise. Very clean. Comfy bed. However very noisy with traffic outside. Despite being on level 11. Room service poor. Breakfast inedible. Better to wander out for food etc.

title: Centre to Everything
desc: The Fairmont Hotel in Singapore is in a great location being in the Raffles City Shopping Centre and having the City Hall MRT Station below is very handy. The room was large by modern standards we were on the 20th floor with good views. The only negative about the room was hearing the water run in the adjoining room when using the shower or toilet. The staff were great especially Shannon at reception who was very helpfully. The only negative was when using the Accor Plus card and the different discounts we would receive. In the Prego Restaurant we got the normal 50% off for two people but at the Eight Restaurant the is at the pool only 15% off the meals. On the website it states 50% for two meals. Overall a good stay.

title: Wedding Anniversary Staycation
desc: Was here with my family to celebrate our wedding anniversary! Thankful for the decorations done by the Fairmont team! My son loved the balloons. Had an enjoyable stay! Will definitely come back again! :)

title: Hospitality at Fairmont
desc: A very memorable stay at Fairmont for my birthday with family. Loved the hospitality. Especially I must mention Mr. ROBERT, who was the most warm person to welcome us. He made us so very comfortable for us be it booking cabs or any info needed. Also the housekeeping staff and front desk was amazing. Food has limited but delicious veg options.

title: Nice hotel with prime location
desc: Such a nice hotel with prime location in Singapore. I love it that this hotel is connected to city hall MRT, which is only like few stations away from Orchard and it's within walking distance to Bugis Junction. The room was also very spacious and has a nice view towards Marina Bay Sands. However, the hotel facility was not too good as it was being renovated during my stay, so I need to go to Fitness First instead. The decor on the hallway is a little bit creepy as well, especially with a body shaped statue being placed in between each room. In addition, the movement detection sensor needs to be fixed or adjusted as well. There is one time I was still inside the room, and suddenly the light was off and the curtain was closed automatically.

title: Great hotel and location. Antidote needs improvement
desc: While there are some less than favorable reviews lately, we found this hotel to be perfect for a three day stop over in Singapore. The location was amazing, being very central to everything that a tourist would want to do. The room was in great shape, the filtered water machine worked well, and the front desk was very friendly. We stayed in one of the Gold level rooms and had access to the lounge in the morning for breakfast. One negative that we experienced was a poor afternoon tea in Antidote. The kids were pretty much finished their food before we even got our ffod, and a large group of 8 people drinking afternoon beers were sat right next us as we tried to have a quiet tea....not really a relaxing atmosphere.

title: Ismail review
desc: Seeing Ismail every morning for breakfast, definitely has been a highlight of most every day for the last 3 weeks. Very friendly gentleman. Definitely a spirit lifter and brings a smile to your face. He works just outside the door of Prego in the fairmont hotel. My colleagues and I were up in the Swissotel we‚Äôd meet Ismail almost every morning in his top hat and suit and exchanged cheerful two thumbs up and a smile on the way in and a handshake or a thumb up on the way out as he wished us a good day. Over all he definitely added cheer to all our breakfast experiences. I look forward to coming back to Singapore.

title: Great central location. Spacious rooms
desc: After many years of travelling to Singapore, the Fairmont is our go to whenever we travel via Singapore. The hotel is central being very close to 3 MRT lines and walking distance to many attractions. The rooms are spacious and very well appointed. The amenities such as pool and gym are first class. We had breakfast in our most recent stay and it is one of the better buffets that we have had - plenty of variety. Highly recommend.

title: Perfect in Every Way
desc: I stayed at this hotel just prior to the Singapore Formula 1. I have stayed here several times before and think everything about this hotel is perfect. Also I would like to make mention of Ismail who greets people as they enter and leave the hotel and adjoining mall and Stamford hotel. We enjoy seeing Ismail and he adds a lovely personalised touch to the hotel. The rooms at this hotel feel extremely clean, some of the rooms have amazing views, the restaurant facilities at both the Fairmont and Swissotel are very good and both of the hotels have the ability to charge from either hotel to your room. Great pool and great location also above the MRT train station. Perfect hotel for a Singapore stay.

title: Great hotel and stay at the Fairmont
desc: Great hotel - high level of service and accomodation. Food was good at Prego. The staff were helpful and knowledgeable. Can‚Äôt beat the location - close to shopping and dining. The view from our room on the 16th floor of the North Tower was to the Marina Bay Sounds hotel

title: Happy stay at Fairmont Goldroom
desc: Stayed here for staycation. If somebody asks me about hotel to stay in Singapore, I will recommend Fairmont goldroom. Their service is perfect. Very warm welcome and fantastic happy hours. I really like their Fairmont Gold team. Amin, Xuixin, Howard, Nigel and chef Glenn :) Hope to stay here once again

title: Good stay but need some improvements
desc: Positive: > Room is large, cleaned and view was great > Bathroom is spacious, and shower was powerful Areas for improvements; > Balcony area looks dated, not inviting. Would be good if you can put some plants/chairs/or refurbish it > Was hoping for some Le Labo toiletries when we first checked in as we saw that on other reviews. We had to ask the butler if it's available and thankfully he brought us some. > Welcome drink - we saw this only on the second day on a letter that was slipped into our room. We wished this could have been made known right when we checked-in. We end up didn't going for the welcome drink.

title: Excellent value, Excellent Staff, Excellent Location
desc: Our family stayed in Fairmont Gold Rooms with access to the Club Lounge. The rooms were very comfortable and well appointed. The Club Lounge had amazing food and beverage options and all the staff were outstanding.

title: No free parking
desc: Overall, it's ok, but the downside was there is no free parking. Understand that the staff mentioned the carparks are shared with the mall. However, I think they should have some sort of arrangement for stayers to have at least lower charges incurred during our stay. Suggest if you are staying, do not drive, as the carpark charges are expensive. The connection to chromecast was also an issue during our stay. The staff came up and tried to troubleshoot. However, they were also unsure of the issue. Tried to connect accordi g to the steps shown but still having difficulty. They wanted to come in again at a later time, but due to time constraints, we gave up. Another downside was that their fridge was full of chargeable beverages, and it's just too hassel to remove 1 by 1. We

title: Good in the past, but not good now
desc: North tower is so old, I gets noisy when the neighbourinf room has a shower. Worse still, i had a faulty safe which was just stupidly handled. The guy came and just dropped a replacement safe on the floor and the security had no idea what to do with it except to remove it. Was shocked how badly trained the staff are

title: Lovely birthday surprise!
desc: Spent my 21st birthday here, and even though I didn‚Äôt mention anything to the concierge, when I arrived back in the hotel room I found waiting on the coffee table a beautiful and delicious chocolate cake, with a candle and matches to light the candle with! Such a lovely surprise and a wonderful way to end a very happy day. Couldn‚Äôt recommend Fairmont more highly. The service is excellent, thoughtful, caring, and finessed. Thank you very much.

title: Great hotel with a wonderful club lounge
desc: We had a wonderful 7 days stay at this hotel. The rooms are quite big and nicely decorated with comfortable beds. The location is very convenient, a metro station (City Hall) is just ‚Äûin-House‚Äú and many sight-seeing spots are within walking distance (e.g. Merlion, Marina Bay Sands etc.). The Club lounge of the Fairmont is worth the money, great food and drinks and very nice staff. We will certainly stay again at the Fairmont when coming to Singapore.

title: Best Hotel Stay of the Year!
desc: Best hotel experience we've had all year and we booked it on a whim! Not only were the non-suite rooms super spacious (45sqm) the entire experience was fantastic and memorable. We stayed 2 nights at the King Gold Room and took the two double beds option which was perfect for our family... wished more hotels would do this - and immediately extended another night's stay. Staff from housekeeping to technician (had a brain fart moment with the Nespresso machine) to the pool (thanks for helping us keep the ice cream cold) to the wonderful staff in the Fairmont Gold Lounge - Simon, we'll always remember your kindness to our kids and your wonderful, discrete attentiveness - Shakira, thanks for empathising with my wife on her grandma's recent passing - Refqi and Jamie, thanks for being

title: Enjoyable and Remarkable stay
desc: Excellent service during check in. Nice view, clean and comfortable for the room. Good experience at Fairmont Gold Lounge, nice food, nice drink and good service provided by all staff during dinner and breakfast. Fairmont Hotel conveniently located @heart of the city. üëçüëçüëç

title: Loved our stay
desc: We really enjoyed our stay at this hotel. Speedy check in. Upgraded us to a new room which was so beautiful. Fantasy views. Loved the water tap instead of plastic bottles. Bathroom was luxurious. Lots of choice at breakfast (but the coffee needs improvement) Perfect location right next door to Raffles. Pool was really nice with bar service. Stayed previously at Marina bay but prefer The Fairmont. Will definitely return when next in the area.

title: Large room
desc: The staff are so helpful, arranging tickets for the zoo, gardens by the bay & a booking for lunch at Skai restaurant. Our room was very spacious, large bathroom, the shower had excellent water pressure, lighted make up mirror. King size bed, work station, great balcony with a lovely view. Housekeeping services where very efficient.

title: Smooth and comfortable stay
desc: Everything was smooth, and we received very efficient service. I would recommend this hotel mainly for business travel. This time I stayed with my family, and it was okay because it was a short stay. The rooms with bay views are outstanding, highly recommended. Definetely, the best view you can get.

title: Awesome Stay with the Family
desc: We had a fantastic 5 nights at the Fairmont. Stayed in the renovated deluxe rooms in the South Tower with fantastic views of the Marina. All staff are wonderful, very friendly and extremely helpful. I think the location is the best in Singapore. Attached to the Raffles City Mall and MTR. Breakfast at Prego was plentiful and delicious. The gym is very well equipped and my sons loved the spa and sauna which they used every day. There is a beautiful scent throughout the lobby which is very soothing and calming when walking through. We loved our stay and hope to return in the near future. Highly recommend.

title: Fair stay at fairmont
desc: Location is very good next to the mall. There are lots of eating options around hotel in particular in the basement of raffles city mall. It‚Äôs also easy to catch a grab or a taxi to anywhere else in the city. There is a 7-11 in the basement of the mall. Rooms are nice and big around 40sqm. Bed are on the hard side which I like and found very comfortable . Sleep quality was very good for me. There is also little balcony but when you open the window you can smell the smoke from the restaurant hoods even though we were on 18 floor . Breakfast was superb with lots of variety and was high quality . Tip: - book early in advance to get a better room rate. Then it makes it more value for money. - although the breakfast is very nice , you can save money by eating breakfast in

title: Lovely Singapore
desc: Fairmont Singapore was wonderful, felt comfortable and looked after. The pool was perfect and breakfast at pronto was amazing. The room was spacious, quiet and wonderful views. The staff were all very helpful and friendly.

title: Poor Service
desc: I booked for 5 days and hotel claim as 5 star. However, standard is not. I went out for four hours and put the make up room sign on, when Im back the room is not make up yet!! One agent told me should go out again and wait until room is ready!!!! This is very hot outside, when back to hotel i need to relax in my room. That is why i select full service hotel, and this time is very wrong choice. First time with Accor Hotels and very disappoint!

title: good place hotel and good service
desc: room ambience quite nice, with a good view of singapore. all room feature in electric touch. luxurious and very strategic place. i'm quite comfortable with the room. i booked deluxe harbour view room.

title: One of the best SG hotels
desc: I love the spacious, comfortable space at Fairmont. I actually liked the room better than other more higher end hotels. There's free cold tap water inside the room which I really loved. The beds and pillows are so comfortable. We loved the service of Ms. Elvie from the front desk. We used the rooms we booked for day of wedding preps so we really wish there were more tables/chairs to borrow, a hanger/mannequin for the dress and most of all, a better room lighting. It was so dim! Which is lovely to sleep but not for make up.

title: Ordinary Hotel with Rude Managers
desc: No issues with room. Service at restaurant is slow particular at queue to get in (while there are plenty of spaces). Extremely arrogant Director of Front Desk Jean Wong who shoved me out of the lobby while I was waiting for some incompetent bell boy took ages to look for my bag on departure. Her excuse is there are better clients to serve and I'm nobody. Even left an annoying tag on my bag that I have to get it couriered back to the hotel at my cost. I'm glad Singapore has so many hotels - won't return to this one for sure!

title: Love! Love! Love!
desc: Immaculate, luxurious hotel with top notch service and food! There are 13 restaurants and bars, gym, meeting room facilities, swimming pool and a day spa. Raffles City Mall is connected to the hotel and you can get to Suntec City Mall via the underground connecting to the hotel either by walking or taking the MRT. I preferred to walk if you are not in a rush. It's centrally located and Marina Bay Sands is very close by. I enjoyed the spacious bedroom and bathroom including the electronic curtains and motion sensors lighting, very handy when you are getting up in the middle of the night to go to the bathroom. Amazing views and endless food options from various cuisines around the world, the food and desserts were scrumptious!!

title: Fantastic stay
desc: We had a great 14 day stay with the Fairmont Singapore. All staff from the Front desk to housekeeping are extremely professional, courteous and pleasant. The room on the 20th floor of the South Tower had a terrific view of Marina Bay Sands and the surrounding areas. Centrally located within walking distance to Gardens by the Bay, the Raffles City MRT next door, a food court on level 3 adjacent to the hotel and a shopping center as well. Restaurant staff are very pleasant as are all staff. Housekeeping is very efficient and quick. Taxis and buses are easily available. Sports being played on the Padang can be watched from the from : an added bonus.

title: Excellent service, location and view
desc: We did not tell the hotel when we made the booking that we were celebrating a special occasion but Yi Jua, the guest relation officer, who helped us when we checked in, asked. When he found out that we were celebrating something special, he sent a cake (with a candle and a box of matches) to our room. He also helped us enquire if there were complimentary car park coupons available during our stay. He went beyond the call of duty. He was very courteous and pleasant. The view from our 8th floor room, in the South Wing, was really nice. It was facing MBS and the Esplanade. The room was well maintained and the facilities excellent. It even had an automated hot and cold water dispenser! Never seen one in a hotel room before.

title: Memorable 44th (birthday)
desc: Called up 1-2 days earlier to request for early check in and was accorded 12pm check in. Do give adequate notice for any special arrangements. Love the tub and separate shower area in the spacious bathroom.

title: Pleasant Pokemon Post
desc: The staff from the front desk (especially Pravin) , the concierge, restaurant and even the cleaner made this short stay a truly memorable one. I've casually mentioned the reason for our visit which was for the Singapore Pokemon weekend to Pravin and stated that we did this trip specifically for my sons birthday... then one night coming back to the hotel after dinner we found very pleasant surprise.. a pokemon birthday card wishing our son happy birthday.. was a very lovely touch that made us all smile.. in the words of my son, " this is one of the key memories this trip".

title: Thoughtful luxury.
desc: This hotel was super luxurious with thoughtful sustainable touches such as a water filter and reusable bottle to use during your stay. The bed was so comfortable and the bedding luxurious. A beautiful bathtub and amenities made the hotel a pleasure to stay in the room.

title: Very pleasant hotel
desc: The hotel offered everything you would like and extras for health b and fitness. It is very pleasant and staff are polite and friendly. ƒúreat location. Well recommended. We would be back on our next visit and plan to spend more time in the hotel.

title: Dismal check in process
desc: Absolute dismal service and rude tone while checking in by Shannon Phua. Perhaps the management would be minded to reconsider placements for customer-facing staff. Had wonderful previous experiences here since our wedding and staycation but this time was unfortunately not the same. Would be apprehensive to return or recommend.

title: Doorman Ismail brings great joy!
desc: Doorman Ismail is amazing! He brings such great joy to all that pass. This was my 20th time staying at the Fairmont and every time it brings me great joy also to see him and receive his greetings each morning. 100 stars!

title: Where Heartware matters when Hardware went wrong !
desc: Great staff at front desk and Royal Service. Their polite, prompt and professional service save the day. Accommodation and room was ordinary. Just for info there is no bathtub. Impressive how they treat their Silver Accor members but could be more as compared to other hotel brands Very impressive that they provide entire gym gear from head to toes ! This made an impression on a gym buff like me.

title: Fantastic Singapore getaway
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont in Singapore, having stayed here previously over the years we've always had a great experience. This time was no exception. George made us great coffee to go with an unmatched breakfast at Prego. Howard, Jamie, Xin and the rest of the team in the gold lounge made us feel so welcome in the lounge. And Yan Min, Lyka and Ruth made up our room impeccably each day. The Fairmont is in a great location, has excellent facilities (pool, spa, fitness centre), large rooms and has such a welcoming feel. So glad to be back in Singapore!

title: Amazing Experience
desc: I highly recommend Fairmont Hotel Singapore as first preference for business trips. It has all facilities of conference rooms, cafes and networking areas. Having good business center and shopping areas. McDonald's is also here üòÇ

title: Fantastic stay at Fairmont Singapore
desc: Visited Singapore with my siblings and we stayed at Fairmont Singapore in their HarbourView King Room in South Tower facing Marina Bay Sands. The view in the morning and at night time was spectacular. There is a motorized day and night shade by the bedside if you need to darken the room for a good night‚Äôs sleep. The King bed and pillows were very comfortable, we all had a good night sleep eventhough I had jet lag for a couple of days coming from a long haul flight. The sofa and table we‚Äôve made good use for having coffee conversations. The work desk with a view of Marina Bay and Financial District was great while you catch-up on work on your laptop. The TV had a few traditional channel and customized with Fairmont information, though it would have been better of an

title: Very recent trip
desc: Just got back from a lovely stay here......my room (2001) - a basic room in the North Tower with one huge very comfortable double bed - was excellent - high ceilings and plenty of 'volume' as they say. Great view of the Marina Bay Sands. Bathroom was fine and lighting/heating good and quite easy to control too from bedside unit. Everything was available - decent shampoo and separate conditioner both of good quality, a sensible policy about sheet/towel changing, an excellent hairdryer. Just what you would want from a 'top end' hotel. So what would I change? Not much really - lovely staff - great room and of course an excellent position. Well worth it.

title: Fairmont Gold lounge experience was exceptional
desc: I stayed 2 nights with my family at the Fairmont Gold DBL DBL room. The room was very clean, spacious and comfortable. Room service was prompt and excellent. The pool and spa were well maintained. The gym was under renovation so the machines were limited to a small studio. We loved the Gold Lounge. The service staff at the lounge took care of my family needs extremely well. Its worth paying for the Gold lounge as the quality of drinks and evening canape was superb. We will be happy to come back next year.

title: Helpful Staff
desc: The rooms were always clean and Staff at the reception and Concierge were always willing to assist me with prompt responses to my enquiries. The Housekeeping team. Ensured i had enough water and tea items

title: Fabulous Fairmont
desc: My wife & I stayed at this wonderful hotel for 8 nights in a Signature King Suite, with Gold Lounge Access. Our stay was a pleasure from start to finish. Our room was spacious and the bed very comfortable. There are many restaurants to choose from as well as the Gold Lounge. Our experience was excellent, & we cannot speak more highly about the Lounge. Every staff member is very courteous & efficient. The hotel is centrally located - directly opposite Raffles. There are so many staff we would wish to thank. De Cheng at reception, Rifqi, Jamie, Lydia, Howard and chef Glenn. I am sorry we have missed naming everyone. Not one person disappointed us with their attitude.

title: Post covid break away
desc: We have had a lovely 6 nights here and enjoyed our stay. Great location! Breakfast is fantastic! Greeted by Ismail at the door is a real treat. He has been working here for 36 years and at 76 years old he is a delight. The rooms are lovely and clean and the beds comfortable. The pool is nice and clean but some of the pool beds are broken and almost at ground level, making getting out of them extremely hard! Unfortunately our checkin was very disappointing as communication between reservations and the hotel were very lacking. I am ex Accor staff of 15 years and have never complained about the amenities in rooms, however the amenities here are extremely strong smelling and have upset my asthma terribly. If you are coming here and ‚Äòsmells‚Äô affect your heath I recommend

title: 5 star hotel with 6* staff, look forward to coming back again
desc: Booked Fairmont Gold room this time for birthday staycation as my experience last year at North Wing suite was good. Happy that request for early checkin was possible, check in was a breeze as I‚Äôve submitted required info online. All staff I‚Äôve met, Pravin, Thu, Shan, 3 gents at Fairmont Gold Lounge were all welcoming and greeted me warmly. Appreciate the complementary birthday cakes. An unexpected surprise separately arranged was special arrangement with a bottle of white wine. Look forward to another good year ahead and to be back next year.

title: City visit
desc: Excellent hotel with an amazing views Service was excellent and all staff keen to help Perfect location for what we had planned Breakfast was fantastic Lovely 3 night stay and would definitely recommend

title: Ismail, the best
desc: Very good! Ismail is the best! Very friendly with a super energy! Hotel is very clean, very organized! The room is cleaned daily with in a very carefull way! The location is just aside Raffles City mall.

title: Love My Yearly Pawcation!
desc: My yearly stay with my pets.. They are so welcoming & accommodating.. From Jazlina to Claudia who has assisted me... Highly recommended for everyone who wants relaxation stay in SG. See you guys soon!

title: Good to be back after 2 years. Great service
desc: Great stay at Fairmont, as usual. Special shout-out to Ismail who at the entrance of the Prego breakfast always greets guests with great enthusiasm. He‚Äôs a real joy. Front desk and concierge staff also very nice and helpful And no excuse not to visit the gym with sport gear provided!

title: Fairmont back to its best.
desc: It was great to come back to Fairmont with a positive vibe again. Firstly I would like to thank Jean for looking after us and allowing an early check in considering we had an early arrival into Singapore from Italy and late checkout due to an evening departure. Great to see a positive attitude in the club lounge with the staff making cocktails as it once used to with better brands of spirits for miked drinks, something that was missing on our last vacation. A special thanks to X..(can‚Äôt remember her full name) she was attentive and would always remember our favourite drinks from the night before. Also like to make mention of George at Pregos, always looked after us over the the years and gave us special attention with breakfast. Once again can‚Äôt wait to come back for future

title: Average hotel in great location
desc: I haven't stayed at Fairmont hotels for a while so when heading to Singapore in August decided to give it a try as the location is just excellent and with the mall attached makes a lot of things very convenient. The lobby is very unimpressive to say the least and the rooms are ok but far from luxurious. Size is quite small, amenities and everything else quite basic, but the most disappointing fact is that the power outlets are only made for Singaporean power plugs but not the variety of international power plugs. Very disappointing considering the rooms were renovated not too long ago. Overall ok but basic, nothing that was really wow for international business travellers.

title: Great location and warm hospitality!
desc: Booked a room for a birthday celebration and fairmont did not disappoint! Staff are very hospitable and always ready to help! Kudos and big thanks to front desk and room service team for the excellent stay. Really love the breakfast at prego as well!

title: excellent location - helpful staff
desc: The harbor view rooms really do have a wonderful view of Singapore - the hotel is in a very convenient location, making it easy to walk many places. The breakfast was very nice. The staff was extremely helpful in giving us directions and making dinner recommendations and reservations.

title: Magnificent Hotel
desc: Truly a five star hotel with exceptional service. The staff friendly, accommodating and very professional, they even remember exactly how you like your coffee and what your food preferences were from the previous day. The rooms are nicely refurbished with showers that have good old-fashioned water pressure in the shower. Housekeeping staff were amazing, we had a conference there which made it easier to access the venue from my room. Congratulations to staff, Rifqi, Nigel, Lydia and Jean.

title: Fairmont Singapore is the perfect hotel destination
desc: Fairmont Singapore is a fabulous holiday destination. The location, the staff, the food and the drinks are always spot on. George made the perfect coffees for us ever morning. It was so nice to see Ismail outside Prego. He made us smile every morning. My only negative comment would be the exercise classes in the pool. It is not calm, quiet or relaxing when they are happening.

title: Welcoming reception
desc: The reception was warm and friendly. Claudia and Yi Jun were patient and attentive. Claudia found out it was one of our birthday, readily offered to send a cake and gave a cute little Fairmont mascot for memory. The room was clean and newly renovated.

title: Great Accommodation Experience
desc: The Fairmont Hotel was amazing, centrally located in the perfect area to explore Singapore. The Room was spacious and luxurious with a very comfortable bed and pillows. The Hotel is a short walk to an amazing shopping complex, supermarkets, eateries and the MRT.

title: Best hotel view in Singapore
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont, Singapore for 3 Days and had booked deluxe harbour room in South Tower. The view from our hotel room was simply the best, room size was also pretty large. The breakfast options for vegetarians at restaurants were limited but decent. We really liked the spacious and ambient feel at Asian Market Cafe during breakfast hours. One suggestion for hotel management, please provide no egg, no meat signs for veg meals. There were some meals like vegetable fried rice which contained egg. The only problem we faced during our stay was that the wash basin in our room got clogged the night before checkout. We had to leave early morning next day so couldn't find time to inform the front desk about the issue. Overall it was a great and worthwhile stay.

title: Great job A Sa Tan from guest service...please look for him if you want tourist recommendations!
desc: A Sa Tan, the guest service manager, was very helpful, sincere and had great service. He recommended my parents and I to go to Joo Chiat and KaTong which were very good places for walking and eating local Singaporean and Malaysian foods. He was also very hospitable when he called taxi for us every time because he would let us know the arrival time and let us wait indoors. A Sa Tan is a great staff at Fairmont and this hotel should be greatful to have such a fantastic person working there. I really suggest anyone who stays at this hotel to find his assistance.

title: Perfect location, wonderful room and great staff
desc: Our room was wonderful, on a high floor in the North Tower. The location was perfect, being close to the Raffles Hotel and the food court in Raffles City shopping centre. The staff were extremely helpful and professional. We will come back.

title: Great hotel
desc: Everything was perfect and we enjoyed our stay at Fairmont. The rooms were immaculate and the concierge service was absolutely amazing. For example we decided to rent a car at 11 am on a Friday and couldn‚Äôt find anything online. The concierge people found us a great one at a reasonable price in five minutes.

title: Ismail is amazing ü§©
desc: Staying at The Fairmont and greeted by Ismail makes your day a great one. Such a happy pleasant man who takes time to have a chat even though always so busy. Thank you Ismail. So nice to meet you You made our stay the best

title: Great stay
desc: We often judge the hotel by its bathroom. The Fairmont ticked all the boxes. 2 shower heads, very good lighting and plenty of room to move. Meals (self-serve) were always good and lots of choices. The location was handy to City Hall station. Very enjoyable weeks stay. Recommended.

title: Comfortable stay; great service
desc: The hotel is located perfectly and allowed easy commute to business and social options. Being able to access the hotel next door is plus and, the mall in the basement the MRT being so close is major advantage. The room that I stayed was spacious, well maintained and the laundry and turndown service was prompt. Restaurants are aplenty and I particularly enjoyed breakfast at the Asian Market cafe. Reception and Concierge staff are polite, courteous and very professional. Thank you for making my stay a memorable one.

title: Felt like a royalty staying here!
desc: Hands down, best stay I had in all my hotel stays! Got a complimentary upgrade to the royal suite and I would like to thank Shannon for making this arrangement for our special occasion. The spaciousness and the leather fitted furniture made the room even more luxurious. Waking up to a great view overseeing MBS, esplanade, and the Singapore skyline. The night view was spectacular as well. Would like to give a special thanks to the Fairmont Gold Lounge team (Firdaus, Lydia, Syakirah, Rusyaidi, Ain, Nigel, Rachel, Rifqi) for making us feel comfortable while waiting for our keys. Also to mention, with fairmont fit, i was given a workout attire (with socks and shoes) by the hotel so I could have my gym session. Overall, it was definitely a stay we will remember down the road.

title: Always a joy to come back to the Fairmont
desc: This is my 7th stay at the Fairmont since 2003, my first since 2018 because of the pandemic. The rooms have been refurbished making them feel even bigger. I shared a twin room, the beds were massive and comfy, so was the L shaped sofa. Being in room 2138, I had magnificent views of Marina Bay and the Financial District skyline. Breakfast was included in this trip, we took ours at Prego, it had a lot of choice and variety, the omelettes were brilliant, so a big shout out to the omelette chef. The Chinese section had my favourite of chu cheng fan too. Other facilities I used was the gym and pool daily, they were both excellent as I remembered it on my previous stays. I would also like to mention the art gallery next to the hotel, as the hotel displays some of their pieces.

title: Worthy choice
desc: I was very satisfied with my stay. The checkin process was seamless and the level of service was just a touch below a truly 5 star experience. I had a room facing the marina which seemed newly renovated and offered as much as any ‚Äúbusiness hotel‚Äù anywhere in the world - the lighting system would be my only knock; ‚Äútrendy‚Äù but not great. They also have an exceptional pool, gym, sauna/stem, hot + cold tub, but they don‚Äôt offer (or advertise) amenities such as razors, toothbrush, at the spa area and it is due for a facelift so this was overall not up to the standards of a 5 star hotel. I also had a good breakfast at their Italian restaurant on the ground floor.

title: Thanks to Hang and Liying :)
desc: I‚Äôve had a great experience at Fairmont. The hotel staff is very nice, respectful and prompt. My room was maked up every day by nice ladies Hang and Liying. I‚Äôve had a clean room every day and cleaned lines. Thank you, Fairmont!

title: Lovely stay
desc: Have been going back whenever we are free. Definitely love it. Staffs were friendly. Excellent services. Marvellous Room, and clean. Next time hope to get a higher level with better view as the past few stay which is booked under my wife name are lower than 15.

title: Superb care
desc: Hang has cleaned my room on several occasions while I stayed at the Fairmont Hotel. She is extremely industrious and ensures the very best service is provided. Her supervisor, Lixing, must have trained her very well indeed. I consider myself fortunate to stay at such an excellent establishment with the very best staff. Thank you.

title: Fairmont Hotel / Excellent Location!
desc: TLDR PROS: Location / Access to indoor shopping without worry of inclement weather/ breakfast CONS: Price/ Room decor is outdated/ Not a lot of fridge space for personal items If you have some money to spend on accommodations, the Fairmont hotel would be a worthy candidate to consider as it is located in one of the best locations in all of Singapore. At least that‚Äôs what I think. The hotel is a short cab ride away from the Marina Bay. If you‚Äôre adventurous, you can walk there by navigating through the Raffles shopping center and exiting the front of the Mandarin Oriental hotel. This will begin the outside leg of the trip to the Marina Bay shopping center. Although I did not stay at the Mandarin Oriental, I suppose its location is slightly better if you want to be a closer

title: Excellent
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont for the Singapore F1. Excellent room, excellent service. Highly recommend. Amazing view of track and great position in Singapore for any stay. Staff are very helpful. Rooms beautiful.

title: Fairytales at Fairmont Singapore
desc: Stayed multiple times Feb-April 2022. Sincere appreciation to the Fairmont Singapore team for providing a great stay with requests mostly fulfilled and expectations exceeded some of the times. It is clear that the new management team led by Mr Marcus Hanna, Mr Robert Strasser, Ms Jean Wong, Mr Alfie with Club Lounge Team Mr Amin (i.e. previously), Ms Syakirah, Mr Bronze, Mr Glen etc, showed that the place is only going to be even better run. The team was easily contactable and they were very responsive to requests and did their best to meet each and every one of them. The all-day refreshments, breakfast and evening canapes at the Lounge was great. Watch out for the mocktails and cocktails by the Lounge team as well as the wide range of TWG tea offerings. Furnishings in the

title: Enjoyed our Stay
desc: Staff were friendly and room clean. Great view from our window. Amenities were good and I enjoyed our stay. I had a broken foot and was on crutches so I was offered a wheelchair to use during my stay. I can‚Äôt tell you how grateful I was. Made my life so much easier

title: Exemplary Service
desc: Exemplary service. From the moment I stepped into the Fairmont the staff were amazing. Nothing was too much trouble. The room was superb and so so clean. Every amenity you could wish for. Room service and a special pillow delivered in minutes. Loved the ‚ÄòRoyal Service‚Äô button. Everyone was so helpful and courteous.

title: Awesome stay with excellence service from Pravin
desc: Excellent service by the hotel. Pravin from front desk was very friendly and made our check-in fuss-free and smooth. Seeing my infant at the reception, he called the team and made sure that the cot are in place with a nice baby amenity kit. We were impressed with the service by him and the rest of the Fairmont team. We had an awesome in room dining as well. Highly recommend the steak and club sandwich. Though, an area of improvement would be the sink doesn‚Äôt drain as well and the cabinet with the drinking tap have a faulty magnet which resulted in the cabinet being unable to close and the lights remained on. Other than those, which can be easily fixed, everything else was great! Will definitely return.

title: Great Stay As Always
desc: This was my fifth stay at the Fairmont Singapore since 2010 and it continues to be one of the best hotels I've ever stayed in. It was the first time I've stayed in a North Tower room, which was very spacious and comfortable. The view from the balcony towards the south was tremendous and included part of the F1 race course as well as the Singapore Flyer, Esplande and Marina Bay area. As with earlier trips I enjoyed the convenience of breakfast at Prego and the shopping/eating options at the attached Raffles City mall.

title: Clean, well located enjoyable experience.
desc: Clean room. Minor issues with in room water dispenser, but they gave us bottled water to make up for it. We were not there for F1, but got a room with F1 view! very excited about it - thx to the check in person for giving us this room. We also had a chocolate cake slice on arrival , very thougtful.

title: Excellent Stay and F1 View
desc: I had an excellent experience during my stay. I was allowed to have an early check in and late checkout. Being an Accor Plus member helped. Nespresso coffee machine and exclusive water (hot and cold) filter made a big difference. I used to stay in Orchard Road each time I go to Singapore but my recent experience with Fairmont made me changed my mind. I will be back for sure. Thank you so much, Fairmont Singapore team for an awesome experience.

title: Great location, very friendly staff
desc: We stayed at the Fairmont for the F1 Grand Prix. Despite the high occupancy rate the staff were very friendly and did a great job at tending to guests needs. We enjoyed our stay at the Fairmont. We would happily stay there again.

title: Most amazing view of the Grand Prix and A+ service
desc: We just wanted to thank the whole team at the Fairmont Singapore for a wonderful stay for the 2021 F1 Grand Prix. We enjoyed the Gold Harbourview room which had THE most amazing view of 60%+ of the track and we have to stay.. we were spoilt rotten. * Daily breakfast and the best omelette ever * Evening drinks and dinner in the lounge. Singapore Slings were a highlight. * We met some great guests and got into the spirit of the Grand Prix. * Grand Prix presents in our room including binoculars, chocolates, novelty helmet, His and her matching caps. * Early check-in at 11.30am * late checkout till 5pm and a very kind offer to stay for another happy hour. We have stayed at Fullerton, Marina Bay Sands and others‚Ä¶ but The Fairmont Singapore is truely the best of the best. A

title: Impeccable Service
desc: We have visited Fairmont Singapore countless times throughout the years (this hotel holds a lot of childhood memories for me), but this was our second visit after the pandemic. It also happened to be my husband‚Äôs birthday, and also our first time celebrating ‚Äúoutside‚Äù of home after the pandemic. We had intended to go for a short staycation just to relax and unwind for my husband‚Äôs birthday, but Shakira made our stay extra special, comfortable and memorable. Shakira‚Äôs impeccable service is the epitome of five-star hospitality. She is an extremely experienced, conscientious and thoughtful individual. She was so kind and helpful, patient yet efficient with all our requests. She even went the extra mile to plan a mini birthday surprise for my husband. Her thoughtful gestures made us

title: F1 Grand Prix
desc: We wish to Thank all the staff and especially Norman and the reservations team for organizing our wonderful stay during the F1 Grand Prix - we look forward to next year again. the view was the best in Singapore - and rooms new and smart Simon and family

title: Li Yang is the best :)
desc: Location is amazing, hospitality lounge is great facility as our flight is very late. Li Yang is an amazing receptionist , very helpful.He made our stay at fairmont hotel very enjoyable, gave us the best to tips to see the best of Singapore in few days

title: Mr Dene Dickson
desc: A most enjoyable stay. Very friendly and helpfull staff. Facilities, restaurants and service exceptional. Rooms were very well appointed and we had great views. Handy to shopping and other tourist spots. Thank you

title: Memorable 5 nights stay at Fairmont Singapore
desc: One of our best stay experiences in Singapore. Great hospitality, excellent food, comfortable rooms with a billion dollar view ! Special mention and thanks to Marcus Hanna, the Managing Director at Fairmont Singapore & Swiss√¥tel The Stamford, a personal handwritten welcome note from him and ensuring we had a comfortable stay made our stay even special. Another mention to Asa Tan, Assistant Manager Fairmont Singapore for patiently answering all our queries and recommending places to visit to make exploring Singapore interesting and worthwhile . Fairmont will be out first choice to recommend and to , in Singapore. Thanks again team Fairmont Singapore for making guest experiences special and memorable! Cheers ü•Ç

title: Very comfortable and great location
desc: I enjoyed my stay at the Fairmont. My accommodation was arranged by the organisers of the International Conference on Cohesive Societies which was held from 6-8 Sept on the 4th floor of the same building I was staying in, which was very convenient. I stayed on for three extra nights after the Conference. On the morning of Sunday 11th September, around 8am, I went to the lift on the 11th floor and found that it was not working. I decided to walk down the stairs (11 floors) for breakfast. When I reached the first floor I discovered the door to be locked. So I needed to climb back up 11 floors with the intention of returning to my room. I discovered at this stage, that the door from the stair-well back into Floor 11 was locked also. I did not have my cell-phone with me. I was

title: Great Stay & Location
desc: Amazing property, well located (centralise, convenient to shop and lots of food options, easy access to public transport - MRT/Bus) and friendly staff. We certainly had a pleasant and enjoyable stay here.

title: Excellent
desc: Pravin was really helpful. Excellent stay. Recommended. Location was superb. On top of mrt and very easy to go anywhere. View was nice harbour city view.... and formula 1. Excellent. Full of praise. Will come back!!

title: Mr
desc: Fairmont staff and facilities are truly first rate. Efficient with all requests and giving with a smile. Thank you staff from cleaners, maintenance, concierge, reception and anyone that we have encountered. We will be back. ü§óüëèü•≥ü•Ç

title: Home for a Week
desc: Great experience starting with check in by Jamie Huang, helpful concierge led by Mike Singh and Wei. Li in front desk also helpful as well as the ladies in Anti-Dote. I appreciated the can-do attitude and positivity to getting things done to my satisfaction from fixing the shower head and socket to simply arranging a pick up / delivery at concierge or a room key renewal at FO. Not a fan of buffet breakfasts generally but for a quick bite and an early morning business meeting - Prego worked well.

title: Easily the best location in Singapore
desc: This hotel is about 25minutes taxi ride from the airport and is just above City Hall MRT station so you can easily hop on a train to get around Singapore. The hotel is actually linked to the shopping department which gives you easy access to the basement food court and the food court located on level 3 should you wish to never leave this building however it is Singapore so I do recommend venturing out to try some of the local favourites if you have the time. Hotel is very clean and very well maintained. House keeping is super friendly, attentive and very helpful so do not be afraid to call her should you need anything. Check-out was a breeze as you can just fill in the small card and place your keys into the drop box located in the foyer so you don't actually need to line up

title: Worth the visit
desc: Well Located, very neat property and excellent breakfast. Easy access to the Raffles city mall. Very close to major sightseeing locations and the staff was very friendly and helped us with an early check in. Just a small suggestion to make sure availability of dining options post 11 PM

title: Nice and pleasant stay
desc: Nice and pleasant surprise stay for my kid's birthday staycation.. Good location with shopping malls, Mrt, eateries at your door step.. Really a nice hotel that can consider for your Singapore staycation as well taken care of by the staffs.

title: FABULOUS 50TH BIRTHDAY STAY
desc: On arrival we mentioned to Elvie receptionist (sorry if I've probably spelt wrong name beautiful smile and Bob haircut ) it was my husband's 50th birthday. Immediately she reacted with a warm smile and offered us a complimentary up graded room. Followed by complimentary chocolates and a Teddy bear. So chuffed we entered our room and wow was our response. Such a beautiful room comfortable bed and spacious the view over raffles hotel. The hotel was the perfect base attached to shopping mall and MRT underground. The hotel facilities food were excellent and on check out we were allowed to use the hospitality lounge to freshen up before our flight. Excellent stay and top notch service by every member of staff in particular Elvie a big thank you for make our stay even more

title: Great hotel!
desc: The staff at all levels delivered an impeccable service together with a smile. The quality of the rooms was very good especially the lovely beds! If you have access to their Gold lounge you will have a perfect place to enjoy breakfast or in the afternoon champagne and other drinks with a lovely buffet of warm and cold nibbles.

title: Very good stay.
desc: The staff made very sound welcome especially who welcome us at the entrance of Prego. I appreciate smile welcome from him. All electricity system, water supplying and hygiene system are very nice. It also very nice you have large room.

title: Everything is good
desc: Each morning before having the Breakfast at Prego restaurant, it's a pleasure to strat the day with the happiness of Ismail at the Prego's entrance. Quiet hotel and clean, good location, nice pool and fitness centre.

title: Excellent Staycation; Fairmont Gold is an Elevated Level of Service
desc: My stay at the Fairmont was pleasantly surprising and excellent. Despite us not contacting Fairmont beforehand that there was a special occasion, I was pleasantly with how our every need was taken care of. Having stayed at both the entry-level Fairmont room, and the Fairmont Gold experience, I thought it was worth the upgrade since the experience was much more personalised! Fairmont Gold is not just a lounge, but a different level of service compared to the entry-level Fairmont rooms. The staff (Syakirah) even remembered why I was in a rush and made sure to accommodate to my need whilst going the extra mile to provide additional amenities and even make a complimentary mocktail!

title: Great Stay
desc: We had an amazing stay at Fairmont Singapore. Very courteous and helpful staff. Great location and property. Only two feedbacks: 1. The rooms were not cold enough or the air conditioners were really slow. 2. Not enough food options for vegetarian people. Otherwise, a memorable experience!

title: Excellent Stay
desc: I loved my stay at the Fairmont. The staff are all so polite, professional, and friendly, and always went above and beyond in anything we needed. The hotel was clean and well maintained and we barely ever had to wait for the elevator, everything was very convenient. The room was perfect, with lots of space and again the housekeeping staff go above and beyond to maintain your room during your stay. We had a great view over Raffles. The hotel is in a great location with the MRT right next to you as well as heaps of food options around. It's a super convenient place to stay during your trip to Singapore. Overall one of the best hotel stays I've ever had and I would 100% recommend the Fairmont to anyone staying in Singapore

title: Amazing Staff & Service
desc: Thank you Fairmont Hotel for making my stay a wonderful experience. From the moment I stepped into the Hotel, I was greeted with smiles and kindness from all Staff present. I thoroughly enjoyed my short stay. Service with Excellence and the lovely elderly men working outside and also greeting all. Love you guys and I look forward to visiting and staying again.

title: Satisfied with my stay at Fairmont
desc: Second stay at Fairmont hotel and the second probably my best one! Before our stay, I have to go down to hotel check on the facilities for my wedding banquet and went to the front desk. Attended by Elvie, she assisted us through my 6 days stay and I am pleased to be serve by her. The hotel facilities is good and just only the views of my room are not too great ü§£

title: Well Located, Great Stay, Wonderful Food at Prego and at conference
desc: Fantastic stay at this hotel. The views are amazing. The best sleep that I have had - because of the luxurious bed at the hotel. The staff are courteous and the food is amazing! Prompt and personalized service from the reception (for room service, alarm setting and luggage storage with Concierge.

title: Excellent hotel
desc: We recently stayed here for five nights to celebrate a few occasions but especially my husband‚Äôs seventh birthday. He was given a delicious birthday cake and we had a very nice room in South Tower with lovely views. I would certainly recommend this hotel as the location is excellent and the staff were all very helpful and courteous.

title: Met my expectations
desc: The Fairmont is what you'd expect from a 5 star hotel: comfortable suite, good shower, excellent if overpriced food, helpful staff. But it's bland: not distinctively Singaporean and could be anywhere in the world. It's perfect as a business hotel but a tourist could find many more interesting places to stay.

title: Fantastic Experience
desc: My daughter and I stayed for 4 nights. The room was spacious and beautifully appointed. Our view was straight down on Raffles. The service and amenities were amazing. We were sad to leave. A truly memorable holiday.

title: Fantastic Guest Service!
desc: Really love our stay at Fairmont. Went there to celebrate my mum's birthday and requested for some birthday decoration and/or late check-out and they over-exceeded our requests by giving us extra birthday cake (it was a really nice chocolate cake!), fruit basket and a room with a really nice view (level 24, which is a high floor)! We went to the hotel before noon (because we had a lunch appt) and thought we will just drop our baggage at the concierge since check-in was only at 3pm but they told us our room was already ready and we could check-in early! So many wows for this hotel. Love talking to the concierge staff and the bellman uncles who are always friendly and make us feel welcomed whenever we return to the hotel. The only downside was the aircon in our room - it wasn't

title: Excellent location, extremely clean, great service!
desc: We were on a family trip recently, and had the pleasure of staying at The Fairmont. It's very well located, extremely clean, and provides great service. Check-in was a seamless experience. Their sustainable and environment friendly initiatives are excellent - especially the drinking water taps in the room, eliminating the use of plastic bottles :)

title: excellent choice for trip with elderly
desc: it was a delight to have the hotel helped us arrange for a connecting rooms because we were staying with our elderly parents. locationwise it is so convenient to have it integrated with the raffles city mall, with supermarket and food outlets on the basement. there's also a foodcourt at 4th floor of the mall i think.

title: I wish I stayed there longer
desc: The Fairmont Singapore hotel is absolutely stunning. The room had a massive bed (I would assume king or super king), the interiour was classy, super comfortable and in great style. The bathroom was luxurious with separate shower and a bath. The whole room was very well thought through and made convenient and easy for guests. The location of the hotel is right in the city with everything you need close by. The room service was easy and really quick. Loved my short stay, I wish it could have been longer :)

title: Staycay
desc: Great customer service. Checking in was a smooth one. There was someone greeting me and directing me to the registration counter. The reception that helped me checked in was super sweet! She wrote me a card and gave a box of chocs. Super clean hotel and quiet place. Just tad bit disappointed on no complimentary parking and one of the room I booked was delay by 1.5hrs. Also, the swimming pool was under maintenance and the pool was extremely crowded which made me not use the pool.

title: Best stay best hospitality best happy vibes just home away from home
desc: I used to stay at orchard at four seasons as I thought it‚Äôs the best but when we stayed at fairmont I felt it was the most most wonderful experience of my life . From excellentttttt staff at the reception, concierge , entry and house keeping to the whole hotel Vibes made our trip so so memorable and comfortable. I feel it was one of my best stays in 43 years of my travel . Mr Robert and heng were so so helpful and sweet and actually the whole staff . Rooms are super excellent. I just feel they can just make one place like an open garden that‚Äôs it . Would onlt come and stay in fairmont from next time as my daughter is studying here and will highely recommend everyone to stay here

title: North tower super old. Worst Fairmont I‚Äôve ever stayed.
desc: North tower is really old. There is noise generated by AC which affects sleep in north tower. Looks like an 3 star hotel. I‚Äôve stayed in many Fairmont before, Bermuda, Beijing, etc and this one is def the worst. No Lelabo as shampoo neither.

title: Luxurious rooms and great service
desc: Rooms are extremely spacious and felt luxurious, with mechanical blinds and an in-room water dispenser! Service was great and plenty of breakfast options. Great location in the city as well. Pool was undergoing maintenance when I was there so not the most ideal, but otherwise I really enjoyed my stay here!

title: A Gem within a Gem
desc: Fairmont Singapore ticked all the boxes for a great hotel experience. From seamless check-in and check-out, to a handsome spacious room that was spotlessly clean; from a great location to efficient and quick service!!! We thought we couldn‚Äôt ask for more and we were pleasantly surprised to find a gem within this gem of a hotel. We‚Äôve thought that Singapore was all about precision and efficiency, but we were mighty glad to find the people in Fairmont to be warm and friendly, best exemplified by Mr A-Sa Tan. We first met him when he brought our luggage to our room and was surprised to find that he was in-fact the assistant manager for guest services - no airs, neither too solicitous nor snotty. He was simply naturally friendly and helpful all throughout our stay, guiding us where

title: Finally found my Favorite hotel in Singapore!!
desc: World class service with personal touch. They go to great lengths to make sure you feel at home. Special shout out to Li Yang for making sure we‚Äôre all well taken care of! Will definitely come back for my next Singapore trip üëçüëçüëçüëçüëç

title: Fabulous stay at The Fairmont Singapore
desc: 4.5 years since our last visit and we have been dreaming of the day we could return to The Fairmont Singapore and it did not disappoint! ALL ACORR member and we stayed in a gold suite on the 26th floor - stunning room that fit 2 adults and 2 young children very comfortably and the views were stunning. We could not fault the service from the staff. James checked us in, arranged the transfer of a bag we had left at our previous hotel and could not have been more welcoming. Our son‚Äôs loved the Fairmont Lions he gave them and we appreciated he looked for us later in the visit to give these to them. Richard and the other staff in the lobby including the concierge team were so helpful. Nothing was too much trouble for them and their help with local knowledge and convenient ways to

title: Great accommodations and Location
desc: Excellent Service and Restaurants. Bed was comfortable and the Air conditioning was fantastic. The huge bathtub was great for a couple. I loved being able to go out on the balcony and look at the city. The Hotel is attached to a mall Raffles and is has a lot of restaurants and shops and a huge mall. Lots to chose from to eat. The City Hall MRT is steps away and you never have to leave the mall. It was all very convenient for a first timer in Singapore. I highly recommend this hotel for its location and accommodations

title: Far too much fancy for business travel.
desc: If you travel business and don‚Äôt want to waste your time by useless hotel procedures, then you are wrong in this place. Everything is taking very long by trying to make this an unforgettable experience, which you don‚Äôt need as a business traveler. You want fast checkin, pick a coffee and some food in the morning fast and maybe have an easy beer in the evening. Not more not less.

title: Ruth Parasol
desc: We were very happy & impressed with the service, accommodation & meals. The position of the hotel allows easy access to train & car transport as well as shopping centres next to the hotel. The best thing about our stay was the very helpful staff especially Bern & Narj.

title: Very good business hotel
desc: Stayed here in May for participating at an event in the hotel and business meetings. It a good option and next to several restaurants and shopping including at Chijmes next door. Breakfast was decent albeit with limited options for vegans. The front office and bell desk staff were very helpful. Recommended.

title: Stellar Service!
desc: Stellar service! My partner made plans to celebrate our anniversary here and the Fairmont team went out of their way to help him. It was incredible! Very very special thanks to Li Yang (who went above and beyond to ensure we got the room with a gorgeous view) and Concierge Mike who helped put the plan together. Would also like to extend our thanks to the team we met during our stay: Bernard, David, Ann Teo, Mike & Beren. Very very well done and thank you for making our stay so special.

title: Memorable personal experience
desc: My wife and I had a memorable staycation at Fairmont. We were greeted by Miss Amanda Ng upon arrival. She selected a room with excellent view for us. She even called later to check out whether all things are in order. At Asian Market Cafe we were served by Miss Mao . When she heard that my coffee tasted a bit sour, she immediately had it replaced with a new cup freshly brewed from the machine. The gentleman at the concierge gave my granddaughter a Fairmont doll, she was so happy the whole night. It‚Äôs a staycation with great personal experience. Thanks to all the Fairmont staffs and especially Miss Amanda Ng and Miss Mao.

title: Fantastic Service!
desc: Stayed here on business as had a number of meetings in their business centre. Rooms were large and well maintained. Service was exceptional throughout the stay. Breakfast in the Italian themed restaurant was varied and plentiful, as was the Asian Market for lunch. Also some great cocktails in the Antidote Bar just off the lobby. Would definitely stay again.

title: Good Location& Helpful Staff
desc: Easy access to facilities, shopping, transports and everything else! Kudos to the helpful staff all the way from receptions, concierge, restaurants and housekeeping! Keep up the great work! will stay there again next time.

title: Great staff and hospitality
desc: The staff was very polite and helpful. Pravin and Ace really supported and took personal care for me. Looking forward to come back again. Only one point of improvement- please inform the guests before carrying out maintenance work so as to prepare for the noise.

title: Fabulous Fairmont
desc: This was our second stay at the Fairmont Singapore and hopefully not the last! ( luckily for us we are only a 5hr flight away from W. Australia.) The staff are smiling, accomodating, curtious, helpful. Check in & check out was good. The room has been clean both this trip and our last visit in 2020 just at the start of the pandemic. Very good amenities in the room and also being able to order and use the sports wear etc was a bonus and a lovely service. Bed & pillow very comfortable. We were lucky enough to have a harbour view room with the most fantastic view. I will miss waking up to that every morning. The staff even delivered a birthday cake up to our room for my husband‚Äôs birthday. Hotel is in a great area, 5 mins to MRT, a great shopping mall, I didn‚Äôt find any need to go

title: Really good place to stay and enjoy
desc: I have a chance to visit Fairmont Singapore and also use a lot of facilities in hotel, everything was good !! Has attached to a mall with a really good food court and a short walk to a subway station.

title: Good without being great
desc: The hotel location is excellent. The staff were friendly and attentive. Rooms were quite good. Only negative was building works at breakfast which meant you had breakfast with jackhammering! The pool area was nice and the gym was good. It was close to chimes which has nice restaurants.

title: Great view and very family & Muslim friendly
desc: A beautiful staycation with family. Family friendly. Muslim friendly. Pool waters was super duper cold. Unfortunately hotels does not provide complimentary parking ticket for guests despite a 4 day stay. Great balcony view. Love the bathtub. Good spread at breakfast.

title: Great hotel with good service and location
desc: Great stay overall. Check in and check out was seamless. Response from housekeeping was prompt. Room was spacious and bed was comfortable. Didn't like the mini bar concept where items will be automatically charged upon removal from mini bar. There were no space to keep our personal stuff in the mini bar. Condition of headboard was quite bad too. It looked moldy but hotel claimed it was just discoloration.

title: Singapore with family June 2022
desc: Perfect experience. Stayed 3 nights with wife and 2 young children. Rooms were large, modern and had a great view of MBS and the bay. Staff were accommodating and courteous. Breakfast was split into two separate restaurants which meant the spread wasn‚Äôt visually as large. Kids loved the pancakes and waffles! Proximity to shopping centers was a big bonus. Will definitely stay again. Thank you to Jean, Norman and Pinky for their patience and service.

title: Reliable and Convenient
desc: If your looking for a place to stay at that is conveniently located, do consider the Fairmont. Service is good, rooms and amenities are well maintained, food is good. For breakfast, I did prefer the Asian option. Hit's the spot.

title: Difficult Times Even For A Luxury Hotel
desc: Although borders are gradually reopening, my wife and I decided to continue with our local staycations to celebrate her birthday. We opted for 3 such stays and Fairmont Singapore is our third. We have stayed here regularly especially when staycations were the rage back in 2020 and 2021 because locals could not travel outside Singapore. However club rooms were not available back then and this is the first time we get to experience the Gold Lounge again after the hotel has fully reopened to guests after it has relinquished being as a dedicated quarantine facility. We stayed from 21 to 23 June 2022 and we were given Room 2337. The view of this room is slightly different (better) from the ones we had stayed in the last 2 years. As an Accor Gold member and a regular guest

title: Very nice hotel in a great location
desc: Great location, attached to a mall with a really good food court and a short walk to a subway station. Staff are very attentive and diligent. Only drawback to the hotel is the breakfast which isn't really 5 star.

title: Very good hotel! :)
desc: The location was brilliant. The room was very clean . The staff were very nice especially for Ms.Elvie the guest relation manager was very helpful , quick assist and deeply understand what the customer wanted. For Mr.Ilham the check-in staff was very nice with his very good service mind, he help us to show and match the best room with very good manners . They both gave us very excellent service, we really have a nice time during we stayed here. About food the morning breakfast was delicious and have many choices. We recommend this hotel for everyone! Will come back again soon. ;)

title: Fairmont Singapore hotel
desc: Fairmont Singapore has been second home for us not only because of the room location but specially the Service of the staffs who Never fail us especially now when we came across some booking problem due to unexpected medical problem of my sister they Gladly assist us and so as to make Our stay easy & comfortable especially to mention Ms Elvie Vaflor who helps us and treated us like a friend. Staying here is highly recommendable Never fails us

title: The Fairmont is very nice, will stay again.
desc: A lovely hotel. The rooms were beautiful and well appointed. The staff were friendly and accommodating. Very central location, across the road from Raffles Hotel and connected internally to a very nice shopping mall with a great food court.

title: Love the Fairmont. Highly recommended.
desc: Excellent service. Very personal. Lovely rooms and great turn down service. Great views and the club room food drink and service was awesome. Felt welcomed from the time we arrived until the time we left. They let us have late check out which was much appreciated

title: well located, Good stay
desc: I have met with Ms Elvie of Front desk. I have stayed more than once at Fairmont, i must say i am very impressed with your great customer service. Ms Elvie is very professional and really gives her best at her job. She makes one feel at ease, really goes all the way for customers.

title: Poor service, poor cleanliness and room was dusty.
desc: Poor experience at check-in counter, it took almost 30mins and we have a infant with us. Gift vouchers was already emailed to reservation team way before check-in however check-in process still takes a long time. Upon reaching the room baby cot was not there, I called up room service and the tone that the staff response to me was not pleasant. They took about 15mins to get the cot send to our room. Location is great but I will never go back to Fairmont or recommend anyone for a stay.

title: SUPERB STAY WITH GREAT STAFF
desc: Stayed at Fairmont for 3 days and the service was phenomenal. Food served in the gold lounge was good. Check in was smooth and easy. Hotel located in the heart of the town with literally everything underneath you. The staff at Fairmont were great! Especially at Fairmont Gold! Everyone was attentive and friendly, they make you feel like home. Thank you Firdaus for taking such good care of us!

title: Everything is amazing
desc: Perfect for those who want an amazing view of the harbor. Check in and check out was swift. Rooms are well maintained no smell at all the concierge were very helpful and useful and knowledgeable. Front desk staff are very easy to communicate especially Ms Amanda who helped us with our reservations.

title: Few Hiccups but Thanks to good staff
desc: Stayed here with other travel group friends. We booked separately through accor app, or third party (OTA). I booked the hotel through accor app as I'm silver member. Payment didn't go through but no one follow up with me until I take initiative to asked in email about my booking confirmation. Room was not ready when I arrived and Elvie (the front office) told me that the housekeeping still preparing for extra bed as I booked for 3 pax, but I told her I don't need the extra bed as my 3rd person won't be staying overnight but he will join me at lounge. Elvie asked me to go lounge first while waiting. She collected my deposit of $100, but havent issue receipt yet. When room is "ready", one of staff in lounge passed me key and again asked for deposit. I told him that I already did.

title: The amazing fairmont singapore
