desc: Fairmont Singapore didn‚Äôt fail my expectation. From the smoothest check in process with the very helpful front desk person Amanda Ng, we are up to our room in no time. Concierge service and room amenities are exemplary. The magnificient harbor views from our room was spectactular. I can spend the entire day watching the harbor.

title: Had an excellent wedding staycation here!
desc: Had an amazing time here! Arrived straight from our wedding in our gown and suit and the staff took great care of us for our entire stay! Stayed in the Gold King Harbour room, and enjoyed excellent views both at our room, and at the lounge. The staff at the lounge were also great at helping us with all our requests, and was a great place to just relax in the evenings and mornings. Special thanks to the staff who helped us out during our stay; Lydia, Firdaus, Howard, Syakirah, Zhi Xin, Nigel, Rusyaidi, Rachel, and Caroline.

title: Superb Birthday Staycation
desc: This is my second time staying at Fairmont Singapore. This time was to celebrate my birthday and it was another wonderful stay. The bed and pillows were super comfy and love the amenities provided. (Especially the sports attire and sports shoes that most other hotels wouldn‚Äôt have provided) Thank you Fairmont for the specially-prepared birthday cake and chocolates! That was indeed a very warm welcome :) Would like to commend the staffs at Fairmont gold lounge for their exceptional service. The environment was very relaxing and the drinks made by the staffs were so fantastic. The staffs were also very welcoming and attentive.. Thank you! :) Would also like to commend front desk staffs; Ryan during check in and Claudia during check out. Claudia made sure to check on our stay

title: Fantastic stay!
desc: Had a great 10 day stay at The Fairmont which was made extra special by the staff in The Gold Lounge on level 25. They could not do enough for us and were always so very helpful - cheery, welcoming and friendly - they really made our holiday one to remember. We cannot thank you enough - Lydia, Fridaus, Howard, Syakirah, Nigel, Marcus, Rusyaidi, Caroline and Rachel. You were all amazing, thank you once again! Andrew & Kate

title: Excellent Customer Service
desc: Stayed in FAIRMONT GOLD HARBOUR VIEW ROOM for a night to celebrTe our 30th wedding annivesary. All theway from the check in reception, housekeeping, Gold Lounge till check out, the service is immaculate. Greatly enjoyed my stay. Really enjoyed the company of Mr Firdaus Rahmat who is the Assistant Fairmont Gold Manager. He shows professionlism in his job and ever so friendly with guests. Not to forget Howard too who made 3 special cocktails to celebrate my wedding anniversary. Greatly appreciated.

title: Mrs Jenny and Stephanie Jap
desc: We checked in at Fairmont hotel in Singapore and we were so impressed with how friendly and professional the front desk staff was. Her name was Claudia, she was patiently helping us on the request for the connecting rooms because we had small children. I work in the hotel industry so I know what is the real service they provide for and Claudia delivers the hotel service very well. Thank you and we are looking forward to coming back in the future.

title: Perfect weekend getaway.
desc: Perfect location to all the famous sights in Singapore. We were a family of 4 and the rooms were spacious with spectacular views. The room had great extras such as a filtered water tap, fancy toiletries and block out curtains. Huge supermarket underneath with lots of dining options. Easy check in and was well looked after by the staff.

title: Perfect Stay
desc: room is spacious, excellent location! City hall MRT is at walking distance, Raffles mall is connected to the hotel, so very convenient for us with kids, easy to find anything next to the hotel, and surely easy to find good food too

title: Great short weekend stay
desc: Room was clean & big! Amenities were conveniently located. Staff were all well presented & attentive to our request. Breakfast buffet spread filled our tummy to the maximum. Hotel's gym facility has kept us fit during our stay.

title: FAIRMONT HOTEL IS AMAZING
desc: The hotel is in a perfect location, the food and beverage is excellent. I suggest booking a Fairmont Gold room so you can access the Gold Lounge for breakfast and 5pm canapes/drinks. Fairmont has amazing views (book harbour), great bed and pillow, great shower, great breakfast at Prego, indoor access to shops to stay cool, super friendly staff. Ask for Elvie to look after you.

title: A must try Good Experience!!
desc: It‚Äôs a PAWCATION! Paw happy hooman happy. Nice View! Good location. But Paw got a bit disappointed, run out of snack, suggest to provide Paw snack even with charges is fine, we missed consider that the hotel did not provide any. The room should do deep cleaning on carpet. But Overall is a good experience, compare to the other PAWCATION hotel we had experienced, we‚Äôll rate Fairmont better for its services and accommodations experience.

title: Pleasant stay
desc: We had a pleasant stay at Fairmont with the family . The gold lounge team were excellent . exceptional, , attentive , proactive , polite and professional , especially Fidaus ,Glenn , Howards and others , Jean the manager n Ian ( from the main lobby ) made us feel totally warmed and welcomed . The way they treated and served everyone really exceeded my expectations. Location - - fantastic , above the City Hall MRT Room. - spacious and clean Bed/ pillow - comfortable Amenity - Full range Food - International/ special dietary upon request . We definitely recommend to friends and come back again .

title: Great service!
desc: Would like to express my appreciation to the staff of Fairmont especially Zerhern who assisted me in the checkout process. I was waiting for my turn to do a checkout at the counter when he took the initiative to assist by explaining to me about the express checkout. Thank you very much!

title: No complimentary parking
desc: The only hotel which doesn't provide complimentary parking. When checking out from our rooms, Li Yang, at the front desk, informed that my room category does not provide complimentary parking. Never coming back to this hotel. Not even 3-star quality.

title: Staycation
desc: I love Fairmont Singapore! I bring a long 2 toddler with my wife and mom in a room. Still feel very comfort in this spacy room. Front desk offer me baby amenities and baby box as well. Overall we enjoy our stay here.

title: Faulty AC, but good lounge
desc: The aircon in my room did not work very well and we were left super warm throughout the night and left the place sweating. Terribly unpleasant. However, the lounge was the saving grace with amazing staff and a good place to hang out with friends.

title: Fairmont Singapore
desc: Stay at Fairmont is great, I especially would like to thank Elvie from the reception, who helped us finding the room with harbour view at Gold Fairmont floor, her effeort is really appreciated and rated 5 stars for Elvie Javin from concierge is also very helpful in making booking for the good dinner at a very short time All staff from the lounge are nice and helpful, Lydia, Firdaus, Howard, Syarifah, Marcus, Nigel, Caroline and Rachel Thank you very much

title: Fairmont? More like Supermont!
desc: My husband and I came to Singapore to see my best friend for the first time since the pandemic, and also as an early celebration of my 30th birthday. We were introduced to the Fairmont by our friend Nadia who is a presenter from Singapore, who actually covered the F1 from the Fairmont rooftop! We could not have asked for a more wonderful experience. We were upgraded upon arrival, and every interaction we had with any staff member was so easy, friendly and accommodating (thank you Pravin, Claudia, and everyone else!). We had so many questions, every day and they were always answered respectfully and warmly. The rooms are beautiful, the pool area is wonderful, the breakfast is expansive, offering both a buffet and al a carte menu. I'm not sure we will be able to stay here

title: Disappointing Room Reservations
desc: We wanted to book two connecting rooms for one weekend night stay this week. As it was a last minute decision as we have been gifted tickets for an event near the hotel, we immediately called Room Reservations on Monday morning at 9am. Lines were busy but I was asked to leave my number and they will call back. A few moments later around near 10am, Norman called me back and emphasized that the hotel was almost full which I had expected as it was a last minute. I was not being picky I told him and I merely wanted to know if there were 2 connecting rooms available. He said there is and went on to emphasized again on the price hike due to recovery of tourism and that my previous price package may be obsolete. I told him I understood and it has never been a price issue for us even

title: Bad Stay - Faulty A/C and Passive Staff
desc: Booked a Fairmont Gold Harbour View Room which unfortunately had a issues with the air-conditioning. Staff were passive and did not engage me until I requested for a resolution. Fairmont Gold lounge was good but that was the sole highlight of a very bad stay. Do not recommend to book unless you wish to experience the so-called hospitality of a 5* hotel that doesn't understand what it means to be a hotel.

title: Singapore revisited! First stay at The Fairmont
desc: We enjoyed our stay at The Fairmont. The location is good with the shopping centre and eateries nearby. The young man at the Concierge was very helpful to us on several occasions! Our room was of a good size, obviously not in the renovated area. But , the view from our room was superb. Soap and other amenities were quickly replenished. Sometimes we were left to queue at breakfast, maybe they were short staffed. We loved the breakfast choices. We qualified for the Gold Club and the staff there were very friendly. Compare to other hotels that we have stayed in Singapore the food choices were not good! All food should be served hot or at least warm. Curry puffs, spring rolls etc served soft and lukewarm! My husband enjoyed his desserts there. A few drinks such as tomato juice,

title: Our home away from Home!
desc: We have patronised the property for over 30 years sometimes 3 to 5 times a year. enjoyed the warm hospitality! The staff at the lounge, Howard, Lydia, Firdaus, Syakirah, Zhi Xin, Nigel, Marcus, Rachel, and Caroline made the stay memorable. Reservations were ably handled by Ms. Jean our long time friend at the hotel!

title: 50 Years of Friendship
desc: What a fabulous 5 nights we had at the Fairmont celebrating 50 years of friendship with my girlfriend. We Especially would like to mention Elvie who went above and beyond to make our stay exceptional. Ensuring we knew of all the benefits available to us and her friendly and caring nature was most lovely as she greeted us everyday of our stay. The hotel was a credit to the staff and as stated Elvie was highly regarded by ourselves in her professionalism and thoughtfulness towards us throughout our stay.

title: Fairmont Staycation
desc: Our family had a really good time during our recent stay at Fairmont. The service team including the front desk, house keeping at Fairmont Lounge were very patient, and attentive. Many thanks to Royal Service team for their prompt response on house keeping issues, as well as the Fairmont fit wear provided. The cocktails concocted in-house was really refreshing. Thanks Howard, Lydia, Firdaus, Skakirah, Nigel, Marcus, Rachel and the rest of the team, for making our staycation so memorable.

title: Fairmont Singapore is the epitome of elegance and comfort.
desc: I was very happy with my stay at Fairmont Singapore. We were only there for 3 days as we were transiting through Singapore on the way to the Maldives. I was very happy with the staff and manager on the day we checked out. She was very helpful with assisting us with out baggage and ensuring we were always taken care of. The room was beautiful and well designed, this reflected Fairmonts high standard. I was extremely happy when I came back into the hotel the second night and someone left a cake as I stated it was my anniversary with my girlfriend. Small touches like that made me feel comfortable and welcome.

title: Great stay with superb views
desc: Booked the Deluxe HarbourFront rooms for our annual stay at The Fairmont. We had amazing harbour views and saw some helicopter stunts right outside our rooms (due to some airshow/NDP rehearsal). The hotel rooms and facilities were recently renovated/refurbished. Cleanliness and service from staff was great and check-in/check-out was fuss-free. We had the hotel breakfast and it is okay. The hotel is well located with plenty of food and shopping options right below the hotel at Raffles City and in the surrounding malls. Overall, a very satisfying stay and keep up the good work Fairmont! We look forward to our next stay with you.

title: Treated so wonderfully by the staff
desc: Kudos to Marcus, Firdaus, Rachel and everybody else at the Gold Lounge for a wonderful experience! It was a beautiful place, with absolutely delicious food and drinks! I'll not forget the Mimosa concocted for me!

title: Conference Short Stay
desc: I booked the Fairmont Hotel, as I was attending a conference - which was being held on the 4th Floor. When I arrived, I was pleasantly surprised to be given an upgraded room - which was gratefully received. The room was lovely - and even included a balcony! The room also had other lovely features such as a cold/hot water tap (for boiling water for hot drinks) and filtered water for cold drinks. There was also a reusable bottle to fill with cold water during your stay. Loved the inclusion of a Nespresso machine. When I requested additional Decaf capsules - it was not an issue. The bed was super comfortable, and loved the level of comfort of the room overall. The Fairmont is in a great location, a few steps away from the Raffles City shopping centre, and easy walk to the

title: Enchanted ü§© Fairmont
desc: I was attending a conference and straddling a demanding work schedule. Eugene was at the reception and he had gone an extra mile to ensure my stay was pleasant and fuss free. It was a delightful experience to be served.

title: Excellent location and great facilities
desc: We were very happy with our stay. We were particularly impressed with the filtered water tap and glass bottle available in the room. All staff were very helpful, especially Pravin at the reception desk. We also appreciated having access to the hospitality lounge so we could have a shower before our late night flight.

title: Aircon broke down in the middle of the night, breakfast staff was rude
desc: The aircon broke down in the middle of the night. My family and I were drenched in sweat and had an extremely uncomfortable and unpleasant night. The male staff at the restaurant WAS EXTREMELY RUDE. I bought my staycation package via Klook. He checked his records and didn‚Äôt find a record for my breakfast booking. He could have just said nicely and asked me for my Klook receipt but repeatedly said ‚ÄúNo booking made, no booking made‚Äù. He finally shut up when I told him I ALREADY PAID and showed him my Klook receipt. I have NEVER been treated with such direspect over breakfast at ANY OTHER HOTEL I‚Äôve ever stayed at. Such a disappointment as we came back to Fairmont after such a wonderful stay previously. Will probably spend my next staycation elsewhere.

title: Below average
desc: Not worth the high price , food for vegetarians suck , cleaning not done properly, location is good , breakfast venue looks like a train station , rooms were spacious but not well decorated , looked like 3 star hotels rooms . They need to up their level

title: Extremely small DOUBLE bed
desc: the services of the staff were good. however the size of the beds definitely cant fit 4 of us when the website told us this room is for 4 person. definitely not suitable for family. the said double bed is only super single. not even enough to fit 2 adults, how can u call it double?

title: Overall Great Experience but Not Recommending Willow Stream Spa
desc: I was well-greeted by Asa-Tan again! It is our second stay (and this time) to celebrate my husband's birthday. Such as joy to see Asa - he is truly polite and make us feel very welcome! To our surprise, he remembered our room preference and given us a similar room from our previous stay and it was much much better (due to the angle of the bed). Overall, our stay was great - staff greeted us everywhere we go and attended to our requests promptly. We miss the cranberry juice though - we enjoyed it during the last visit. Alas, not everything was perfect. I gave my husband a Spa treat at Willow Stream Spa. Communications with staff Siti was not pleasant from the start. We arrived at the spa with a wrong idea of the spa package price as it was wrongly provided by staff Siti.

title: Thank you Eugene!
desc: Thank you for the cake! It was delicious! You really made my day. The requested was a last minutes and I knew might not able arrange but Eugene still assured me he will try. An hours later received a called from Eugene and said arrangement done.

title: An Awesome Staycation!
desc: One of the "sought-after" 5 star hotel's within the business belt. Spacious room choices with options upgrading to their Presidential Suite & other executive suites. View is breathtakingly awesome on both South & North towers respectively. Hotel staffs from the doorman, reception till room service are exceptionally awesome and welcoming! Would definately return again! #1130 6/2022

title: Best recovery action. KUDOS to Fairmont Ops team.
desc: This was a delayed review, my husband and I decided to stay in Fairmont Singapore on our anniversary... the initial experience was really unpleasant at Pergo. However, after our feedback to the duty Manager Fahida, (not sure how to spell her name), she was absolutely understanding and manage one of the best recovery action for us. Subsequently, the GM, Emmanuel, found out about our situation and he came personally to have a chat with us to understand more about our feedback. He invited us to Antidotes, one of the resturant in Fairmont and we had a wonderful experience there. So thank you Fahida and Emmanuel for making an effort to keep the standard of Fairmont so high. And making sure that all residents are well taken care off. Awesome work Fairmont! We will be back for sure!

title: Very pleasant stay at Fairmont SG
desc: Enjoyed my stay at Fairmont, very good deal for Friends of Fairmont. Very clean hotel, superb service, smooth check out assisted by Li Yang. Overall, a very pleasant stay for me and my family. Definitely will come back

title: Awesome stay and great service
desc: We had a wonderful stay at Fairmont to celebrate our daughter‚Äôs birthday. A pet friendly hotel where we can bring along our dogs for the staycation. Pet amenities and food menu are available for them. Definitely an enjoyable stay. Claudia Tan ensured a smooth booking to checking in all the way to checking out. Great service üëçüëç

title: MINUS RATING
desc: It went bad from the start bell boy not bothered to help with bags to the point that taxi driver was shocked too but as he was elderly I did not expect or want him to lift 3 bads of 25kg, come to reception and at this point instead of welcoming people the 2 girls were there to literally dispose of anyone at the desk in the fastest amount of time, they did not smile not once. Even when you do a blood test people doing it are usually welcoming but here it was basically give me your money here are the keys now bugger off. It's called hospitality and if you cannot be hospitable enough to greet an person and smile then I suggest go work in a morgue. To top it off walk in the room , what do I find, used slippers, used toilet, used towels , soap, and bins with rubbish. I'd like to

title: Excellent fun trip !
desc: Had an absolutely fantastic time in Singapore. We had visited antidote and pregnant and found the food and drinks to be one of best in Singapore Particularly want to mention Mr Robert who helped us so much with our taxi Went out of his way to help us given that there is shortage of taxis in Singapore currently. Shows his hospitality and dedication.

title: Fairmont did not disappoint at all
desc: Fantastic, big and clean room, yummy in-room dining, and great customer service. It was to celebrate my partner's birthday hence it was a very pleasent experience for both of us. From the check-in to check out, every process was seamless and easy. However, the prices of the in-room dining menu is rather expensive however fortunately, we were given $100 dining credits hence it came in handy. And if you want to order, have the nasi goreng, it was very good. Overall, it was a wonderful stay.

title: Good Club Lounge but Terrible Construction Noise Throughout the Day
desc: Good a) Good club lounge with great service b) Area is excellent. Directly above the MRT and shopping malls Bad a) Construction noise throughout the day starting from 9.00 or 9.01 AM until the end of a typical working day (unable to get any decent sleep during the daytime and was woken up at 9 AM). Staff should not have allocated such room when I booked the GOLD King Suite. b) Welcome drink coupons were sent to my room late at night or middle of the night as I only saw the coupons at my doorstep in the morning. It's meaningless to provide welcome drink when guests are going to check out c) Bathroom gets flooded after each shower due to poor workmanship and the water temperature is difficult to control. Poor quality / mediocre workmanship of the fittings Overall, not a

title: Good Stay
desc: The staff were very friendly and helpful. They were able to accommodate our requests very well. The air-conditioning was a bit cold. And the TV sometimes had intermittent signals (no sounds and blurred images at times).

title: Best club lounge team
desc: Our family stay at Fairmont for the June school holiday. The most memorable part of our stay is the friendly service provided by the Fairmont Gold Lounge team. Out of the several hotel club access we have experienced so far, Fairmont Gold Lounge team tops it all. Thank you for making our kids smile and treating them to all their favorite treats everyday.

title: Decent Hotel Excellent location Bad housekeeping below average breakfast
desc: visited Fairmont.. property getting dated but good room size. Serious downside was housekeeping. Perhaps their standards of cleanliness have taken a toll. They don‚Äôt refill towels you have to call remind and request at front desk for the same. they don‚Äôt replace our wash used glasses. keep unclean glasses back in closet. really sad state of affairs. pool side was ok best part was it is connected to mall which is excellent in convenience.

title: Very good and friendly staff with a very fantastic room view
desc: Enjoyed our stay esp because of the assistance of Miss Elvie Vaflor from front office. Plus the harbour view room is the best room in all of Singapore if you want to have wonderful pictures all day. Great location, great staff, great view = perfect combination!

title: Fairmont Gold Lounge Singapore
desc: What a wonderful experience. Can‚Äôt praise all the staff enough at the Fairmont Gold Lounge Singapore. Nothing was ever difficult or to much trouble. The whole team did an exceptional job. Thank you all for making our holiday a truly memorable one.

title: Clean and nice stay
desc: Room is clean and nice. Location is central and convenient to bay area. Was expecting 2 double bed but turn out to be 2 twin beds. Hotel staff manage to get a king with extra bed for us which is good enough for our stay. However, toilet lock is not working.

title: Feels like home
desc: Spend two nights at Fairmont in their Harbour View room. I had a really good first impression on their rooms. Spacious and thoughtfully renovated with a luxurious filtered tap that dispenses ice cold water or hot water in an instant! The view was definitely to die for! We were glad that we took the Gold Lounge access rooms. The evening spread was beyond our expectations. Breakfast at Prego on our first day was good with a nice spread of semi-buffet, it got a little crowded after awhile. on the second day we‚Äôve tried having our breakfast at the Gold lounge, and i must say although it lacks the variety, the atmosphere and privacy you‚Äôll get from the gold lounge is unbeatable. What makes the lounge different from any other hotel out there was definitely the staff! Each and

title: Good stay at Fairmont SG
desc: Really good hospitality and professional. Alfie and Ryan are particularly helpful for my check in and check out. Very thoughtful and reminds me of all details. The room is new, smart tech, facing Raffles Hotel with an excellent view. I asked for help withy he sink stopper and the service (at midnight) was imminent. Doorman also eager to help. All good and recommended

title: Rooms for improvement....
desc: We booked the Cocomelon staycation suite package last week. We are a family of 2 adults , 1 infant and 2 children. The total pax was communicated to hotel and was accepted upon booking. On the way to the hotel, the car park lacked the signboard of indicating to the Hotels. There is no direct lift to hotel lobby except from the shopping area. The check in was a little slow as needed to verify our Identity cards. Upon going up, one of access cards is unable to open the room door. The package had the welcome small delights, the collectible and the balloons. Made some calls to operator as missing some amenities like the slippers, towels and dental kit for my children. And then while washing my hands in the basin, The basin water was choked. Took the maintenance sometime to come to

title: Great Hotel
desc: The hotel is centrally located and accessible on the metro and major shopping centres. The hotel was clean, well managed and I couldnt think of anything that was a negative. Services, meals etc at the hotel were excellent.

title: e rooms have been beautifully renovated, are large compared to
desc: Fairmont is one of the oldest hotels in Singapore, but the rooms and lobby have been beautifully fully renovated, and are large compared to new built hotels. I also love that every room has a balcony if you wish to have fresh air. My room did not have a bathtub, although you can get rooms that do have bathtubs. I don't normally like to use the bathtub in hotels, so it was a non issue for me. The check-in and room cleaning was top notch, and i like the fact that the hotel does not feel crowded, but more intimate. Breakfast was decent, but can get crowed during peak morning hours.

title: staff performance
desc: The staff yuhui of fairmont was really very professional and was the main reason that allowed me and my friends to have a good stay. He wrote me a birthday card and was very accommodating as well. truly the best experience with a hotel staff

title: Fantastic stay again
desc: Fantastic service, rooms, pools, gym and concierge. We always stay at Fairmont or Swissotel as the location is perfect with access to supermarkets, pharmacies, shops and restaurants in Raffles city. Our only disappointment was that Prego did not run their full buffet breakfast, which used to cater so well for gluten free options (especially the crepe / pancake and omelette chefs). This made finding a gluten free breakfast option difficult. Hopefully this was reduced service due to Covid and hope on our next stopover Prego will be back to its former breakfast glory!

title: The Gold Lounge is Back!!! Better than Ever
desc: It‚Äôs our annual ritual to have a staycation at the Fairmont Singapore. After two years of COVID restrictions, the Gold Lounge is back and better than ever, making the upgraded room more than worth it! We were able to have our breakfast at one of three places - the Gold Lounge is best when it comes to the views. A generous spread of food and drinks (including alcohol) during Happy Hour saves the money and effort to go out for dinner. For the rest of the day, drinks (non-alcoholic) are free flow. The Gold Lounge team are awesome and very friendly - Lydia, Firdaus, Howard, Syakirah, Elvis, Zhi Xin and Kai Zhe. After three days with them, they are like friends.

title: A great staycay!
desc: Felt great to be back at Fairmont, their rooms are nicely done with modern decor. Booked a room with a harbour view and it did not disappoint. The only bummer was that there was no bidet spray in the toilet (do consider adding pls!). Oh also there was no plug near a mirror so I struggled a bit when I used the hairdryer. Other than that, staff were attentive and polite too. Shoutout to Li Yang from front desk and Shobana from Asian Market Cafe who rendered excellent service. Will definitely be back again, keep up the good work guys!

title: 5 star service
desc: When I come to Singapore, I know I will always get top notch service but the staff at Fairmont go above and beyond! The kind greetings, remembering your name, and offers of help make your visit special. I want to particularly acknowledge Bern. I had an allergic reaction to something and he escorted me to the clinic directly! He and others asked later if I was doing better hours later! Bern also did research to find a clinic that would be open during the small window of time I need to get a COVID test before returning to the US. Staying here is like having family around to take care of you! Thank you!

title: Stay at Fairmont with Fairmont Gold Access
desc: Stayed here with my family in their Harbour Facing room and was extremely delighted by the service of the staff. Check in was a little lengthy but efficient. Room was at a good size and the view is simply gorgeous. Outstanding staff at the Fairmont Gold Lounge and the food there is delightful. Fair amount of choices and during the evening, the choice of food changes day to day. The staff at the lounge were very attentive too. Thank you to Firdaus for remembering our drinks preference for our breakfast. Shoutout to Howard and Shakirah for the amazing service throughout our stay. Will definitely recommend our friend to get the extra perks of Fairmont Gold. Totally worth it!!

title: Fairmont - My Preferred Choice Hotel in Singapore
desc: I had a great Fairmont experience in my last stay at this hotel. The services at the Fairmont can be easily compared to the best Swiss Hotels in the World * a doorman greeted me by my last name * a baggage handler was ready to assist me with the luggage when I arrived * and a reception had my registration package and keys ready when I checked into the hotel My impression of the Hotel: * the room was impeccably clean; thanks to the housekeepers tending to details. * the room also had an incredible view of the Marina Bay Sands. * the popular Prego restaurant had excellent food menu and great servers * I love the twin rooftop circular swimming pools and the unique icy cold Willlow Stream Spa Jacuzzi That was my wonderful experience at the Fairmont Hotel in Singapore.

title: Good location & Great Service
desc: Enjoy our 3 days 2 nights staycation at Fairmont. Car park is not included in our rate, anyway, the hotel is easy to access with mrt or taxi. Slightly hiccup during check in about the gold lounge facilities and front desk never get back to us, so I have to go back to front office and met the friendliest Ms Jean who ensured me that our room is included the 3pax for gold lounge access. We were very much enjoy the Gold lounge for breakfast and evening canap√©. Howard & his team gave us a very warm welcome each visit. We enjoyed the quietness of the lounge, spent almost half of our stay drinking and eating at the lounge. The one star minus from the house keeping as we went out in the morning and have the room cleaning button on since 10.30am, came back 4 hours later the room

title: Deluxe Harbour King Review
desc: Staying at Fairmont Singapore again was another great experience. Checkin and Checkout were very smooth and friendly (with thanks to Yuhui!) including the room being available at the time of my arrival (a bit early). The room itself makes for a great view of MBS and other landmarks in Singapore. It was very spacious and the automated sensors for the curtains make returning to the room a novel treat each time. Well worth a return.

title: Ismail at Breakfast
desc: My stay at the Fairmont in Singapore has been so much nicer because of people like Ismail. His warm and cheerful greetings in the mornings are a great start to my days. It is people like him that I will recond this hotel.

title: Very well located close to everything
desc: Clean, great views, excellent hot shower, fantastic location close to everything including underground trains, plenty of bars, restaurants around hotel‚Ä¶‚Ä¶bar fridge needs updating badly and some utensils would be great.

title: Great Fairmont stay
desc: I had stayed w Fairmont Singapore for 4 times. Yday we had one staycation and it was amazing! Chezza the guest relation officer did her best to accommodate our staycation and I‚Äôm highly appreciative of her prompt replies. Amazing stay and we will continue to visit this hotel as the location and service is really good!

title: Will come again especially with our pet
desc: Friendly staff and good services, pet friendly and well organised. Room is big enough and comfortable. The connection points for wifi can be improved further by adding more points. Should include scale machine. However breakfast is not so great and should improve on the service level .

title: Redeemed Accor Plus for 2 nights.
desc: Friendly service. Housekeeping very responsive. Upgraded to Island bed with bathtub. Nespresso machine in room. Nice electronic curtain control. Plenty of places to eat around the area. Large grocery at basement of attached shopping mall.

title: GREAT STAY WITH LOUNGE ACCESS!
desc: It was great stay with the best warm welcome to lounge every time by Syakirah, zhixin,Alfie. Not forgetting the egg chef glen ! Will definitely visit again with my friends !! Thank you so much for the wonderful experience !!!

title: SNU Gathering group
desc: Excellent places for having a Get-Together for Secondary Classmates & Form-Teacher‚Ä¶,SNU 4C Bern was excellent to lend his sevices, in ensuring that i had a smooth time on the room booked, querries about the group‚Äôs photo taking , bookings essential information, room facilities access & checking on the booking confirmations informations and other concerns.. Thank You, Bern / ali ‚úÖ üôè

title: A meaningful day
desc: Havent been to anywhere in the world since C-19 pandemic so this is by far, the first stayca on my birthday! Many thanks to Li Yang who made all things possible...(e.g. great view from my room (MBS view) giving me a surprise cake & chocolates, private breakfast at prestige lounge and most essentially, for being so warm and keen to details. I have felt that he really wish me a happy birthday as if he's one of my closest friends‚ò∫. Heartfelt thanks and apologies for the long overdue thank u message, Li Yang. To Fairmont, all the best and will definitely be back and celebrate another milestone with you.

title: Rejuvenating Staycation
desc: My family and I had one of the best staycations ever at the Fairmont Singapore. Really good rooms and service. The gym, pool and spa facilities were really good. The complimentary use of the jacuzzis and steam room was a real bonus. The guest services were par excellence. Namely Wei from the phone concierge, Claudia at the font desk and Gek Noi from housekeeping. Siti from the spa and Pravin from front desk were also very helpful and professional. The gym auntie was super strict but she meant well in a maternal sort of way. We enjoyed our welcome drinks and time at Antidote with Arvin providing us attentive service. We‚Äôll be back!

title: Review of Fairmont Singapore
desc: Service : Virtual-email, physical - front office, room service, restaurant dining 5/5 Top notch service from all fronts. Loved the little touches, personalised card, prompt and service with heart and attention to details. Room/facilities: 4/5 top notch for this class and price point. Clean facilities with wide array of restaurants, recreation etc. One point taken off as Room fridge was not stocked up. Quality of food : 3/5 - room service food was ok 2/5 - breakfast at cafe was below average. Spread was poor, quality and taste was below average. The other restaurants Jain and Japanese were not open for Sunday. Overall: 4/5 ‚Ä¶

title: Perfect spot
desc: Clean, well appointed rooms with. Highly recommend the harbor views. Concierge was knowledgeable and helpful. The location is central. We enjoyed walking to many attractions and taxi rides everywhere else were quick. There's great shopping within the same complex. Returning to a hospitality lounge post checkout was a great way to freshen up before our late flight. While the live jazz we were looking for hadn't got back up and running post covid, the team went out of their way to find alternative options

title: Overall pleasant stay
desc: Did a 1 night stay with gold lounge service. The room is classy and fantastic! Comfy with big bathroom. Note that some suites may not have bathtub. Overall quite a good staycation as service is excellent and forthcoming. Perhaps can do better with some light snacks or food for afternoon. The willow spa was good with jacuzzi, sauna and gym but I was quite surprised there are people (does not seemed to be guests) in shorts and naked even in the jacuzzi.

title: Staycation at Fairmont
desc: Saw the Cocomelon package staycation and wanted to give it a go. However the pricing was actually abit higher than I expected and when I call in to understand abit more on the package I was given various details to the package which was slightly fustrating. What made us decide to go ahead was when our enquiry was served by Yan Jie, from reservations team. He was able to advise the package with confidence and help us feel more assured for our stay. As a travelling mum with toddler, there is a couple of special request that we had to arrange to ensure a smooth check in and stay for us. Yan Jie was really understanding and able to help us arrange to our request as much as possible. He made it a point to ensure our request are met in a timely manner. Kudos for making our

title: Terrible check-out experience
desc: I got a different room charge between check-in and check-out. And the reception denied that I had booked a room using accor rates and that it was under another name. Even though I was the one who checked in and they already knew the room rates from the beginning. Luckily, I had an email from accor regarding my booking, proving that they were wrong.

title: Very nice staycation with warm service, good spa for relaxation
desc: Had a wonder staycation at Fairmont. Was very intrigued by the hotel in a hotel Gold concept so was really waiting for this. Service was always very warm and helpful, unfortunately constrained by logistics - my mum could not take many foods due to recent surgery (Ritz Carlton was willing to do something just for her!). The Spa was a highlight - we were able to satisfy our onsen cravings there. I would recommend Swissotel over Fairmont anytime.

title: GREAT STAY WITH ON LOUNGE ROOMS
desc: It‚Äôs was great with best services from Syakirah , zhixin and Firdaus! Really great service. Checking on us well. Food at lounge was great too !! Will definitely come back the next time with my family!!

title: Plesant stay with fairmont hotel
desc: Im extending my stay from the next door hotel, swissotel to this fairmont hotel The accommodation look similar but the staff friendliness lots better The room is huge, comfortable bed, the amenities also smell nice by le labo brand From the fo, housekeeping, runner, bell service is so friendly and professional‚Ä¶ Shout out to the most helpful fo name a-sa Tan, thankyou for given us nice checkin and checkout experience also upgrading our room to get free breakfast We enjoy out bfast at prego restaurant and the food taste delicious The location of the hotel also at it best Connecting way to CITY hall mrt & raffles city mall And by walking distance basement connector to suntec city mall and esplanade mrt Superb

title: Great stay
desc: From the reception at check in to the courtesy at check out the staff at the Fairmont excelled. We especially enjoyed the Gold Lounge. Must be close to the best anywhere with most we have experienced recently having cut back drastically on lounge benefits. a very good selection of food and good quality wines. plus the staff were excellent.

title: Great service!
desc: We booked a Fairmont Gold king room and were attended to by Alfie, Howard, Elvie, Zhi Xin, Marcus and Nigel. We went for evening cocktails and breakfast at the Gold lounge and the service was very attentive and personalised. The room decor was very cosy and elegant, with the dark wood furnishings. And I love it that they provide exercise clothes and shoes. used it for my gym exercise (gym's open 24h). A relaxing and enjoyable stay!

title: Good location but below satisfactory customer service
desc: After the booking, I wrote in with a request for higher floor. I was asked to pay additional per room night and I agreed. I informed that it was to celebrate my new husband's birthday and I was promised a small birthday cake. It also took another 2-3 emails/ reminders to confirm my room upgrade and other queries. Upon check in, no cake. The room's toilet had no ventilation and the room fogged up quite badly. We informed the front desk but there was no follow up addressed to us. Typically most, if not all hotel stays come with complimentary car park, but we were not informed prior. There was also no mention during the booking nor check-in. Because this was previously provided, it is strange that as hotel guests, we are not given complimentary parking. Therefore apart from the

title: Singapore is a wonderful place to visit - this hotel is fabulous.
desc: We are part way through an 11 night stay in a Deluxe Harbour View room (1535) - the room is a delight with a separate sitting area and fabulous views across towards Marina Bay Sands and the downtown area. (We don‚Äôt close the curtains as the view is so good) The room is very well appointed with a coffee machine and a hot water boiler to make tea etc. There is a small fridge which is great for a little milk. The bathroom has both a bath and a separate wet room type shower with both a hand held and rain head feature. All of the staff have been helpful and obliging - a minor problem with the in-room safe was dealt with within a few minutes of it being reported. Gladys Tan sent us a welcome message and it is touches like this which are really welcomed. The pool area is lovely and

title: Wonderful view, clean and spacious room
desc: My wife and I spent a night at Fairmount hotel recently. It was for my birthday. The hotel surprised us with a bottle of champagne and a birthday cake as my wife was an Accor plus silver card member. We were so happy with the room allocated for us on the 19th floor at the South Tower. The room has been recently renovated and the view is amazing. We can see Padang, MBS, the Esplanade from our balcony. The bath tub was a pleasant surprise. We also love the water filters in the room. So we don't have to use plastic bottles to drink water in our room. What a great idea. Every hotel should follow suit. We stay again soon!

title: Good Stay
desc: I book this hotel for birthday celebration Have improve customer services. When i am email for booking no reply at all. after that i call hotel directly for booking. I did not user Accor Plus Membership.

title: Great experience with Fairmont staff
desc: I had a pleasant stay and most importantly a fantastic experience with Ms Jean Wong from front operations who took time to not only listen to an issue I had on the Accor group membership and also followed up diligently and tried her best to resolve the issue. I would certainly recommend fairmont to anyone who is looking for a centrally located accommodation in Singapore.

title: Fairmont is first rate
desc: From the time we arrived and departed, the Fairmont Singapore team, rooms, dining, Gold Lounge, and location were fabulous. We've enjoyed many Accor experiences in Europe, North America, and Australia. This was the best so far. Without doubt.

title: Beautiful Hotel - Spotless & Great Location
desc: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights and were very, very happy with everything about the hotel, the room, the location, the view, the customer service. I cannot find any faults with this hotel. The location is perfect in a busy area if Singapore and adjoining a shopping centre that has many food outlets, grocery shop, chemists etc. the MRT train system is also adjoining the hotel so you can go all over Singapore and even to the airport using the MRT. The room was very spacious and had a spectacular view. Everything was super clean and spotless. We were able to look at the beautiful view from a balcony which was amazing. I have already booked a future stay at this hotel and it is highly recommended.

title: A memorable family staycation!
desc: My whole family had a very memorable experience of staying in Fairmont hotel. Excellent location and stunning view around MBS area. Convenient to grab nice food from plenty of restaurants downstairs. Accessible to Gold lounge is a worthwhile upgrade option. Gold King room is spacious enough to accommodate a family size of 4. Staying of Fairmont hotel has been one of the most memorable family staycation in my life!

title: Excellent accommodation and impeccable service
desc: I had a very pleasant stay. The check in was fast and the staff (Ryan) was very friendly and helpful. The room was very well comfy. I especially like the hot/cold water dispenser: very convenient. The room was very clean too. The gym is decent with the necessary equipment. Breakfast spread is quite good. But the quality can be improved.

title: Good Customer Service - Asa
desc: I would like to express my appreciation for the quality of service that Asa offered us at the Fairmont Hotel. Asa has provided us outstanding and exceptional customer service. We are incredibly pleased with the quality of customer service and the professionalism that he displayed. These are the staff that really take customer service to a whole new level and I hope that the hotel treasure employees like him as he really does make a difference. I will definitely recommend Fairmont Hotel to my friends and family, and I‚Äôm sure I‚Äôll be back on again. A great thanks to Asa!

title: Good for families
desc: We always stay at this hotel coz the room cutting is big compared to other SG hotels. My family loves staycation coz its convenient for us to get a quick break w/o travelling far. This hotel is the best in SG, why? large rooms convenient location coz its connecting to a mall and cityhall mrt and all nearby places coz its city centre customer service is awesome pool is big, spa is great too very family friendly hotel all rooms got balcony access we are base in sg and we've been alot of places and i assure u that this is the best hands down. we stayed one night for the cocomelon staycation with 2 connecting rooms. kids love the merchandise. love the king size room with bathtub and living room. room service is great also as i always order the butter chicken pool is great and we

title: Good service though room a little old
desc: Service received was wonderful from the time we checked in. Location of hotel is awesome with many food choices. We were there for the Cocomelon staycation package. Loved the decorations in room and also the Cocomelon themed afternoon tea set that came with it. Wouldn‚Äôt say that it is delicious, but it made the Cocomelon experience wholesome. We also enjoyed our breakfast at the Cocomelon restaurant the next day. It is a ala carte buffet coupled With a buffet table with bread, cereal, yoghurt, fruits and juices. There were several restaurants you can choose to have your breakfast. Prego - ala carte breakfast (cafe styled food) Asian market cafe - halal buffet breakfast spread, most crowded of all Cocomelon at Clove - ala carte buffet with a buffet table (non halal)

title: Eugene L. Made the stay 5 stars!
desc: Eugene L. Was fantastic! His customer service and dedication to the guests are a main reason I will be returning to Fairmont when I visit Singapore again :) The location of the hotel is prime for downtown life. Walking distance to every amenities and hotspots!

title: Amazing stay
desc: We had an amazing stay at Fairmont. Very well located close to breaky places and transport. Rooms were beautifully cleaned and awesome service at reception. Little touches like remote control blinds were great. Would definitely stay again.

title: Top Notch Accommodation with World Class Service
desc: I had the pleasure of staying at Fairmont‚Äôs Signature Salon Suite with my wife to celebrate my birthday. The room was perfect. It had premium fittings, classy decor, and was spacious. Their attention to detail also revealed a sense of thoughtfulness for their guests‚Ä¶ at one point I was fumbling with the coffee machine trying to get it work, until I saw a small acrylic stand right next to the coffee machine which had instructions on how to use it. It is an example of the level of thinking and empathy the hotel has for its guests. But what impressed me the most is Eugene Lua, the hotel executive who handled my onboarding process. He was warm, friendly, perceptive and eager to help. He prepared a small box of chocolates for my young son, he knew I was driving and so produced a

title: Fairmont‚Äôs Gold Lounge - outstanding service
desc: We stayed in a very nice suite in the Gold Club floor. The outstanding aspect of our stay was the wonderful service led by Amin, the senior manager in the Gold Lounge/floor. Amin and his team ‚Äî Howard, Syakriah, Marcus, Nigel, Bronze, and Zhi Xin ‚Äî took such good care of us ‚Äî their level of service was always extremely attentive, friendly and warm, and to the highest professional standards. Congratulations to the gold club team, thank you for making our visit so pleasant and enjoyable.

title: Excellent place to stay
desc: We thoroughly enjoyed our stay here. The location is perfect as it is literally above the train station and shopping centre and very handy to all the spectacular sights of Singapore. Would highly recommend staying here as it is perfect. The staff are very helpful and friendly. Would definitely stay again.

title: Totally enjoyed my stay- we will be back
desc: Booked a 3d2n staycation at Fairmont for the early May public holidays. Was expecting a crowd at check-in but on the contrary, it was a breeze with the option of online check-in and credit card pre-authorisation. The counter staff and royal service was great... Gave us a cake for our special occassion celebration and request for ice bucket was fulfilled promptly. Room is clean and we enjoy the bath tub. Location of the hotel was fantastic ... connected to Raffles City shopping ctr and MRT just below, nothing can go wrong. With the connection, you can also walk to Capitol and Funan centre via the underpass. Swimming pool was swarmed with kids but expected that for the long holidays. Special thanks to Ryan for the great service provided. Will be back again.

title: well located, great view, comfortable stay but food menu not as expectation
desc: everything is great staying here, but the breakfast menu need to improved: 1. menu selection is not much 2. food quality is not up to standard 3. no fresh juice? the coffee very watered down can refer to Hilton breakfast buffet menu!

title: Worthwhile!
desc: Every detail in the hotel was well thought of. The view was great too! The staffs were attentive and the entire environment was good too. As it was a birthday staycation for my friend, when my friend and I were checking in, the lady at the check-in counter wished my friend "Happy Birthday" before we left the counter. I felt that it was heartwarming to see that! Overall, its recommended to stay!

title: Great hospitality
desc: Amazing experience at this hotel and loved the lounge. Mr Howard Ng gave us a great tour of the place and made our experience very enjoyable! We will definitely come back here for a staycation and we would recommend this amazing experience to our friends!

title: Stayed at the fairmont, willl be back again
desc: I had a wonderful experience at the Fairmont. This is on the top of the list of best stays/experiences. The staff was very hospitable and there for every need of mine I was served by Eugene at the front desk and he went over and beyond to make my stay enjoyable. Would definitely choose Fairmont for my next stay

title: Satisfaction guaranteed
desc: Really great from check in to check out, to breakfast, to upgrade, to free use of gym outfits n everything...really great. Satisfied with the amenities, with the staff and love the upgrade and view. Breakfast was great. Same venue with shopping area...

title: Overall a good experience but food is bad to the max
desc: Everything was good, service was great, stay was enjoying. Had a few special requests and hotel was readily available to solve all our problems. However, one thing‚Äôs major turn off was the food. Room service food price was very high but we usually enjoy hotel food so we were willing to pay but the quality is very poor and food is bad. Ordered calamari, the batter is poorly done. Ordered ABC soup for my child, worst than all coffeeshops, they used frozen veggies with noodles and you can barely see any chicken. Ordered steam codfish and it really came steamed without any seasonings, the sweetness of codfish saved the dish. By far the poorest food i have ever tried in all room services I had. Breakfast variety @ AMC is lesser as compared to most hotels. Had lunch @ Clove and the

title: Average, not excellent
desc: I booked for a TWO DOUBLE BEDS Room, but realized we were given 3 single beds instead when I first entered the room. It is sufficient for 3 adults, however I think the hotel should still honour what they have stated in their room description. A single bed is different from a double bed. We do not see the hotel is making extra effort when comes to small details. We were given 3 sets of bath towels, but only 2 sets of face towels, toothbrush and slippers. USB panels is not working, one of the bed reading lights is not working. Welcome letter's information is not updated, requesting to book slot for swimming pools and fitness centre which are no longer necessary. We do not define all the above as Fairmount standard. We made the reservation via booking.com and seeking a few

title: GOOD STAY AND BREAK !
desc: Stayed at Fairmont Singapore under Accor All Membership. Good choice ! Pre-registration and no queue when we arrived at the hotel so collected our key in like 6-8 minutes or so. Can be improved/shortened. hahaha. Asked for for high floor and as far away from elevator. Given room at 17 floors but quite near the elevator. Was a little disappointed but either there wasnt too much human traffic or perhaps room noise insulation was good so we were troubled by too much noise . Thanked Asa for the welcome gift. Room quite clean and big (we upgraded/paid for one of those recently renovated rooms) . Toilet is huge and open concept. Shower area no glass panel/door or curtain. Though there is gradient, water still flows up to the tub/almost half the toilet would be wet after we

title: Wonderful Stay at Fairmont Hotel Singapore
desc: The room was spacious with nice city view, especially at night. The staffs were very attentive and provide me with all the information and support i need. They even prepared me with a pair off super comfort shose! Location is superb, right next to City HallMrt station, Raffles City shopping mall, CHIJMES, plenty of foodcourts and restautants are just a few minutes (1-3 mins) of walking away. Definitely we will come back again!

title: Well located and stayed many times over the years
desc: Wonderful. The staff were caring and attentive - as always. The hotel is also in a great position and central to all my needs. My room was made up efficiently and the person who cleaned wrote a little note on the back of the coaster to which I wrote thank you very much - you made my day.

title: Amazing efficiency and service
desc: Had some issues with my electricity back home but had an online conference the whole day. Booked my room at 745am while panicking and explaining my situation and requested to use their room for day use. Wei from call center was really helpful and informed me that I could check in at 8am and my room would be ready since my meeting was at 9am. Reached Fairmont at 830am and was greeted by a smiling hotel attendent who helped me with my bags and Jean from concierge checked me in super efficiently and within 5mins I was up in my room getting ready. The room was really clean and tidy with a coffee machine and fast internet speed, everything you need to work for the day. Once again, thank you Fairmont, Jean and team for the efficient service that makes Fairmont such a delightful

title: Everything is excellent.
desc: Good location, breakfast, service. I have stayed for 3weeks. I am really recommend staying here! Also it is connected to Raffle city which has many kind of restaurants and shops. This hotel is near to City hall station.

title: Amazing Hotel all round
desc: Amazing hotel, brilliant staff and great location. Reception staff couldn‚Äôt be more accommodating, apologising profusely for what was a delay in checking in of no more than a few minutes. Luxurious rooms, really comfortable, and beautifully equipped. (Deluxe Room). All round great choice for a short or long stay in Singapore, close to Marina Bay and directly opposite Raffles.

title: Luxury Experience @ The Fairmont
desc: A big shout out to the Fairmont Gold team of Amin, Alfie, Howard, Syakirah, Zhu Xin, Nigel, Bronze, Marcus, Chef Andrew, and Chef Glenn. Thank you for making our stay at the Fairmont a memorable experience. The gold lounge experience is of the highest standard matched with great food and wine. The team truly committed to making the guest's experience their number one priority and we were not let down. The front office staff, Amanda who checked us in and checked us out, made our stay as comfortable as possible. She was a wealth of information. Bernard from the bell desk was great at his job, gave us the rundown on the room, it's features, and offerings. Made sure we were comfortable before he left. Nothing was too difficult for him. Thank you, Marcus and Emmanuel, for the

title: Fairmont Gold super lux experience
desc: Decided to slurge on a Fairmont Gold experience! Room ‚Äì my Fairmont Gold Suite (56SqM), 2522, was super lovely! Also, many many yays to having the same floor as the Gold Lounge as my room was literally 5 steps away. The Suite starts off with an open concept wardrobe to the left of the hallway which contains the usual bathrobes, slippers, hairdryer, and hangers. I find that I prefer open concept wardrobes nestled in a corner as it, well, makes for alot of convenience when you need to do stuff. To the right of the hallway is the very spacious bathroom, with very generous allocation for the single sink, shower space, and open concept toilet (sorry, no multi-tasking here). Toiletries are Rose31 branded which I quite liked. The only issue I have about the design is that the

title: Fantastic experience for family staycation
desc: We were warmly welcome upon our arrival at the hotel and was briefly assisted for the hotel reception staff for the check in. The hotel staff had arranged a high floor room with the view of the Marina for us, and we were totally mesmerised by the view when we first entered the room. The view was so beautiful in the day, and became even better when the night came. The room was also very well designed and furnished, and all amenities that we needed were provided. The room was also very spacious, allowing my two kids ample space to run around and play in the room. The hotel is also well located, with many shopping malls in the vicinity that provides a wide range of entertainment options and dining options. All in all, Fairmont Singapore is a fantastic choice for staycations and

title: Wonderful stay!
desc: We recently had a wonderful five night stay at the Fairmont. There are many wonderful hotels in Singapore and we chose this hotel based on the excellent value, rooms that accommodate a family of four, and convenient downtown location above a mall and MRT station. Our room was modern and lovely. The small balcony was really great for getting some fresh air. The hotel itself is located above a mall with a wonderful basement food level. The mall bakery was especially awesome + grocery store + multiple places for kaya toast + ding tai fung + wide selection of food + more places to eat on the third floor food court. Ok, there is food in every direction in Singapore, but the convenience of just going downstairs can't be overstated. Finally, the lobby and concierge staff was

title: Spacious Royal Suite, Excellent Service as always
desc: The Royal Suite is located at the North Tower, which has better views of the Marina Bay area of the two towers. The entryway to the Royal Suite reveals an earthy and cosy tone to the suite. I like how the earthy tone in the Royal Suite makes the suite look contemporary while adding a sense of luxury at the same time. Further down the entryway, before it opens up to the spacious living room in the Royal Suite, a door opens to the powder room that we missed the first time we were in the suite. We only noticed the powder room when we spotted the door handle. The powder room provided us with additional toilet facilities in the suite. The massive living room, occupying a bulk of the real estate in the suite. The fan-shaped layout of the living room in the Royal Suite is furnished

title: Great Location, Great Service and Huge Room!!
desc: Location is great, Chimes is only 2 mins walking from the hotel. The MRT is downstairs, taxi is plenty and it's in the middle of everywhere. I love the size of the room the most!! Been staying in Orchard area all this time, but I think I've found a new favourite!!!

title: Nice hotel. Delicious breakfast
desc: Beautiful hotel. Not to far from Orchard Road. Breakfast was delicious at The Prego. Taxis were easily available from the lobby. Or you could take the MRT from City Hall to almost anywhere in Singapore. The only downside was the very expensive room rate for that standard of room. Would highly recommend this if rates were 25% cheaper.

title: Excellent Service
desc: We recently stayed at The Fairmont in a Gold Club room. The service from all staff throughout the hotel was excellent, nothing was too much trouble. We especially enjoyed the Club Lounge and the exceptional service from Amin, Howard, Syakirah, Marcus and Nigel. Their excellent, personalised service was much appreciated. The hotel is in a great location, with excellent transport options.

title: Fantastic stay at the Fairmont
desc: I had a really enjoyable stay at the Fairmont Ambassador King Suite and had received excellent service throughout my stay - particularly from the front desk staff Yu Hui who made the usual hurried check in process a much more pleasant and personable one. The ambassador king suite was also very pleasant. The interior design was classy and the spacious living room was perfect for hosting a small party. I also like that Fairmont is one of the few hotels in Singapore with a balcony. All in all, I‚Äôd recommend the hotel for holiday makers or locals looking for a staycation.

title: Immaculate service and memorable stay
desc: My boyfriend and I stayed at Fairmont Singapore for 3D2N (birthday celebration). I‚Äôd like to commend the staff on their immaculate service: Jamie, Bronze, Jazlina, Pravin, Alfie, who gave me a room that has superb views (thankfully it was available!) and my check-in/out processes so smooth. They were extremely helpful and friendly and made our stay very enjoyable. Upon knowing we were celebrating a birthday, they gave us a chocolate cake which was delivered quickly by the next team. I‚Äôd like to also thank the in room service staff Lady and Taiyi for making sure our requests were met as quickly as possible during the long weekend despite being so busy. Lastly, not forgetting the housekeeping staff (whose name I didn‚Äôt manage to get) for the fast and clean housekeeping and her

title: Great hotel, location, facilities and staff
desc: We were very fortunate to stay in the Fairmont early in April 22 The location is fantastic, the rooms and facilities outstanding and if you have a bay view - wow The staff were efficient, friendly and sincere . All areas - reception, pool staff, maintenance and bar staff were always helpful and friendly The Gold Doom access was a true bonus with excellent service abs agin lovely staff We would have no hesitation to stay again and would recommend

title: Room is spacious and face Marina Bay sand ! Beautiful view ! My children love it !
desc: Enjoy the stay during my birthday booking as Accor members ! Thanks for the Hotel compliment a small chocolate cake during my special Day ! Hotel facing marina bay sand hotel. Room is really nice & spacious ! We all enjoy the view very much ! Love

title: What a shame.
desc: This has been our go to hotel in Singapore for the past 25 years for a break. We stayed at the Pan Pacific hotel 4 days prior for a change of scenery and 3 days at the Fairmont. We had our suspicions in 2019 that the quality of stay was not the same as in the past. We chose to stay in a Harbour view club lounge access room so we could enjoy the benefits. On arrival to the room we felt something was not quite right with several scratches on the polished floor and a kettle with bottles of water for our use. This seemed strange considering we have stayed here before in the same room type but did not think much of it until that night I went to use the filtered water dispenser ( hot and cold water on demand). No water what so ever and no power at the coffee machine. We phoned Royal

title: Staycation for anniversary
desc: Very nice and spacious room. check in was smooth. also provided surprise in room with a chocolate cake and a bottle of champagne for our 1 day stay. Free Parking was also provided. one of the best experience for our staycation.

title: Superbly Convenient Location
desc: Stay was almost perfect except for the air-conditioning in the room....it was not pleasant temperature even after the engineer came to fix it...bed can be improved...the springs are not individual pocketed so when one person moves, the whole bed creaks..... Everyone from door man, wait staff, concierge were all wonderful! Special mention to the Prego manager (Caucasian) , who welcomed us at the door during breakfast...didnt get his name, his greetings, enthusiasm really caught us with a delightful surprise! Even my kids commented that this man really loves his job!! Everyone at the club lounge was perfect!!!!

title: Amazing staffs!!!
desc: Fairmont provided me the services that over my expectation. All off the staffs were so helpful and always smiling. Especially Mike and Ian at conceirge team, they advised me reliable place for ART test and a nice restaurant for dinner. I will definitely come back here!!!

title: Fabulous Customer Service
desc: I had a 2 night stay at Fairmont at Signature King suite. It is a king size bed and a roll away bed was provided as we had 2 adults and 2 kids in the room. The kids totally enjoyed the stay as it was easter week. Hotel had car rides, balloon sculpting and hand/face painting to keep the kids busy and they had a fulfilled morning during the 2 night stay. We love the breakfast at Prego though the variety is limited. Nonetheless still taste delicious. Would really highly recommend this hotel to all.

title: Beautiful and clean room
desc: Quick check in as I check in via mobile check in by a email sent by Fairmont on the same week I was about to go for my staycation. Breakfast was nice. Room is big enough. Clean room as it is newly renovation. I stayed in the double deluxe room. And I really enjoy my stay.

title: Fantastic stay at Fairmont Hotel
desc: Totally have a remarkable and enjoyable staycation in Fairmont. Staff (Syakirah, Amin & Bronze) have went extra miles to ensure we enjoyed our visit in the lounge. Totally appreciate their services and would definitely return for more stays!

title: So happy we chose the Fairmont
desc: We were going to be in Singapore for 7 nights and picked the Fairmont for our stay. Check in was easy and the attendant was so accommodating and answered our questions. Our room was on the 23rd floor in the south tower. We had an amazing view of the bay and down town. It was a little larger than other rooms we had looked at. It also had a water purifier system in the room that we appreciated. We drank a lot of water because of the heat! Other reviews mentioned the noise from the water system and there was some but it did not bother us, I guess we are heavy sleepers or just tired from our busy days! Kenneth did a great job cleaning/stocking our room everyday. We went to the Prego every morning for breakfast and enjoyed trying everything on the menu, we loved the

title: Glad to be back
desc: Very tasteful renovations, gorgeous Gold lounge, great location. Helpful Chief Concierge, great Gold Lounge Manager. Easy access to Raffles City mall, taxis, nearby Chijmes restaurants and nearby Suntec mall

title: Awesome birthday staycation!
desc: Did a staycation last weekend by utilising the Accor Plus free night. Bronze, who checked us in, was very kind to upgrade our room. He also arranged for a cake to be delivered to our room, which was a pleasant surprise! The highlights of our room are the clean and spacious bath tub, curtains that automatically open when you enter the room, water dispenser and the toilet lights that automatically turn on when you walk towards the toilet in the middle of the night. We had dinner at Prego and the food was delicious. The portion was also perfect. We will definitely remember this staycation for a long time to come.

title: Wonderful staycation at Fairmont
desc: Stayed at Fairmont Hotel for my birthday and booked for the Hello Kitty staycation. Enjoyed the experience as service is great and the customisation that was done for me esp for the Hello Kitty dessert box.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: Very good location and fantastic service in spite of being short staffed, especially room service. Not too many food choices though probably due to Covid times. Getting back on its feet for sure and I look forward to my next visit.

title: Going back for Fairmont Gold
desc: Very prompt email replies from the rsvn team. It was an awesome staycation at Hotel Fairmont Singapore. My room type was Fairmont Gold Room at South Tower and it came with Fairmont Gold Lounge access. Their cocktail and canap√© hours will be from 5.30 to 7.30pm. There was no need for time slot booking. My room was on level 23 and had the most awesome skyline view. I also like that the swimming pools no longer required time slot booking. Thanks to Eugene Lua at the front desk and wish him the all the best in his surprise plan for his love of his life. Many thanks to the lovely Fairmont Gold Lounge team (Bronze, Zhi Xin and Syakirah) for their services. I am looking forward to my next visit.

title: Service of the highest quality
desc: A very nice hotel with a perfect location near to shopping, good restaurants. We stayed at Fairmont Gold floors and the rooms on our floor ( 22:nd) were ok, comfortable beds and beutiful views with a nice balcony to step out on but the room itself was a bit worn down. What made this stay, was by far their service at the Gold Lounge and Mrs Jean Wong has to be mentioned, her serviceminded person went beyond what you could expect both at arrival and during our whole stay. The lounge itself was located on 25 floor with a beautiful view and both breakfast and canapees was served by people who knows what they are doing, thank you all. We will absolutely be coming back

title: Fantastic experience in Fairmont Singapore!!!
desc: My second stay at Fairmont Singapore had been amazing due to the efficient service and polite staff here. I would like to commend Mr Eugene lua for his professionalism as he has went the extra mile to recommend arcade attractions in Singapore. Besides attractions, he has also assisted me in providing places in which i can dine at a minimum cost! Due to the relaxed measures, booking of pools/gyms is not required. However, i noticed the hotel provides aqua spinning so to fully enjoy the pool facility it is recccommened to avoid afternoon/evening hours. I have enjoyed my stay at Fairmont Singapore thoroughly and would not hesitate on returning for a third!

title: Pleasant stay
desc: Very helpful staff. I don't think I have to mention the superb location the hotel at. One of the staff at the reception is so friendly, too bad I forgot the name. I will be back next week with my family, and really excited about it. One thing that can be improved is that there is no fresh juice at the restaurant (only bottled). Also be prepared with more staffs and table in public holiday

title: Pleasant stay.
desc: Pleasant, fast and swift check in and check out experience. The check in staff was attentive and went the extra mile to inform the halal and non halal options for us and how we can have our pre dawn meals. Lovely and attentive staff. Would definitely return here next time. :)

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Celebrating our son 1st year birthday here in fairmont with a service experience we will never forget since ease of pandemic restriction. Nothing was too much of trouble from booking to departure. Everything was excellent. We enjoy the pool and the room. Would like to compliment the hotel team  Ryan Khoo & Gladys who made us feel totally welcome right from the start. Upgraded us to a bigger room, not forgetting the breakfast team in Prego, service was excellent too. We enjoy the nice breakfast served. Both team took service experience to another level. Thumbs up. Thank you all for the memorable experience and will be back again.

title: Fairmont Singapore always awesome
desc: All Fairmont hotel never failed me including Fairmont singapore. Fairmont hotel Singapore absolutely perfect in every aspect especially their service. Special thanks for Mr Ryan Kho who always assist me very well and he is very helpfull in every aspect. I really happy stay here and everytime i visit singapore, i always stay here

title: Good experience in Fairmont Singapore with my family
desc: I stayed with my family in Fairmont Singapore for 6 days. We received an excellent service & thanks for your Colleague Eugene Lua who assisted me to solve my questions & give me good suggestions. Our kids were staying happily here. Thanks again. Chan‚Äôs family

title: Good & comfortable stay!
desc: I enjoyed my stay during the meetings and enjoyed the food too. Friendly service and font office staff was very nice and helpful. The meeting rooms were good as well and enjoyed the stay over all. Good luck!

title: Concierge of the Year experince, Ryan and Jamie!
desc: Hanging out super late, stuck in town area overnight with no transport home. Phone battery too dead for a early train ride. So I approached your hotel Concierge Ryan and Jamie, they were super friendly and helpful. Pull out charger and cable fit my phone, allowed me have a little rest while I charging my phone at the lobby. Really really appreaciate the help and the extra-mile service! They deserve a raise.

title: needs better service for 5 star
desc: I expected a better service for a 5 star hotel. The breakfast service was not good, poor service and not the veriaty of food, same at the lounge.i stayed at Fairmont Winnipeg, Edmonton, Manila and by far better service. The only 10 is for the Bed and pillow

title: Great Stay at Singapore Fairmont
desc: It was a nice from the time we checked in with great service and good room with a nice view. The lady at the check in counter was extremely helpful and she even gave a car park coupon valid for the next two days

title: Family Staycation
desc: The beds are comfortable and my parents felt relaxed. The room is clean and spacious with the energy-saving concept. The only downtime was that the water dispenser did not work from 1 am to 4 am timing (approximately). Elders need to take warm water but the dispenser is not working. Overall stay is comfortable and relaxing.

title: Perfect location , nice room and nice staffs
desc: EW 13 , just in the shopping with everything you need , model room with a filtered water system which you could enjoy the coffee and especially the TWG tea. Price is reasonable with 45M room . BE CAUSE OF ACCOR MENBER , could have a upgrade , I think depend on the availability

title: Fantastic stay overlooking the National day parade rehearsals
desc: Was assigned there for quarantine during height of covid in July 2021. One of best you can get for such stay. It happens to be just pre-NDP so we got to see rehearsals, fireworks and fly passes. Staffs were very helpful for all covid related procedures. Food deliveries were sent to rooms promptly.

title: Awesome service at lounge
desc: Great service from ZHI XIN. Kind and helpful of her throughout my stay in Fairmont Singapore. Will definitely recommend to others. Thank you! Great environment, great view! Thank you for all the service!

title: Well located, excellent stay and hospitality.
desc: We had such a wonderful time at your hotel. The staff was beyond courteous and extremely helpful and the room was fantastic. The complimentary champagne every evening was a very pleasant surprise for us. Thank you for such a wonderful time. this was my 3rd visit to singapore in 7 years and i look forward to coming again to your hotel in the future for the same or an ever better (If that's possible) experience. special shout out to Jamie and Eugene for their help in check in and check out

title: Short getaway
desc: Our second stay with Fairmont and it was great stay! Thank you to Eugene for being so attentive to details and his professionalism is top notch! My son really enjoyed his time by the pool as well as by the bathtub. In room breakfast is very hearty! Thank you again Fairmont Singapore!

title: Great stay! Will be back :)
desc: Yu Hui and Amanda greeted us warmly when we checked in. We stayed at their newly renovated Deluxe room for a night, spacious bedroom with high tech controls (the ac switch will turn off if you open the door to the balcony!) Room comes with a water dispenser, no bottled water..however there is a tumbler if you need to head out. Due to the relaxed measures, there‚Äôs no need to book pool/gym slots which was great! However it seems like they have aqua spinning in the evening, might wish to avoid evening period if you are heading to the pool. We enjoyed our stay, will be back in the near future :)

title: Nice getaway
