desc: Helpful staff, clean comfortable room with good amenities! The ‚Äòrelax‚Äô mood lighting was my fave when I wanted to take a short break. Even provided gym attire, socks and shoes, all prepared in the room. Pool area was chill and great that they had a pool for the kids.

title: Very poor facilities
desc: The stay would be a total disaster if not for a small service recovery by Chezza. During the 2nd day morning, our breakfast order was forgotten by Prego's staff. During Lunch at the Cocomelon restaurant, the waitress pour an entire glass of milkshake onto my pregnant wife, her bag and her brand new phone. In the evening, the bathroom ceiling was leaking aircon water and the whole floor and bath tub was wet, this is so dangerous for a kids theme staycation and for my pregnant wife. Even the towel rack was cracked and about to fall off.

title: Worst Staycation in Singapore
desc: The worst staycation I have ever experienced in Singapore and probably the worst 5-star hotel I have stayed in my last 20 more years of travel. Firstly, the hotel never took customer's experience seriously. I made feedback to them that Fairmont hotel is the only 5-star hotel doesn't come with the Premier League (PL) channel. The answer given back to me is that the PL channel is not in high demand. Secondly, it's also the only hotel in Singapore which doesn't give complimentary parking. Thirdly, the suite room we stayed comes with a water dispenser, but after multiple fix, it's just working. Last but not least, the canap√©s and breakfast served at Fairmont Gold lounge are rather cold. The breakfast choices are very limited, the bakeries provided are also hard to chew. The

title: Love the location.
desc: Satisfied from check in to check out. After a short wait, I was attended to at check in. Credit Card imprint for SGD100 a day is way too much for my stay of 35 days as my room has been paid by employer. Room service meals arrived spot on time. Breakfast served at Prego is good. More choices would make it better. Some wait for breakfast on a few times as I believe staffing issues at play. I see some of them pressured but managed some smiles. Overall a satisfied customer.

title: Warm welcome
desc: It was not our first time stay, and I‚Äôm pleased with staff efficiency (we opt for online check in and check out). We had nice surprise, we got a complimentary rich chocolate cake. It added sweet memory to our staycation. Thanks Fairmont, you made our family‚Äôs day.

title: Good service & very well-located
desc: Very efficient service from the polite staff here. Convenient access to 3 malls (within walking distance) when we want to settle our meals or buying snacks. Also appreciate the conservation efforts that the hotel has done such as replacing plastic bottled drinks with a tap dispenser.

title: nice view
desc: Hotel is very centralized and very easy to shop around with nice food and the veriaty provided by the hotel's restaurant and also cheap food outside the hotel. The hotel also connected to many other venues via underground thus guest will not be exposed to the sun or rain when doing their shopping..

title: Excellent service, slightly dated rooms
desc: Had originally booked Swissotel but was informed that it was to still a quarantine hotel, and was moved to Fairmont instead. The rooms are fairly large relative to newer hotels, though the deco is somewhat dated. Depending on the layout of the room, there is a bulky cabinet that houses the Swisspro water system, which can make the room really look cluttered. What more than compensates is the excellent service throughout. At first, was given a room with twin beds when I had requested for a single king bed. I was then switched to a room where the Swisspro cabinet was not flushed against the wall making the room really claustrophobic. And because it was next to the lift wells, it was very noisy whenever the lifts were operating. Despite requesting for a change again, the

title: Beautiful Hotel
desc: Rooms with balconies on the higher floors with amazing views of Marina Bay are worth the extra. We had executive lounge access with lovely evening caanapes. Staff very welcoming with ur particular thanks to Jean and her kindness and another lady whose name i can't remember but who dealt with our son's seizure one evening so efficiently. The chef in the lounge at breakfast was brilliant with his friendly smile and nothing was too much trouble. Efficient and welcoming staff in the lobby particularly one of the concierges who talked to us every morning (no name sorry.quite tall,dark grey hair) and Norman and Bern. Thank you for a lovely stay..hope to return.

title: Comfortable and happy stay.
desc: We booked a connecting room with our kids and enjoyed the CoComelon stay. We had 2 nights of fun there and our kids had all the fun there . Will go back again if there is better promotion next time. Haven't go to the pool and bar too.

title: Could be better.
desc: Hospitality was satisfactory, however whenever I called the front desk, they mistook my identity for my guest name. It‚Äôs rather annoying. Only rectified the problem at night. As well as when guest asks for more amenities like toilet paper and other soap, no questions should be asked. You should be more generous oth the amenities when the guest request for it. Room was big and spacious. Prego service was good as usual. I order the birthday cake there. However antidote their service was a bit slow and it was rather hard to call anyone for help. They were not easily reachable.

title: Well located
desc: I'm satisfied with my stay there, although it could have been better. The hotel has a great central location, just a 5-minute walk from the public transport station. My room had a great view of the city's iconic buildings and landmarks. Friendly and well trained staff. The hotel's breakfast restaurant was overcrowded during weekend. Normally have to queue 10 to 15 minutes to be seated.

title: Not Luxury, just okay‚Ä¶with problems
desc: I booked this hotel specifically for a luxury vacation. I have stayed in Fairmont‚Äôs around the world in the past, this place isn‚Äôt even close to other properties. Check in staff were nice. But that‚Äôs where nice ended. Breakfast was included in our rate, we ate their twice in 5 days. Because once you experience that mess you don‚Äôt want to go back. The first server took our order, and never came back. Only until we flagged a supervisor down did we discover we had no order in at all. Room is basic. Nothing special. Now don‚Äôt get me wrong, there is nothing inherently bad about this place (aside from Prego restaurant) but it was sold to us as a luxury, top of the line experience. I have been to Singapore many times in the past, we should have just stayed at Raffles but I

title: Not a particularly memorable experience.
desc: The Signature King Salong Suite does not come with a bathtub, whereas the Signature King Suite does. You should carefully read the fine print in the hotel because apparently everything is included or excluded in various packages offered, including parking and breakfast. Unfortunately, this is not readily apparent. The pressure in the shower is ridiculously low. There is no cap on parking in Raffles City, so this hotel does not make sense if you drive. I parked my car for 24 hours and the cost was approximately $70! The concierge team is more concerned with safe entry. I was lost in the lobby trying to exit, and the first thing he asked me was, "Have you scanned your safe entry?". He had zero situational awareness. Farah, the pool staff, doesn't say anything nice or smile

title: well located, great bathtub
desc: online booking through Accor membership site. I think the rate we got was roughly 40% less than what i saw online on other booking sites. nice room, friendly checkin, great bathtub very convenient to have hotel near major shopping destination with alot of food choices

title: A good stay but looking forward to be wowed on our next visit
desc: We had a short birthday staycation from 25th to 27th March in the Harbour View Room. The view was amazing and the room was relatively clean but the floor could have been vacuumed better. We were checked in by Jazlina and she was very warm and welcoming. Only when the first night came did problems start to occur. We were sweating through the first night as the air conditioning did not reach the bed and the cold air could only be felt when we were sitting at the sofa. We feedbacked this to a front desk agent by the name of Bronze but there was no follow up and when we called royal service for an update, they seemed unaware of the situation. The saving grace came from Amanda, the Night Manager on Duty. She explained the situation to us and was empathetic and even offered to

title: Staycation
desc: Very attentive to our request and good service... would like to commend on Mr Yu Hui's service as he is very approachable and try to assist us with our request and always putting on a smile... we love our stay here and would definitely come again. Of course we would appreciate a good discount too... üòÅ

title: Good connectivity to other places of interests and food and beverages, both above and underground.
desc: Generally satisfied. Should have more power points around the room Currently restricted to console at writing desk and bed. Also stopper in bath-tub in toilet was broken. Water could not drain. Had to personally remove it with bare hands. All else satisfactory.

title: Amazing staycation experience
desc: Had a great experience with my recent staycation in Fairmont Singapore. From check-in to check-out...all staff are very attentive. Quick check-in/out process - so no need to wait. Room was spacious - and seems newly renovated. Bring your personal water bottle - they have filtered water dispenser inside the room - no single use water to be provided.

title: What's a 5 star hotel without impeccable service
desc: The team goes all out to make sure the guest enjoy the stay. All requests were fully acceded beyond expectation. The team at the Entrance makes us feel like Royalty when our car reaches the drop off üëçSuper warm welcome greetings and help us offload our luggages. Check in at the counter was a breeze within 5min. I'll like to thank the reservation team for their effort in my change of room from 2041 to 1531. Room was clean with no musty smell. The kids enjoyed the room decor and toys. The water dispenser can be improved on the strength of water output. Hotel breakfast is an awesome spread of brunch menu. Overall we had a memorable stay.

title: Enjoyable stay.
desc: Overall the stay was a very enjoyable stay. I realise that the establishment the already of some age but some management to details would be eye pleasant. For example the head board of the bed was rather worn out and peeling. So it was rather sad sight to see for such a fine establishment. In-room dining menu for children and in general seemed a little limited, perhaps my preference would be a wider choice.

title: Moldy smell along corridor
desc: Well Located, but my husband and kids were sneezing throughout the first night. This is supposed to be my daughter's 9th Birthday staycation, but we were greeted by a dusty room and moldy smell along the common corridor. The aircon in the room 2111 is not functioning well into the middle of the night. We were sweating while sleeping. There was no complimentary carpark coupon given as the front desk [Mr. Bronze] advise that Fairmont Hotel and Raffles City shopping centre were two separate entity, and we were asked to ask the front desk everyday to see if there were any coupon which any guest do not need. Sounds like us begging for it. Pleased to see a chocolate cake arranged for my daughter birthday upon entering the room. A stow away bed was also set up with me calling twice

title: Singapore Travel
desc: Nice stay during Pandemic travel by Using VTL Flight from Kuala Lumpur to Singapore. Hotel Is very convenient, just on City Hall shopping centre with LRT station, restaurant and coffee house available.

title: Great Stay!
desc: Wonderful service and friendly staff. Fast check in process after online check in was done before arriving at hotel. Rooms were clean. Booking of facilities was quite easy too. Hotel also delivered a cake to the room as it was a birthday weekend for one of the guests. Booked the Cocomelon staycation.

title: Good location and well renovated room
desc: Booked the deluxe king room in the south tower. The room was well renovated and it was equipped with the new water purifier. Downside was the TV is not equipped with chrome cast. Overall we were satisfied with the hotel and their arrangement.

title: Great location and view
desc: The hotel is in a great location with good food and lots of shops to explore. The hotel staff are always polite, professional and helpful. There was no instance at all during my stay where I felt the service could be better. Every request that I have made has been met with great satisfaction. I am so happy with the service, location and the cleanliness of the room, so much that I have already booked another stay at the hotel. Thank you very much for the hotel staff for taking care of me and my needs. Extremely impressed!!!

title: good location
desc: The harbour view is very nice view especially at night. the room is clean and quiet. The pool is not big but still ok. The airconditioning in the room have sensor and sometimes its very hard to turn on.

title: Hello Kitty Staycation at Fairmont hotel
desc: We had a wonderful stay at Fairmont newly renovated Deluxe room over the weekends. The hello kitty mechandise were indeed very cute. The hotel was also very accomodating and agreed to my last min request to change the names on the dessert box which I was very impressed and grateful. The room itself was very nice and I loved that they have hot water readily available. The bed and pillow were one of the most comfortable ones I had in the hotels we stayed in. The breakfast in the morning was very good too. Service by service desk, housekeeping and restaurants were all great. Overall we had a wonderful stay at Fairmont.

title: The fabled Gold Service is unforgettable
desc: The fabled Gold Service was truly exceptional. AFOM Alfie took care of all our hearts‚Äô (undisclosed)desires from the moment we checked in. The Harborview room was opulent with a million dollar view and we were also prescribed a steady stream of delicious cocktails by Syakirah and Zhi Xin at the Gold Lounge that made us forget to check out. Overall 5/5 would return to Fairmont.

title: Still regal and convenience unmatched
desc: Reservation was a breeze. Staff were polite and courteous and accommodating Fairmont was a great stay. Nice room which was clean and spacious with a balcony overlooking pool. Room had everything from wine chiller, bathtub, water dispenser with hot and cold water Working table available with free wifi. Cable options decent on the television. Relax on the bed which was comfortable There‚Äôs not much of a view on 12th floor. Lifts functioned fast and swift. Fun part is accessibility. Stone throw from major Singapore attractions. Spoilt for options. Go to SKAI for brunch. Go to CHIJMES to unwind. Have access to shopping malls via the centralised train station that takes you anywhere in the city. Check in is 3pm and check out is 12pm. I didn‚Äôt go for a breakfast option but

title: Wonderful staycation at Fairmont!
desc: Just completed another wonderful staycay at Fairmont! Upgraded to room overlooking the Marina Bay this time, and the view is indeed stunning! We had some trouble with the room initially (broken shower holder and telephone) but this was resolved promptly. Shout out to the exceptional Fairmont Gold Lounge Team (Syakirah, Howard, Nigel, Marcus) for remembering our names and preferences. Syakirah also served us a delightful cocktail during the cocktail hours, her concoction "Blush for Me" was fruity and light, and so pretty in pink! Looking forward to our next stay!

title: Terrible sleep
desc: Good Location, Good Staffs. Room is spacious and very new since it's the newly revamp wing. But when it comes to sleep it was disastrous as the water dispenser machine keep auto re-boils the water every hour. In the day it was pretty acceptable since the boiling sound was already muffled by the tv volume, but during the night, we couldn't sleep at all as we are always awoken up by the loud boiling sound. Myself and my 2 children suffered with lack of sleep the next day which is contrary to the relax staycation that we actually planned. I sincerely hope the management looks into this as, everything was perfect..in fact top notch, it's such a waste.

title: Family Staycation
desc: This is a last min staycation. We booked our rooms in the morning just before our staycation. Norman from reservation team was very professional as he provided us good recommendation that suit our needs. He managed to help us book the last connecting rooms and last swim slot which we very much appreciate it. The rooms are clean and comfortable. The suite comes with a L shape sofa where kids can lazy around. TV control is not working well for both rooms but when we call the service desk , our request is attended very quickly even when the hotel is on full capacity. There are two pool in the hotel. One adult and one kids pool. Family with young kids can enjoy the 0.4m pool which my son enjoyed very much. With his 1m height,he can walk and play freely in the water .Not many hotel

title: Compliments to your staff
desc: I had a great high tea session at your hotel. Staffs are approachable and friendly. Special compliment goes to Mr Franz from Antidote for going the extra mile to help me with my handbag malfunction. Kudos to his patience and excellent service!

title: Poor communications and service
desc: - check in and out is smooth - amenities - we upgraded to 2 double beds but received 2 single beds instead. front desk unable to settle - we booked 'hello kitty' staycation but basically it's a few hello kitty merchandise on bed, so quite underwhelming. - we booked for 2 adults and 2 kids but room only have 2 sets of everything, incl. towels. nothing for kids. we have to call and ask and was told they don't have / don't provide. i have to offer solutions generally a very underwhelming experience.

title: Good Stay, lovely hotel with water-dispenser in room!
desc: This was a family staycay for my 6yo and 1yo. Hotel was accommodating to allow me postponed the stay due to family issue, and also to provide me a laydown mattress for my 1yo as she was too big for crib while dangerous to sleep on the bed in fear of her rolling down. We stay at the South tower which was newly renovated. I love the water dispenser for cold and hot water in the room! this was exceptional in-room facility that I didn't see in other hotels. the bath tub was really big and long too. only thing that wasn't so good in the room, was at night there is the rumbling sound of the water dispenser heating up the water. As it was right beside the bed so it was quite loud in the quiet night, perhaps they should install sound insolation at the cabinet to reduce the noise

title: Pawcation at the Fairmont Singapore
desc: The great thing here is Fairmont Singapore supporting and implementing Paw-cation that allows guests to have a staycation with a peace of mind - that is their pet is allowed to stay in the room with them! Kudos to this!! However it would be appreciated also that certain areas like the swimming pool and the breakfast restaurant (in this case is Prego) are structured for pets to be allowed in. Maybe a corner near the pool while the guests swim. And an area or even an outdoor seating to allow guests to eat together with their pet rather than taking turn to go for breakfast alone while one have to look after the pet in the room. Nonetheless I must applause the room service staff for going the extra mile to accommodate certain requests for us. Thank you! We hope this Paw-cation

title: Excellent location but the stay is ordinary
desc: I guess it's because this stay is FOC and given that I'm an Accor member, it doesn't help. The room is facing the office and there is no privacy unless the curtain is pulled. The whole experience was just not fantastic.

title: Doorman Robert
desc: Robert is very approachable and makes the effort to go to the check-in counter to confirm that I had a parking booking at Fairmont Hotel. He directed me directly into the parking lot by explaining to me how I was able to use the complimentary cashcard and how I could go in and out of the lot at any time. He explained clearly how I should return the cashcard to him before I left after checking out. He is a true role model and a true ambassador of the hotel. He is an asset to any hotel who appreciates such sincerity and hard work. Good luck to Robert and may he touch the lives of many more guests, making their stay a pleasant one. Sincerely, Toyota Wish Maroon 4 Makciks 16 & 17 March

title: Staycation with Lounge Access
desc: The trip was an extremely enjoyable one with superb service rendered by the staff especially those from the lounge. Howard and Shakira were excellent. They really went out of their way to make our stay as comfortable as possible. Topping up for the lounge access is really a good decision. Will definitely be back.

title: Birthday stayca
desc: Overall good experience at hotel Not bad to have hot n cold water dispenser Would be good to have more toiletries eg shaver in toilet sanitary bags Liked the bedroom slippers best i have had Comfortable bed n pillows

title: Comfortable and great stay
desc: Stayed at the hotel a few times to get a me-time. It had been great thus far. This time, i managed to book at the wing that was closed for SHN. Check-in was quick since i did an online check-in. The room was very well equipped, with water dispenser built in. It was a great option to have. It was kind of interesting to see the way the room was decorated. Kind of eclectic. The only issue i had though was that i had to wait more than an hour for a bucket of ice to be sent to the room. Had to put off what i had planned in the evening while waiting for it.

title: Remarkable stay!
desc: Overall, a great stay, a refreshing day and strongly recommend! It was one of the best staycations! Booked the Fairmont Gold Club room, and they generously upgraded to Gold Harbour view room. Also was offered 11am early check-in and 5pm late check-out. The thing I like about Fairmont was honesty in all the staff that they were generous to make your stay perfect (instead of some hotels to provide fake reasons like hotel is full etc.), that is what make me to TRUST the hotel for everything! Upon entrance also received a cute and delicious box of chocolate. Hotel itself is located in the heart of the town, and have access to everything nearby, including mall or MRT. The view was gorgeous (both from room and balcony) and undoubtedly one of the best with a renovated room in the

title: A "feel good & feel safe visit" ! Thank you Fairmont Singapore!
desc: My husband I grabbed the last 2 seats on SQ out of Hong Kong a week ago. It was a last minute decision and we were just glad we had time to obtain all the documentations required for our short stay in Singapore. It was an absolute delight to be back at the Fairmont Singapore. In short, we had a "feel good & feel safe " experience. A most pleasant stay! Shout out to the following team members..Jean , Norman, Amin, Howard, Bronze, Syakirah, Nigel, Marcus, Chef Glenn, Shi Xin and Eugene..Merci ! Bravo team Fairmont Singapore!

title: Exceptionally Excellent Service
desc: We planned to celebrate my wife's birthday and we decided to give Fairmount a try. We checked in with a warm and pleasant greeting at the lobby by Eddy and checked in by Bronze. We were checked into a king harbor view room. The room was facing a perfect city view if you would see MBS and the city skyline, this room is the best at series 33 and 34 south tower. Room was super clean and well prepared. One thing that we love was the hot and cold water dispenser in the room. We have young kids and often needed water for various reasons, this room feature serves its purpose at its best and its Eco friendly! Also, would like to specially thank to the housekeeping team Xiao Ping, Tweety, Jaqueline, Keh Jun and Soo Hun for preparing the surprise decoration to our room. Both my kids

title: Great Hotel super friendly and efficient.
desc: The hotel is in a prime position with easy access to the MRT and within walking distance of The bay. The super efficient Grab taxis are never far away the the rides no expensive. The staff are really super helpful and cheerful. The covid implementations are faultless and don‚Äôt feel oppressive. The breakfast staff at Prego deserve special mention, the buffet is closed due to covid but there was never a wait and the food arrived fantastically fast. So highly recommended for business or pleasure. The pool looked lovely too, if only I‚Äôd had the time for a swim.

title: Staycation at Fairmont
desc: GREAT experience at the Fairmont Singapore. The room is large and spacious, service is good. Housekeeping was fantastic and cleaned our room well and tidy. The Housekeeping staff was very thoughtful and arranged our things properly when we were out. Very good location in city centre with nice views. Would definitely come again. The hotel is also very creative and planning new ideas all of the time. They have the Hello Kitty Room that we will want to try the next time!

title: Fabulous Fairmont Doesn't Fail!
desc: My husband and I were planning to stay for 10 nights - he, on business, and me - for pleasure. From the moment we checked in, we have experienced nothing but warmth, friendliness and efficiency from the wonderful staff. Unfortunately, we have both come down with COVID and are now extending our stay. Fortunately, our room is spacious and comfortable and well appointed and they are taking good care of us. Special shout out to Geehte in Royal Services - she has done an admirable job fulfilling every request and her pleasant demeanor is a ray of sunshine in our days!

title: Staycat
desc: Room with excellent view on the 18th floor, 3-in-1: MBS, SG flyer and esplanade! Seamless check-in mode via mobile and fantastic customer service by Mr Bronze Teo at the counter. Wouldn‚Äôt mind a return trip.

title: Staycation
desc: Had a great stay at the Fairmont for a 1 night staycation. We asked to move rooms as wanted the marina/MBS view, which the team managed to do and it really was a fantastic view. Wanted to specifically share my thanks to Eugene from the front desk who helped find my headphones and really went all out to make sure I left with them. Thanks!

title: A great staycation
desc: Just had a wonderful 2 nights staycation at the Fairmont with my mum. It was a first time staycation experience for both of us and we had a most wonderful time. From the porter to the receptionist, housekeeping staff to the service staff of prego where we had the nicest of breakfasts, everyone of them was professional and so welcoming. There was ‚Äúwarmth‚Äù in the person to person interaction. Even the staff manning the safe entry points were cheerful and we could sense the joy and pride they had in bring part of a hotel culture that strives to create an unforgettable experience for all its guests, even local guests as it was in our case. Thank you Fairmont for this wonderful experience and to be treated in such a wonderful way especially on my birthday was a blessing. It was a

title: Overall good
desc: Good stay and conveniently located. One in particular is the shopping center is inside the complex. The other one which nice is the location of the antigen rapid test facility. It is just around the corner. Room was excellent, clean and fresh feel

title: Friendliest staff ever
desc: Love the central and convenient location. Shopping and MRT within reach. Absolutely love the elderly staff. Warms my heart, everytime I see Ismail who always has a smile for you in the morning. Will certainly be back to see them.

title: Fairmont Staycation
desc: Fairmont is always my favourite hotel where i go for staycation. This time round, i tried the renovated room in the South Tower. The front office staff were very helpful and friendly. The check-in process was very fast and smooth. My room was ready and access cards issued instantly with the pre-arrival registration. I was issued a room that offered spectacular view of the Marina Bay; overlooking the Esplanade, Marina Bay Sands and the CBD. The room was tastefully renovated, very spacious with 2 super comfortable Double beds. I specifically like the table with the L-shaped couch where i could do some works or have a light meal. Good numbers of power outlets were installed at the bedside and near the table that we could charge our phones and laptop easily. I like the

title: Great Staycation
desc: Had a very pleasant 2 night staycation at The Fairmont. From easy check in to extended check out, excellent friendly service, cocktail "hour" (2 hours) was wonderful. Special thanks to Howard, Bronze, Marcus, Nigel and Syakirah at the 25th Lounge.

title: A good hotel close to everything that matters in Singapore
desc: Hotel with nice rooms, particular care for the decor, rooms are spacious and quiet, well equipped. Room service is rather efficient, as well as laundry and spa. There are two swimming pools including one where one can swim. Housekeeping is extremely careful and precise - one feels like home very quickly.

title: valentine stay
desc: Stay in room 24-11. Whenever turn on shower tap, there is hammering sound. Unless fully turn more hot water, but cannot take so hot water. Suspected when more people using the shower, hammering sound will surface up. The bed is soft and good. Reception counter staff is helpful. Good location, High floor and better view.

title: Amazing stay and hospitality!!!
desc: Booked and stayed on 22nd February for our anniversary. Contacted the hotel and inform them of the occasion and to our surprise, we were given an early check-in and late check-out and a complimentary room upgrade to the deluxe habour view room! Check-in process was smooth and was given a room on the 23rd floor of the south tower on the day. We were amazed the moment we tapped the keycard and stepped into the room! The curtains opened automatically once we stepped in and revealed the amazing habour view and our bed was decorated with balloons, rose petals and towel swans! Really appreciate the amazing job from the housekeeping team :) The room itself was sparkling clean and beautiful, it is spacious at 45sqm. Bed is a king size and is very comfortable. Room also had a nice

title: Great service!
desc: It was unfortunate that I had turned positive during my stay but the hotel staff was very nice, especially the duty manager Alfie, who risked himself by attending to me. He was really nice to go the extra mile and buy coconut water for me. Thank you so much. The stay was very much appreciated and got my rest and recovered. Thank you to Bern who helped me with my bags when I checked out as a normal person. The room is comfortable, the toilet has a bath which I missed (great for families). Lucky for the balcony which I could have fresh air when I wanted. Thank you Fairmont for having me. Will be back again with my family soon!

title: Great location and service
desc: Very well located with friendly staff who provided excellent service. Only down side was a limited breakfast menu and fairly bad filter coffee (though when we mentioned this, the staff did make us coffee from the 'proper' machine).

title: Quality Stay
desc: I upgraded our Accor Plus complimentary room to a Harbour view room with lounge access for S$150++ for our overnight staycay,and were so glad we did. The room itself (2433) was stunning, with curtains automatically opening as we entered the room to show off the magnificent view. The bar setup was a winner as it incorporated an automatic hot and cold water dispenser, obviating the need for a kettle. Bathroom amenities were complete, including a toothbrush kit. Housekeeping was impeccable, with our room totally refreshed with new toiletries and bedroom slippers neatly placed on both sides of the bed on our return from dinner. Between the room and the lounge, we were not inclined to leave the hotel at all to hit the shops and walk the city. Special mention must be made of the

title: Good New Experience
desc: Staying with the theme on Pawcation. Pleasant time staying in the room and its spacious. However, there are no pet food provided and have to purchase from outside. There are no sharp edges within the room so even for active kids or pets, the risk of getting injure is minimal. The dining menu displayed on the tv differ from the menu scanned via QR code; but the in-room dining service person is very patient and helpful to take down our order. For breakfast, it is also not pet-friendly. In another words, we have to get our breakfast in the room and not able to enjoy outside of the room. Overall, there is room for improvement but the service and the environment are still pleasant for a good staycation.

title: Good location, services and room
desc: Location - located inside Raffles City mall, easily accessible to train and shops in the mall. There are varieties of food to choose from. Room - clean, spacious and view is fantastic. Love their showel gel, shampoo and condition. Smells nice. Oh, toothbrush and toothpaste are provided as well in case you forgot yours. Services - housekeeping is a must daily and their staffs are majority friendly. Definitely, a must to come back.

title: Good Stay, Good Room.
desc: Pro : Love the room, Good Service, Good in-room facility like the water tap with hot/cold. Housekeeping is nice and friendly, help to clean the room well. Very impress with her services. Hotel reservation team was very helpful in assisting on a screwup by Klook. Con: The water tap will auto-reheat randomly, the sound is abit unbearable. The fridge is weird, not sure is spoilt or what. Quite warm and lastly i dont know why there is no drink in the fridge. Not sure why was given such a low floor.

title: Good Stay at Fairmont Singapore
desc: Stayed for 1 nite for celebrating my wife birthday. A pleasant hotel that you will find all the required service and facilities. Hotel staff service standard just normal don't really match up to the name of Fairmont. Not very attentive Concierge, so be sure to ask around if you need help at the front desk. For a 5 star hotel, I personally think there's better one out there. But if you like the location sure this hotel is conveniently located near the City hall MRT station.

title: üíØ
desc: 10/10 room and service!!!!!!!!!! the room was so pretty and the view was also amazing. love the bathroom as well as the hotel‚Äôs facilities! fairmont will be one of the hotels that i will consider going back to ‚ò∫Ô∏è‚ò∫Ô∏è

title: Great staff is the key to the most exceptional experience at Fairmont Singapore
desc: A beautiful hotel with modern rooms and awesome facilities. The spa is fabulous and I am grateful to Yan who is such an amazing therapist easing my muscle aches away. The gym is well-equipped and all the restaurants are world-class. However, what makes me want to come back is the professional, knowledgeable and friendly staff. From the check-in team, concierge, luggage handling, security team, housekeeping, in-room dinning to the staff at the spa - they are all very professional. I felt very well-taken care of at Fairmont. I do want to highly commend the two incredible guest service officers David and Robert for their superior service. They are the face of Fairmont amazingly manage chaotic traffic while patiently meet the needs of every guests, even the disabled

title: Well located, good stay, diverse menu, friendly and helpful staff
desc: I was really enjoyed the seven-day quarantine at Fairmont. The room is large and fully equipped with smart TV, coffee machinery, a spacious bathroom. Also, my room had a wide balcony with a city view so it doesn't make me feel stuffy during the long stay. Thanks, Fairmont!

title: Calm amidst the Chaos
desc: I did a solo staycation in Fairmont and had a blast. The staff were very friendly and accommodating. I had the opportunity to get a massage at the Spa and lounge by the pool. Both times were very relaxing and the staff didn't hesitate to check-up on me regularly. I felt safe and relaxed amidst the hustle and bustle in the city.

title: SUPERB HONEYMOONCAYTION
desc: AMAZING STAY RIGHT AFTER MY WEDDING DAY! Superb service from the staff throughout the stay! Awesome breakfast for in-room dining and everything was freshly out and prepared well! Also, got an awesome view of the another side of City Hall area!

title: Staycation Break
desc: As a couple we went on a staycation for valentines day. The experience was great and we enjoyed a wonderful stay. From checkin to checkout it was a breeze. Centrally located with friendly staff. Breakfast menu was good and a good spread. Superb.

title: CNY StayCay
desc: Our 2nd time staying at Fairmont. Truly enjoyed the StayCay. Pre-arrival registration was really convenient and check-in was breeze and hassle free. The team are attentive to our request. Love the express check out too!

title: Impeccable
desc: I always choose to stay at the Swissotel the Stamford Hotel, reason been its Very centrally located near Marina Bay, City Hall MRT and buses at your door step. Due to hotel been locked down, booked in at the Fairmont Hotel located in the same complex. Unfortunately, during my 20 day‚Äôs stay, was in quarantine for 10 days, during my stay in was awesome excellent service from in room dining, management and staffs are welcoming a good example of hospitality, I love the entire hotel especially the walk out balcony with amazing view. I would like to thank of all the employees of Fairmont Hotel (Singapore) please accept my appreciation for the excellent job you and your staff have done over the past 20 days in making my stay comfortable while in isolation. Once again Thank you all for

title: Very enjoyable and pleasant stay
desc: Pre-arrival registration was very convenient and check-in was a breeze. We love the newly renovated South Tower room. Our DELUXE HARBOUR KING was large enough for 2A2C with a rollaway bed. There are lots of food options downstairs within Raffles City even though we did not opt-in for Prego breakfast. Our room had a fantastic view of the entire Marina Bay. We appreciate the green initiative of having a dedicated filtered water dispenser and a reusable water bottle at the pantry instead of plastic water bottles. We look forward to go back again.

title: Very nice staycation and great staff :)
desc: I had a great time in Fairmont - beautiful spacious clean room, a big bathtub, and great staff :) Very good location and very convenient with the mall just downstairs. Only thing is that my room's windows and balcony faces other rooms so people can see each other - a little lack of privacy there. The staff quickly accommodated my requests each time I called the Royal Service hotline. All in all a great stay.

title: Awesome Staycation at Fairmont!
desc: My heartfelt gratitude and appreciation to the Fairmont Gold Lounge team for their impeccable service and care during my weekend staycation. My partner and I love the newly renovated Ambassador Suite that comes with an awesome view of the Marina Bay skyline. Special thanks to Eddy from Front Office, Syakirah, Amin and the Gold Lounge Team - who had made our stay so enjoyable. Thank you again for providing such an outstanding service.

title: Excellent service, Great location and impressive interior design,
desc: Being a frequent traveler (>100 nights/year pre-Corvid 19), I was impressed with Fairmont's excellent and warm guest services during current challenging times. The guest room interior is luxurious, very nice, and with fantastic views to the Padang. Overall experience is Fantastic, my Best hotel stay in Singapore so far!

title: Fairmont Singapore Gold lounge
desc: I stayed at Fairmont Singapore Gold. The team at the Gold lounge is really dedicated and attentive to our requests and preferences. Good quality selection of canap√©s during cocktail hour. A big thank you to the team for making our stay so memorable! Will definitely return again soon and of course, will opt for the Fairmont Singapore Gold room again.

title: Very comfortable and enjoyable Pawcation
desc: Very comfortable and enjoyable stay with family and puppy. Was impressed the hotel actually dedicated an entire high floor for this package with great view and good convenient location. Despite my last minute request to change to another room due to an additional request, it was accomodated. Overall the food and a night's stay was great....regretted not booking another night as we're sad to leave so fast !

title: Best SP Hotel stay yet
desc: I was looking forward to my stay as I've never stayed at Fairmont Singapore. Compared to 2 neighbours I have stayed at - the J W Marriott and Parkroyal Marina - the Fairmont beats em hands down. The checkin was fairly quick - I had pre-checked in and got a QR code so that may have saved a bit of time but you still have to Q and get the paperwork done. I don't think being an accor plus member helps speed up the process - there is a counter with the accor plus signage but that's about it - it's still first come first served. The South Tower is the place to stay as the North is not renovated and NO bathtubs. The lift service was amazing and I never had to wait more than a minute literally. The room (I had connecting Harbour View rooms) were absolutely fantastic. The curtains open

title: Wonderfully relaxing time in newly renovated deluxe room.
desc: After the 4 nites we were very tempted to extend our stay as the whole experience of waking up to marina Bay View was fantastic. The newly renovated room much more comfy. Service from housekeeping was good. Breakfast was fun daily with our short chats with George at Prego. Enough variety to last our 4 Breakfast n hearty meals too. Dining concierge svc was good too. House of Wei - yumz. Spa facilities n pool not too crowded during the times we used.

title: Professional and comfortable - great people and quality hotel
desc: Enjoyable and relaxing despite the covid situation. Employees were flexible, helpful and happy - nice to be in that environment. Amanda at front desk was amazing in taking care of everything and the staff there are generally super-nice and helpful.

title: Blessing in Disguise
desc: Had the opportunity to stay here for one-night after being relocated by another Accor property. Got an upgrade (Thanks to Accor's loyalty program) to their renovated room facing the iconic MBS skyline on a high floor which was great. Shout out to Amada for the upgrade as well as Wei Jie for the quick check in. Overall, everything was great and I'll definitely be back to try the other room categories in the South Tower.

title: Worse luxury hotel in SG
desc: Ordered eggs over medium it came scrambled eggs. Asked housekeeping to clean room came back 2 hours later room cleaned but bathroom still unclean. Called them to clean bathroom and they came. After 30 mins bathroom still no cleaned properly. Can't believe they charge $700 a night for this lousy hotel. Do not stay here

title: Avoid Fairmount SHN (stay at home notice) package
desc: I wouldn't recommend Fairmont for anyone needed to take a government issued Stay at Home Notice (7 days). I think Fairmont management just looked into this, not as a packaged to welcome their guests, but as a money opportunity that could live outside of their quality and experience standards.. Praticalities of my stay. Very limited food menu, a 1-star food experience. Very, very poor wifi speed, unless you pay 30SGD extra per day. laundry service not provided as part of the booking. Water and toiletries available only upon request. And the very worst? a room with clear signs of poor cleansing from previous guest stay (dust and even leftover trash pieces). Not a place anyone wants to stay during 7 days.

title: Great staycation to end Ox Year
desc: Overall had a great stay with mom. This is my repeat visit as a platinum member too. Had an upgrade to its new DLX KING room with MBS view. Room was impressive with nice layout, nepresso machine, water dispenser and a glass bottle for outdoor use too. As usual love their toiletries and TWG tea. Breakfast at Prego and this time improved a lot with wide menu selection including many types of fresh juices. Great stay!

title: Pawcation
desc: Very friendly well appointed hotel. We went on pawcation, whole floor is for pets. Nice dog bed and bowls for the furry guest. Even had a little balcony for him to check out the world from. Will definitely go back

title: CNY Staycation
desc: Renovated rooms were well furnished. The bathtub was a needy to have to refresh and recharge for the new year The staff were efficient in assisting to our requests. They are attentive on listening and providing the necessary advice.

title: started with some issues and continued but the bed was OK
desc: an overall comment. For SHN for 10 nights, the room should be equipped for that. say few extra towels, more than 4 bottle of water, coffee, shampoo... not the same quantities as for person staying one night. so, started with, i was registered with wrong last name, meaning i could access to internet, called front desk... easy... last name and room number, but it did not work... after few phone calls and I asked how they write my last name we discover the mistake... so learning write down the in logging info the key. card, and after 3 days i got a phone call from IT as well. later the first day i got a phone call from someone.... sorry for the confusion and what to do... I told them about the water, shampoo etc... Not a problem, we fix.... but nothing happen... so after a new

title: Pokemon staycay
desc: Spacious room with dining area and glorious skyline views. Beds a little small for two (we were two children and an adult) but worked fine when pushed together. Love the le labo toiletries and deep bath.

title: Not bad Staycay
desc: Stayed at 1137. Had asked for higher floor but Wei Jie told us at check in that is the highest. Bed was too soft and we could not sleep well the first night. Called reception at around 7.30am to let them know that they have to overturn the bed every other month as the head side was too soft compared to the leg area. Stiffed shoulder and neck that morning. Also had to call them to wipe down the bathroom door as I could see the layer of dust and I was sneezing as I have si us and could not take in dust. Told Eugene at the recep desk about the bed and he asked is everything was alright the next day. Had to asked to wipe down the door as there was still dust. Eugene was very warm and welcoming unlike We Jie, he could have done a lot better that noon when checking us in. Floor was

title: Staycation
desc: Got a deluxe room during my staycay from 28/01 - 30/01 . From the moment I got out of the car, I was greeted by the lovely bellboy who had kindly assisted me with my luggage, which were immediately brought into the room. The check-in process was seamless, with no hiccups in between at all. The lady greeted us with a warm tone and she was so accommodating to our requests. We even took up the offer to upgrade to a harbour view deluxe room, and I wasnt disappointed. The room was spectacular, especially the view and the bathroom. The room was spacious and I had a comfortable stay. They were pretty generous with the in-room amenities such as the soap, coffee capsules etc when requested. The pool was perfect for swimming laps and the gym was HUGE. undoubtedly the best hotel in city

title: Good location, easily accessible, staff were friendly and nice, comfortable room
desc: Love that there is a tennis court, wish the rental was covered for paying guests rather than having to top up. The room is very big and clean however one of the drinking glasses were dusty as we saw white particles in it when we filled it with water.

title: Good but can be better.
desc: Got a Deluxe double double room for staycation. Service at the Fairmont is great with friendly staff and prompt service. The room decor is modern and I like their automated 1-touch light setting for relax mode. Their no pool no matter package is a good option if you are like me who avoids the sun and prefers to enjoy a bottle of GH Mumm champagne. However the experience can be improved. I was planning to binge on Netflix during this staycation. After switching on the TV then I realized that the 55‚Äô tv does not support Chromecast compared to the TV in their lower grade Fairmont room at my last visit. Asked their staff and was told I need to pay for an upgrade to a north tower room with older decor if I want to have Chromecast. It puzzles me why their refurbished south tower

title: Excellent hotel
desc: Fairmont has offered very competitive prices to attract the staycation crowd and they never failed to impress. Certainly under rated for the quality and pricing they charged. Service was great, without all the check in drama. They were very communicative via email and all the requests were promptly replied! I stayed on NYE, during school holidays and weekends. Everything was great! Overall would come back again!!! Can‚Äôt wait for the next visit!

title: good stay
desc: This is not my first stay but my first time for this year. Room: Nice and organize View: (My paid more for the view) My floor level is not that high so I can't take nice picture. I didn't use the facilities this round. So i spent my time to try the restaurant here which surprisingly turn out quite good. The cons: The noise from the water dispenser (cos I am a light sleeper) and carpark. I hope they can provide free car park entry for all their hotel guests definitely will attract more locals. I will definitely come back to stay so i can try other room type for my overseas guests

title: Perfect Stay
desc: The room was spacious and the service was excellent. The in-room dining was good and the food was nice. The room was good but the aircon was switched off at night making the room stuffy. Please look into this.

title: Enjoyable Stay
desc: Check in was smooth. Personnel who assisted with check in was friendly and accommodating. Explained everything well. Room was perfect! I liked the move towards saving plastic bottles by having a water dispenser in the room. Bed was comfortable. Amenities were good. Main issue was the inability to reserve gym on the day of check in. Also noticed that the bedroom slippers were different than before. In my previous stay, the fairmont slippers were fluffier and more comfortable.

title: Fairmont Singapore Review (Deluxe Suite)
desc: From the moment we alighted at the hotel lobby, right up till we arrive in our room, we've been greeted with utmost professionalism. The bell-boy (Mr. David) and concierge staff (Mr. Ryan) was absolutely helpful and friendly! We've been given an upgrade to a deluxe suite because we were on our honeymoon! Service is top notch and the staff really acknowledged the occasion.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: Had a wonderful experience dining at Prego. Staffs are all friendly and service are great! Love their food especially their salmon fish. Juicy and savoury. Had a great CNY staycation throught my stay. Had a nice harbour view and it was very beautiful at night. Lastly, i will take to take this opportunity to thank and compliment all the staffs that are working on CNY for their hardwork and their service is excellent! THANK YOU!

title: Excellent poolside staff
desc: Jose from the poolside was very helpful and attentive. He went out of his way to help us and he cleared and refilled our water without being asked. Indeed made the experience more special. A great way to start the stay:)

title: Kudos to Steven & Saleh - Swimming Pool / The Eight Staff and Hotel phone operator
desc: Excellent initiative & service. We were there 2 weeks ago, have been impressed and our latest stay on Jan 22, again was made wonderful by both Steven & Saleh. Kudos to Steven & Saleh! Additional mention to Addy - hotel operator, very cheerful greetings and very importantly, extremely helpful to our queries!!

title: Excellent Stay
desc: We had lunch at Asian Market Cafe before heading to check in to our night stay accommodation at Fairmont Singapore. The view was great. The room was fantastic. Love the interior and arrangements of the room. We felt like royalty! We will return!

title: Great Location with a beautiful view.
desc: Booked staycation for the family. Room looks clean and tidy. Great location with a beautiful view.A lot of places to visit since it‚Äôs in the city area. The staffs are very friendly and accommodating.. Will definitely come back again

title: Hotel stay
desc: Gladys Tan she remember me and i really had a good time here. Environment was ok. Free bday cakes on both dates of visit. Staff was friendly. Gladys help me arrange for room that suits my needs. Awesome

title: Memorable stay with Fairmont
desc: Went to Fairmont for a staycation with my family and I requested for a room with a nice view since it was my first time staying in this hotel. The front desk staff, Gladys, kindly gave us a room with a harbour view and even delivered a box of chocolate with a handwritten card. Really appreciate such a sincere gesture that made our stay unexpectedly memorable!

title: Pokemon Themed staycation
desc: Awesome staycay for the family to celebrate birthday. Breakfast was delightful spread! Big thank you for all staff who assist during our stay especially Ryan from the front desk who handled my check-in & check out transaction smoothly. We did receive the pokemon redemption upon participating the con test. Thank You Fairmont!

title: Unexpected surprise
desc: Was brought over from Sofitel City Centre to Fairmont with no issues with the reservation when I checked in. I was told that the room reserved does not have a bathtub and am delighted to be given a room with a higher floor with bathtub at an affordable upgrade charge since the room I booked for in Sofitel has a bathtub present. Thank you Jazila for the smooth check in. During the stay, housekeeping was perfect with their cleanliness throughout. I love the new refurbished room as well in the South Wing specifically room 2140. Pool was empty as well at the point of booking a slot at 10am. Operator was friendly when I asked for a fork and spoon and I was delivered a set of cutlery instead nicely wrapped with a small plate. Thanks Prabhu for the delivery of the fork and spoon

title: AMAZING!!
desc: Had a beautiful staycay at Fairmont and it's definitely amazing! Kudos to Alfie, Amin, Adrian and Zhixin at the club lounge for being so friendly and accommodating!! Their evening cocktails and breakfast have a huge variety and scrumptious!! Thank you so much and I can't wait to be back again!

title: Superbly friendly service at Fairmont Singapore
desc: Had an enjoyable and comfortable one-night staycation at the Fairmont Singapore. The staff are superbly friendly from the moment we entered the hotel. Staff approach us immediately while you wait in queue at check in/out counters. Very understanding and inclusive too of my adult son with ID. Had a lovely breakfast at Prego too! Thumbs up to quality service !!

title: Can‚Äôt wait to be back again!
desc: We stayed on a weekday for one night and we were given an early check-in, late check-out and a room upgrade. It was our first time staying here and we are truly thankful and appreciative of the wonderful hospitality given. The signature salon suite is spacious and has two balconies with views overlooking the marina bay and city hall area. The bathroom features an oversized bathtub and Le Labo toiletries (Rose 31 - smells so damn good). A massive thank you to Amin and the club team for making our stay a memorable one. The team were really friendly and service is great!

title: Friendly staff, nice hotel room and great breakfast
desc: It‚Äôs my 2nd time staying at fairmont and definitely not the last. Front desk staff Ryan was friendly and helpful and answer to all my enquiries during check in. Zhi Xin was friendly when helping with my checkout. Room is clean and I like that their newly renovated room comes with water dispenser and I personally find that it‚Äôs more environment friendly and hygienic. Bathroom is clean and my boy enjoyed himself in the bathtub. Room view is good facing the MBS. Only downside about the room is the TV. Unable to connect to phone for casting and it would be better if it‚Äôs a smart TV. Breakfast at Prego was fabulous and delicious. Staffs are friendly and helpful. Overall experience was a good one and I can‚Äôt wait to go back again!

title: 3/5. Convenient Location, Clean Room, Lovely Tub
desc: Location of the hotel was convenient from the MRT. The room was clean and spacious, with the basic grooming necessities. We appreciated that there was a drinkable water tap, with cool or hot water option. Based on the standards and price point of this hotel, the beverages and snack bar was poorly stocked. Not sure if it's due to COVID regulations. Fridge was empty - no complimentary snacks in room. Beverages were between 1 type of TWG tea sachets and only 2 different types coffee capsules. (there are labels on the pantry that indicate more varieties than offered). The tub and bathroom were very clean. We were a little put off that the shower, toilet bowl and bathtub were in the same room with no partition. As an asian, it is important to note, THERE IS NO BIDET. (If one were

title: Petcaytion was nicely managed
desc: Lovely hotel with Friendly staff that are well train. Pet friendly, lovely location within many Food and shopping outlets. Smooth efficient check-in and Check-out. Pet amenities were provided. Room was clean and well appointed. Well stock with amenities and covid safety essentials

title: Bad Stay
desc: I got a deluxe room with King size bed. Unable to sleep well due to the water dispenser which was in the built in cabinet. It will be noisy whenever the system need to heat up for the hot water. Thus disturbing my rest. But the overall for the cleanliness and service of the staffs are good

title: Fantastic service at an amazing hotel
desc: I stayed at Fairmont's Deluxe room for 2 nights and we experienced Fairmont's exceptional hospitality service right from the start when checking in. Special gratitude and shout out to Alfie, who definitely served from his heart and was truly exemplary - we were in the line to check-in for <5 mins, but Alfie apologised for keeping us waiting and opened up another check-in counter just to serve us. I had some trouble scanning the QR code from my mobile and he even rushed to help me with this (instead of just instructing from behind the glass). We were celebrating our anniversary and he congratulated us sincerely for our special occasion and also sent a lovely cake to the room. We declined his offer to bring up our bags as we could manage it, but he checked and asked if we were

title: Curtain opens automatically as we step into the room, ‚Äúcalling‚Äù us to the balcony!
desc: First time staying in the new deluxe habourview room in south tower thanks to Jean & James for choosing this perfect room for me & my partner! Check In was efficient & extremely personalized üòç The wow factor happens the moment we opened the door and the curtain at the far end of the room opens automatically leading us towards the unblock view of marina bay! Also visited Prego & Asian Market Cafe during the stay, and finally had the new buffet spread (finally not aka carte buffet) and love it! ü§§

title: Always Good & Warm
desc: Two years and 40 trips, still as good and as warm. Never seem to tire of this Fairmont home-away-from-home, which becomes our kitchen for feasts galore. Thank you MD Marcus, HM Robert, DFOO Jean, GM F&B Emmanuel, ADFB Jie Ming, ADFB Sourav, Exec Chef Wong and the entire Fairmont Team out there or back there somewhere to make things tick - Front Office Chezza, Jasmine; Housekeeping Myra; Concierge Ian, Mike; Communications Eddy Tan; Mikuni Keisuke-san, Elaine-san, Frannie-san, Abe-san; Prego CK Lee, Geraldine, Kevin, Katy, Gn; House of Wei Master Chef Mok, RM Fion; Antidote Guna; and, more, too many to recount in this space. Thank you, all. The challenge is for you to keep up the good and warm service. We are not about to trade in this Fairmont for another.

title: Refurbished Rooms and a Warm Welcome
desc: Stayed in the refurbish room located in the South. Rooms were handsomely furnished with wood and leather accents, and bathroom was quite breathtaking in itts design and spaciousness. Room had this amazing water filter that dispensed hot and cold water; and had too much nespresso for my own good. Wanted to give a shout out to Front Desk Jamie who checked me in warmly, and made me feel invited as a guest. Thanks Jamie!

title: Great view for my birthday celebration
desc: I celebrated my birthday as well as my wedding anniversary celebration in Fairmont. My hubby and I, we had a 2 night stay there. I paid a hefty upgrade from the Fairmont Room in North Tower to Fairmont Gold Deluxe Harbour View Room in South Tower. Upon arrival at the hotel, we were escorted to level 25 gold lounge for check-in. Upon check-in, they did not verify my AccorPlus Gold membership where I was supposed to be issued with 2 complimentary drinks vouchers. In the end, I had to call in to request for them and get them send in to my hotel room. The hotel had provided us with welcome amenities and a birthday cake for me. The room which we stayed was located at level 23 and the view was definitely fantastic and I can‚Äôt bear to leave the hotel room most of the time. And

title: Fairmont stay
desc: Big & cozy room with an balcony, currently there a theme event going on , Pok√©mon staycation believe it will be popular with the kids. There only coffee & tea provided in room so do bring your own snacks.

title: Daycation
desc: Me and my boyfriend truly enjoyed our daycation at Fairmont! The service provided was superb, thanks to Jazlina we gotten an complimentary upgrade to the south tower deluxe room. Enjoyed ourselves at the pool. Kei Lu and Xin Yue then surprised us with a platter of fresh fruits and chocolates! Check out was smooth with Eugene as well! I can foresee myself coming back to Fairmont again to try out the Fairmont Gold Lounge! Kudos to everyone!

title: Good Location & Nice Hotel
desc: Hotel is well located with shopping and plenty of food choices. Check-in was flawless with pre-registration. Room is very spacious and clean. The room we got have a very nice view. Enjoyed our stay very much.

title: Wonderful service
desc: Although our room had some unexpected design flaws in the bathroom, they did not detract from the overall comfort. The highlight of our stay at Fairmont Singapore, however, was the extremely high level of customer service. Lounge staff made us always feel welcome and well looked after, Howard, in particular, provided excellent service. Breakfast omelettes were perfect!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Staying there twice in January 2022. First stay was on the 3rd to 4th where we booked the base room and upgraded to South Tower Signature as Accorplus platinum. The room was bright and clean, bathtub was big, welcome gift of fruits, welcome drinks and bfast at Prego included. Early check in late check out request was accommodated. All went well. The second stay was on the 10th to 11th, using AccorPlus voucher and upgraded ourselves for Marina View Room with Gold Lounge Access. Very impressed with the room and the magnificent room, amenities set was of Dr Labo, boxes of chocolate were put on the desk along with some fruit in a basket. As we checked in around 09:30 am we decided to check the lounge directly and received a very warm welcome from Amin who offered us bfast. In

title: Extremely comfortable and pleasant stay
desc: Experience and service was excellent from the moment I arrived at the hotel lobby to check out. Room service and housekeeping was polite and prompt. Room was spacious, well-designed and clean. Bath tub filled up really quickly and it was a nice deep tub. Only stayed 1 night and I felt well-rested enough.

title: Good Stay and Well located
desc: The experience was good. The checking in was very smooth with the mobile check-in. The room was very cleaned and the hotel staff is very helpful, friendly and knowledgeable. Overall, a very good experience for the family.

title: A stay out of this world
desc: My wife and I would like to thank Amin, Howard, Shakira, & the rest of the service crew for the amazing 4 days stay at Fairmont Singapore. The team has tirelessly given top notch service and remember the smallest details during the short conversations with us. We are very thankful for the complimentary room upgrade offered and have thoroughly enjoyed the amenities the room has to offer. It's definitely one of the most comfortable and spacious rooms we have been in. The service crew blew our minds too, every night while we were at the lounge having drinks, they would prepare the room and toilet for our bath and sleep. The breakfast spread, evening drink selection, & canap√©s are all delicious, and we're so full after breakfast that, we skipped lunch and enjoy the offerings

title: Signature gold suite birthday staycation
desc: Fantastic staycation for my boy birthday! Booked the signature gold king suite with the gold lounge access. Nice view from the balcony, photos taken by my son. What I love the most is Fairmont Gold offers guests staying in Fairmont Gold rooms an added privilege of enjoying daily breakfast and evening cocktails with hors d‚Äôoeuvres at the exclusive Fairmont Gold Lounge. My boys under 12 cannot access during the 5.30pm evening cocktails and thanks to the attentive staff in Gold Lounge. This staycation makes my stay a memorable one with my boys inside the suite room having their meals delivered to room and I am able to enjoy the evening with my husband. Thank you Fairmont Gold for the surprise cake, I will always remember all of you there, your love care snd attentiveness. We will

title: New room, pleasant stay.
desc: Well-appointed room with good views albeit freezing temperatures as the thermostat did not seem to work. Nice touch with the heated mirror that prevents misting after a hot bath/shower and bathtub was roomy and elegant. Overall a good experience but more personal touches could be improved on.

title: Short but fantastic retreat
desc: Had a wonderfully relaxing time at the hotel. The room decor is beautifully classy and luxurious and it was quiet. Great for working away from the office or retreat. I got a cake to celebrate a friend's birthday as well and it was delicious. Had lunch at Prego and the food was divine. Staff were also extremely polite, helpful and friendly. Thank you for making my stay enjoyable and memorable! I'll be back again! PS Love the toiletries!! Where can I buy them?!

title: Great hotel for a family vacation
desc: We (family of 4) found our stay at Fairmount to be a truly relaxing one. The hotel is strategically located next to a mall and above the train station. There are plenty of eateries around. The view for the room type we took was simply exceptional. The rooms are new and beautifully renovated. A short walk down brings you a beautiful walk around the Merlion and the waterway there. The hotel package we took included dining credits which we used for the Prego Italian restaurant on site. Dinner was simply beautiful as with the breakfast provided by the hotel. Despite being in a hotel in town, it was a relaxing experience for my husband, myself and our two teenage daughters. The adjoining rooms allowed for a much needed family bonding time.

title: Well located
desc: The room is spacious and good customer service as my request for early checkin is granted . the toiletries provided are good quality from le labo rose 31 series as i get to tried their product for the first time. i enjoyed the staycation. Just that the the entry to the hotel through raffles city are inconvenient after the mall operating hour as i need to route a longer way after 1030pm from the MRT exit to reach to the hotel, i hope the inconvenient can be resolve to have more convenient to access the hotel after mall operating hours.

title: Great views! Fabulous business hotel in the city
desc: Took a staycay and got the Harbour View which faces the Marina view. Wonderful time and the room was excellent for both work calls and personal time. Dining at the hotel's restaurants was also delightful - reservations were smooth and it was easy to get a drink before dinner.

title: Simple quiet stay.
desc: Reservation Divvya was quick clear and detailed in her emails and so was Stephanie when she first offered the available rates and packages. I was a little offended by Ben in the way he replied about the wifi. Haha, my friend and I just laughed it off because he could just have said ‚Äúthe room does come with a complimentary wifi‚Äù instead of his choice of words in the email. Room was good, amazing view on the high floor. Could have been better if the bathtub was thoroughly cleaned and the toiletries - toothpaste was of a better brand since it‚Äôs a suite room, really. Mouthwash wasn‚Äôt provided too, strangely. It was a quick quiet weekend stay with a friend and we just wanted it to be fuss free. Would have given a 5 if the special request for birthday amenity I requested was

title: Staycation
desc: Stayed at the Fairmont for a much needed break and it was one of the best staycay I've ever had so far!! Booked the Fairmont Gold King and everything was smooth from check in to check out. Wei Jie at front desk was very prompt and accommodating to me and I truly appreciated it. He surprised me with an upgrade and the view from my room was spectacular. The room was impeccable and clean. It's been newly renovated so it was really beautiful. Warm and cozy with wood finishes. The stay comes with access to the Fairmont Gold lounge and your stay elevates from there. We had evening cocktails and canap√©s and were served by Bronze and Adrian. Both of them were so warm, friendly and professional. We felt well taken care of! They were very attentive towards the guests and I would love to

title: Last staycation of 2021!
desc: It was my last staycation of 2021. I was glad to be back to Fairmont, my favourite hotel! I have stayed in Fairmont many times in 2021. The location is good. Most importantly is the staff are friendly and approachable. It was a busy period but they still serve with a smile. Thanks Fairmont and see you in 2022! Will be back for more beautiful memories!

title: Excellent Hospitality provided :) A great way to start the year 2022
desc: Decided to start the year 2022 with a staycation and booked the Fairmont Gold room for my family. This come with exclusive access to the Gold Lounge and I would have to commend Mr. Amin and his team whom provided exceptional hospitality to my family and I. Their service attitude is exactly what you would like to have when looking for a relaxing getaway. They were attentive to our needs and able to cater for any requests that we had, creating an amazing stay for us. Highly recommended for everyone to try, it's very much more worth than what you would be paying :P

title: FAIRMONT HOTEL
desc: Excellent hotel for holidays with family. Service provided was good and the staff are friendly and able to accommodate us without any hassle. Staff are able to answer questions without any issues. Food was good and the waiter was friendly to serve the food. We need not to queue up and save time.

title: Not bad
desc: Overall is good. Faulty USB plug in room, unable to charge phone. Tv unable to use the chromecast as stated. Entry from carpark at night troublesome, door is locked and we were stuck outside for abit. Service is pretty good, and breakfast is better than average

title: well located, easy to go anywhere.
desc: The service is good. It is located at city centre but provide free parking. It has shopping mall, restaurant, food market beside it, it is so convenient to shop, meal. It is very convenient take a bus or train to anywhere you like.

title: Good Location !
desc: Good location with shopping malls and MRT station nearby. The room is spacious too even with an additional bed (3 single beds) If they can do something about their air conditioning it will be good. It gets hot and cold, although the temperature reading never changes! It gets very uncomfortable at night. It will be fantastic if the hotel can consider upgrading their rooms. Overall is it's a good stay with friends.

title: Staycation
desc: Disappointed overall on the services of recent experience.. call with no response or simply divert without making it done.. Limited breakfast choices.. restaurants quality getting poor. except the view from the room‚Ä¶..

title: Staycation
desc: Big rooms with modern tv and great channels,comfy beds, hotel well located, Halal breakfast at Asian Cafe and free parking. Easy access to nearby malls and attractions. MRT trains station right below.

title: New signature king room a must
desc: Excellent services from Kei Lu at the check in counter. She is very accommodating and truly serve towards to your preferences. I am totally awe by her services. I got the new signature king room is spacious and the bed is great to sleep on. Everything is perfect for a comfortable and cosy stay except for the bathing area. The bathing area the glass coverage is too short hence water tends to splashed out. There are no hangers in the bathing area so one has to get out dripping to collect the towel from outside the bathing area. The best feature is the amenities/bar cabinet where there is instant hot and cold water tap, totally enjoyed the convenience of having a hot beverage. Well done again! Thanks Fairmont for a great stay!

title: Not the best staycay definitely
desc: The concierge team were polite and warm in their welcome. Upon check in, I appreciate that the staff was patient in sorting out the room documentation. That naturally took time and we were fine with it. In fact, we thanked her gratefully for processing them without problem. The staff overseeing the long queues were also efficient and responsive in attending to queries. At night, there's one person station beside the lift to verify that you are occupants. Another staff is actively looking out to ensure that everyone goes through the check. Once the room number's verified, you are clear to go up. The process is seamless and there isn't a backlog. The quality of in-room dining food is good and the food's delivered promptly. However, don't expect variety when it comes to

title: Great location and wonderful breakfast
desc: love the sea view from the room! The breakfast menu at Prego restaurant has a broad variety of cuisine, of which my favourites are the middle eastern and mediterranean breakfast. Conveniently located near to MRT train station.

title: Well located, Convenient, Good Stay
desc: Hotel is well located and conveniently accessed to food. Generally a good stay with themed event. Staffs are friendly and attend to our issues promptly. Newly renovated room with amenities that focuses on sustainability.

title: Good location
desc: 1. Good location and shopping mall is just right downstair 2. Hotel can improve for the variety of breakfast in Prego 3. Gym is well equipped and pool is clean but a bit crowded Overall, it‚Äôs a good stay and will consider to come back.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: First of all, I would like to thank you for a wonderful 1 night staycation. I was staying in room 1931 and my confirmation number is KWQSCXXQ. My girlfriend and I really enjoyed our stay. Just to give you a little background on how we eventually choose your hotel and a bit of myself. I have been a Marriott Bonvoy Elite Member for years and this year alone I have done over 100 stays with my girlfriend (attach) in the chain of hotels, St Regis, JW Marriott, Marriott at Orchard, Four Points. On top of being a Marriott Member, I do frequent the Hyatt Chain. Prior to covid, I was a platinum member with IHG hotels. We also did some stays in smaller boutique hotels this year. So travelling and even staycations is a norm for me. As a young boy some 30 years ago, staying

title: Nice view, clean room but poor attention to details
desc: Stayed at Fairmont on 1-3 Jan 2022 for our wedding anniversary. We were impressed during our last stay in Dec 2019. But our experience this round was marred. In our room booking, we had stated feather allergy and requested for polyester or cotton alternative. This request was overlooked and we had to request for the bedding to be replaced late evening when we noticed it. For the benefit of the night staff on duty, this was attended to promptly. However, there was still residue of feather in the room which caused allergy reaction to my wife and lucky thing she had anti histamine on hand or it could have ended worst. The TV was personalized with guest name. However, my wife's name was misspelled to a food (Bee Hoon). She was not impressed to say the least. Overall, the room

title: Underwhelmed and not impressed
desc: Booked a stay at the Signature King Suite over New Year. The entire stay was disappointing. At this price point (~S$1700 for 2 nights), it would have been better to stay at other hotels. Firstly, the water pressure at the shower was rather pathetic and couldn't really take a nice shower. The bathtub was okay at best. Would have preferred an additional shower head to allow us to wash down the entire bath tub. The only tap is on one end and it takes quite some effort to at least wash down the tub before using. Secondly, housekeeping was non-existent. It could just be our luck that we missed all the timings that the housekeeping came by our room. We were out from 10am - 1.30pm and turned on the housekeeping indication but there was no housekeeping during this period. We were

title: Not dog friendly hotel
desc: Hotel staff wasn't able to provide simple service such as eating up human grade food for my dog. Even advising us to go to the supermarket to get can food instead which is ridiculous. So my dog has to make do with the little human food which we are having for dinner. They also uses carpet instead of wooden floor so hence make it difficult to clean when dog has an accident. Dog is also not allowed anywhere in the hotel except in the room. Hence I'm not sure why do they still consider themselves a pet friendly hotel.

title: The GOLD standard of Luxury
desc: Having my stay postponed twice, I am so grateful I get to experience Fairmont Gold Lounge and the amazing Ambassador Suite for my NYE countdown. The entire experience was nearly faultless and with all requests promptly attended to despite it being possibly the busiest day of 2021 for all hotels. The design of the renovated Ambassador Suite exudes a bespoke luxury aura while maintaining an updated colonial style. The furnishings and electronic controls were top of the range and extremely well-maintained.
