We were also pleasantly surprised to be given a complimentary bottle of champagne near midnight for NYE countdown, a totally unexpected gesture in these challenging times. The Gold Lounge staff who I interacted with most for my entire stay, namely Syakirah, Alfie and Amin were

title: Transferred from Sofitel to Fairmont
desc: Booked thru klook for 2 nite stay in Sofitel and got notified that due to Sofitel was COVID-19 SHN facility, so got transferred to Fairmont Hotel instead. Transferring process was quite smooth and the reply from both Reservation office was prompt. Parking at Fairmont was at Raffles City Shopping Center where there is not complimentary parking for it. But, for 2 night stay, the parking amount to less than $50. Needed to drive for convenience sake. As the location is at the heart of the city, it is walking distance to places like Bugis, Suntec and Marina Square. Check-in process was smooth and I upgraded my room from Deluxe to HarbourView King Room. Was allocated at 16 floor, and the the view was facing MBS, esplanade, Suntec and Marina Square. Room gave a cozy feel, it was

title: It was alright
desc: The overall stay was alright with regards to the gym, room amenities and cleanliness. The in room coffee was good. the washroom was clean and good however the knobs when showering is not user friendly as it is difficult to operate with soapy hands. the meals prepared for the event was cold, not healthy and overtly sweet.

title: Absolute customer experience
desc: 1. Great privilege accorded to Accor Silver member - car park coupon and welcome drinks and early check-in and late check-out request all granted. 2. Great saloon suites room views and amenities and facilities - king sized bed is extremely comfortable and room well maintained. 3. Great service staff at executive lounge.

title: Fairmont Singapore keeps getting better !
desc: Thoroughly enjoying our 4th staycay at the Fairmont Signature King suite! Checking in on 31 Dec 2021 was very fast & efficient and we were in our suite within 15 mins! Suite is clean with all bath and drinks amenities provided. Good room service. Enjoying the inroom dining too, great food esp the satay which we keep ordering. Totally enjoying our new year‚Äôs Eve staycay here. Great location. An efficient & responsive reservation & front desk team. Enjoyed Antidote evening drinks and dinner. Already thinking of our next suite staycay in 2022!

title: Cocomelon staycation
desc: The stay was ok. However upon entering the room and entering the bathroom noticed dried up toothpaste foam dripping at side of basin. Airconditioning was good. Showers were great. Cocomelon staycation turn 3 adults into kids again! Had our dinner at cocomelon and went back into the room with a plesant surprised! Other than that good comfortable stay. Well located.

title: Great stay in a spacious room with great view and facilities
desc: Everything is great. Room is spacious with great view, breakfast was exceptional. Spa facilities was extensive with choice of steam room, sauna, hot pool and cool pool. If only late check out was available and the unpleasant morning experience with the staff at the spa turned out better, the staycation would have been perfect!

title: Good location and excellent service
desc: King suite was very spacious with auto curtain and all. Room was spick and clean. Received excellent service from the staff: lobby, prego and room service. Fridge can be cooler and extra bed not very comfortable though. Overall awesome stay!

title: Excellent staycay and superb clean hotel
desc: Excellent staycay to celebrate my wedding anniversary. Our 2nd time staying at Fairmont and it was as good as my previous stay but even better. Staff were professional and attend to guest needs promptly. Buffet breakfast was good and the tables were cleared promptly too. To add on, the complimentary cake given for our anniversary make the stay even more memorable and awesome. Thank you ‚ò∫Ô∏èüëçüèºKuddos Fairmont

title: Good location but dusty carpet
desc: Poor service at Prego and little variety of food for kids. Room seemed not vacuumed thoroughly as my husband sneezed non stop after we entered the room. When we go out, he stopped sneezing and started sneezing again once we were back in the room this continued throughout my entire stay and hence I reckoned the room carpet was dusty.

title: Wonderful stay with an amazing view
desc: We stayed for 2 nights and one of our rooms had a very beautiful view of the Marina Bay Area at a high floor, which was amazing at any time of the day. The service staffs were also very nice, such as the staff who checked us in and also the housekeeping lady who cleaned our room on Xmas. She even voluntarily made a towel rabbit for my son who absolutely loved it!

title: Comfortable room with great view
desc: Comfortable room with a great view out to Marina Bay. Concierge was helpful (esp. at busy check-in.) Very disappointing that Fairmont are inconsistent with Accor standards on executive lounge access! (Not available for ALL Platinum??). Breakfast quality was good but had to wait a long time to get in - busy week post Christmas!

title: Fabulous and awesome Fairmont Family Stay
desc: Awesome Fairmont Family Birthday Staycation. Good location with mrt below within stone throw, shopping just within building. Cleanilness and santization of room all adhere to. Q to check in takes 45min or more however special request for stay was taken care of. The kids love the swimming pool( a must to prebook). Breakfast at Asia Food Market wasn't up to standard, should have gotten Prego Bfast. Overall, amazing Staycation with family. We would be back again if there's great promotion.

title: Great short Staycation for family
desc: Had a great family of 4 staycation at Fairmount during Christmas 2021. Even though the check-in was very packed due to the many others families sharing the same staycation mindset, the staffs have been patient and friendly. They've guided my family to a waiting area while I checked in. The double room was spacious for 2 adults with 2 kids and plenty of amenities for all. The location was at the heart of Singapore and shopping and dining are just within walking distance...even to the Merlion. We had our breakfast at Prego and the food were awesome. Due to Covid and busy time during our stay, Swimming Pool reservation could be a challenge and its first come first serve reservation. Same goes for breakfast booking, where you will need your fast fingers to ensure you have the

title: good stay
desc: Great experience for one night stay at Fairmont. Fuss free of pre registration of checking in, it took me less than 5mins even my booking is during Xmas week. Overall experience was memorable with my daughter. Will come back again for longer stay the next time when there is a promotion Thankyou so much Fairmont & Management Team

title: Awesome stay with superb service
desc: Had a great and successful proposal! The staffs assisted in every aspect of the proposal to help to ensure that the fianc√©e did not suspect. Special thanks to Amanda for assisting with various aspects of our stay.

title: Good Location Stay
desc: Signed up for Christmas Pokemon Experience and booked the King suite. Was told when booking can put extra bed in as there were 3 of us so we quickly did our booking as slots were filling up and when we arrived no extra bed was available. Was told had to make do with what i have in the room. Was expecting abit more Pokemon deco in the room but actually was the normal King suite with the accessories on the bed. I understand maybe due to hygiene purpose. But could have change the deco or picture in the room. We reorg the room with the small sofa and bench and requested extra pillow and blanket to make it stayable for 3 pax. Can do without breakfast because 45mins is abit rush with kid in tow and location was not exactly within hotel. Location was ideal as had access to a lot of

title: Great stay, from check-in to check-out!
desc: Did the spa-cation package, and we loved the spa facilities! Although slots for the pool and gym facilities were limited due to Covid restrictions, it was relatively easy to book the facilities beforehand. Room was big and comfortable, rain shower pressure was good, and the hotel being on top of Raffles City makes it an accessible location to explore town. We had an enjoyable dinner at Prego, service was great and the set meal was good value. Drinks at Anti:dote were unique too, and the staff was friendly and helpful in making recommendations!

title: Great stay
desc: Enjoyed our stay with Fairmont again. It never fail to satisfy. It was clean, spacious and breakfast was good too. Check in was efficient and staff were well trained and courteous. Ran into problem with the lift but the staff were very helpful and quick to assist. Will stay again.

title: Good location, comfortable rooms and amenities
desc: It was a free stay from my Amex benefits. I found the booking process to be pleasant and the checking in process simple. As the gym and pool requires booking, I didn't manage to use them. The in room water filter dispenser system was a huge plus.

title: Good couple of days stay ... but...
desc: South tower has opened, enjoyed the newly renovated room. Comfortable bed and good service as usual. Accor Platinum benefits of spacious King Suite upgrade, very clean room. One annoying problem of the south tower room is the built-in water dispenser. The hot water will reboil itself every few hours even middle of the nights. It's noisy... so probably will invite lots of complain from light sleepers. Air-conditioning did not work very well... the thermostat is probably defective in my room 1922. It's freezing even with 26degree temperature setting.. as the hotel was almost full, so not given any room change. Improve/solve all the issues, and Fairmont will be great again.

title: Top rate stay in spacious room with excellent service staff
desc: Check in was seamless (we came at noon but had to return at 2.30pm). Because of the location, waiting wasn't an issue - we just had a tough time deciding what to eat/do in the meantime. Room was spacious with excellent view. Filtered dispensed water is genius and environmentally friendly. There was a cosy corner to create and share family moments. Facilities were booked ahead of time via link and enjoyed thoroughly - kids pool, in-room dining, sauna/steam room etc. All memorable and satisfying experiences. Hoping to return soon!

title: Mediocre at best
desc: Our card key was constantly deactivated, having to go to the concierge each time it was deactivated (3 times in total). The service upon checking in was poor and lack of personal touch (staff name: Wei Jie) who was probably an intern, judging how his demeanor was like. Pre-check in email exchanges also revealed that the stay was for my partner and I's 4th anniversary celebration, and the email correspondent said that there would be a chocolate mousse cake that would be delivered, again, to no avail. The inability to check in early and check out late, although is a bonus in most scenarios, also left a bad taste in our mouth due to how it was handled and communicated to us. The stay could not be any more ordinary.

title: Take a break in the city centre.
desc: Booked deluxe room for anniversary. Wanted marina view but to no avail. So we were given the pool view instead and we weren‚Äôt disappointed! Spacious and unblocked. Great location, direct access to shopping malls & MRT. Huge plus point. Nice accommodation to take a break in the city centre.

title: Loved the stay! Clean, Comfortable and Contented
desc: The service is impeccable, the facilities are well maintained, the location is good! The room is spacious. If you are just planning to head in for a stay without anything, you can. The hotel provides you with basic amenities, and the shopping centre downstairs can fulfill your wardrobe needs.

title: Convenient location but service can be better
desc: Check in took over 20 mins. Check out took 10 mins. Every time we walk past the lobby, we see a long queue. Aren't the staff supposed to speed things up and reduce overcrowding with covid? Room was clean but toilet choked on our arrival. Had to call for help to fix it.Room service was expensive (which is normal) but food wasn't up to standard. Our initial booking at another hotel was closed for SHN so we got transferred over to Fairmont but given this service, i wouldn't be back.

title: Very bad experience
desc: Very bad experience. Four of the electrical powe sockets in room 0611 were not working. Despite us calling the front desk to inform, nobody came to fix it! Definitely not a 5-star hotel standard as even such a basic necessity could not be fixed. Highly disappointed!!

title: Ease of Checking-In
desc: Easy to check-in with in advance online check-in. staff are friendly. limited usage of dining voucher. room is clean. but i do not like to have a connecting room door. can hear the next door guest. i do not think that the hotel accomodation is full, so why do i need to be in a connecting room

title: Delightful event
desc: I would like to take this opportunity to extend my gratitude to Debbie for introducing the event space to me. Special mention to Wynn, for accomodating last minute modifications and making the event flawless. Replying to emails ever so prompyly. Last but not least, Noel ensured the operations maintained a high standard. Thank you to the entire team that made my special day very memorable ‚ù§

title: Beautiful Rooms & Bathroom
desc: We have stayed in many hotels in Singapore but we feel The Fairmont is one of the best for service and room standard! We really loved the room with the amenities and the gorgeous bathroom. The way the room lights work and the electric curtains really make the stay perfect. It's the small things that mater and they are done right.

title: Fairmont
desc: Good stay , very convenience and good budget if come with stayplus from Accor plus. The swimming pool and breakfast at prego is good. Only downside is the hotel balcony view is block. Free complimentary carpatk

title: Best location if you want to shop and eat!
desc: Went for a 4 days 3 nights stay at the Fairmont Singapore; this is not the first time I have stayed in this property; apart from its great location, the property is dated and more needs to be done to enhance the customer experience. Was given dining credits but with more restrictions that the credits - can't use it here, there and everywhere. I was left with Antidote - the high tea was in need of more than just an antidote to cure itself! at that price, the product was mediocre; do not go there even if you had the time and money! I should have just donated to charity! yes, its that bad - the sandwich was crap! even the army cookhouse can do better!

title: An improved experience
desc: This time I booked the King Suite with the Cocomelon package. The entire experience was satisfactory, from checking in, checking out, housekeeping and cleanliness, which was a marked improvement from my previous encounter. The only thing I noted was it seemed somewhat dusty - I have allergies and I found myself sneezing more than average. In the bathroom I was always greeted by dancing dust particles (I'm not a neat freak so the fact that it caught my attention says something). However I liked the room configuration. Although it was a connecting room, we couldn't hear our next door neighbours so I hoped they didn't hear us as well. I found the long corridor to the minibar really hilarious because it felt like just getting water from the kettle was a long journey, so we ended

title: Unlikely to return but appreciate being given a room with a view of the pool and Marina Bay Sands
desc: Fairmont fell short of my expectations as a 5-star hotel for my stay of 3 nights and 4 days. Even with pre-arrival check-in done for every single night of my stay and armed with QR codes, I queued for close to an hour, and only reached my room past 3.30pm. Nespresso machine water leaks, ice bucket with rust, unrelenting noise from neighbouring rooms and pool guests could be heard throughout my stay even with the balcony doors shut tight, walls were disappointedly not soundproof. My room was located close to 18th floor. I decided to choose this hotel after reading about how welcoming the hotel was to other guests and taking importance on celebrations and birthdays but I did not feel the same hospitality. There was no complimentary cake or any fruits or pastries given to me, even

title: Staycation in the city
desc: Good location at the city center. Great staff who are very accommodating and pleasant to talk to. Comfy and spacious rooms with excellent accessibility. A lot of food and shopping options at a stone throw away. Highly recommended for both foreign and local tourists.

title: Below expectation staycation
desc: 3 Reception Not attentive to customer‚Äôs needs Food below expectations Inconsistencies in service w the operator/royal services Bell boy(Malay) not helpful to assist with the luggage Money spent at Antidote restaurant not worth The 4days/3nites stay only happy with the location

title: Great place for our fam staycay!
desc: What's not to love? Great location, beautiful hotel, impeccable service and friendly and helpful staff! Easy to get food / go shopping as linked to many malls! And the train station is right outside! Our go-to for family staycation! Definitely not our last!

title: December Treat
desc: Smooth check in/out. Please opt for e-check in/out! Fantastic room(Deluxe with 2 Double Beds) Awesome view Clean, well kept and spacious. Just nice for us family of 4! Within close proximity to malls& eateries.

title: Had a fantastic staycation with the kids!
desc: We stayed as a family 11 to 12 dec 2021. Check in was smooth and we were served by a very attentive staff Eugena Lua. He saw that we had a infant and toddler in tow, he tried his best to allow us to check into our suite before official check-in so my kids could have their nap before using the ameninties. He also surprised them with little bears and my kids were elated! My girls also loved the suite so room as it has so much room to roam. After that, he also check in on us to ensure our cot was sent up. We personally loved the willow stream spa too. The operations team was also very efficient during our stay and our requests were met promptly. We will definitely for back for our anniversary!:)

title: Satisfied with one night stay
desc: Overall satisfied with the service. Room was spacious and clean as image shown. Dining credit used at Prego as other restaurants are even pricey. Luggages were sent in the room before we collected the key- good service! The breakfast provided are not buffet style but the food are really tasty.

title: Nice Staycation
desc: Overall my family had enjoyed the stay and everything was in order with a systematic flow. The Coco Melon theme was a great and my kids love it, especially with the little gifts. Check in time could be earlier and crowd control could be improved as it took a while to que up for the lift.

title: Disappointing pawcation
desc: Had a wonderful reservation experience thanks to Winnie and Divya because of how quick they were to communicate and resolve TA booking issues. We had the pleasure of being checked in by Kenny Wong and reception and took it upon himself to check us out and enquire how our stay was but the rest of the staff looked exhausted and cold. The rooms were so average( given the rate paid and which room doesn‚Äôt have a bathtub nowadays unless it‚Äôs a boutique hotel), the room service for dinner was awful - pasta (from Prego no less) was thoroughly over cooked and steak was frozen, not fresh. The only special touch was that the person who took my order made an extra effort to get regular coke for me although I was told it ran out which was really really nice and the definition of service /

title: Worst spacation experience
desc: Hotel service is good, with front desk that are helpful and takes initiative to try resolve any issues guests encounter. The pillow and bed are not as comfy compared to the previous stay at the family room. The pillow kinda hard and the bed is abit too soft. The spa amenities are quite bad as the hotel only allows 1 pax/20mins to use the sauna and jacuzzi. If there are more than 1 pax, the staff will chase guests out of the sauna/jacuzzi, even though the guests have clarified that they are from the same room. The spa is worst of all. We pre-booked an additional pax with the SAME type of massage with the same group. When we are at Willow spa, the staff insisted we book another type of massage and proceed to book the massage for us without allowing us to clarify. We thought its

title: Staycation
desc: This was my 4th staycation in 2021, my family enjoyed the staycation & the location is convenient where we could take train to MBS or Orchard Road. Will definitely return if there‚Äôs staycation promotion!

title: Wonderful stay
desc: My family of 4 stayed in a room that came with a tent. My two boys loved the tent. I wished the tent was big enough to sleep the both of them though but it was for a single child. The room was spacious and clean and we had a nice view. Breakfast at Prego's was lovely. The food was really good and menu offers a pretty wide selection.

title: Default Staycation Location
desc: Our check-in & check-out experience was excellent. Fairmont provided us with complimentary carpark for the full duration of our stay which was extremely important for us. Our room location has always been excellent in terms of our window facing, access to the lift. The room amenities has always been exceptionally good and balanced in terms of toiletries, the coffee/tea corner, wifi and TV programming is more than adequate. The biggest PLUS is location!!!! Last but not least, Prego's service level is a personal & professional favorite, so it literally makes our staycation experience complete and we would not hesitate to return for our future staycations and recommends Fairmont to our family and friends. I had successfully referred 2 friends to become AccorPlus members during

title: Great service and attentiveness
desc: It's my 2nd time staying at the fairmont. During the first stay, my family enjoyed the large room, hotel facilities and the accessible location and we were just as excited coming back for the stay this time. We were initially given a room where our neighbours were talking at a volume that was fairly audible and we were concerned that sleep would be an issue as we were light sleepers. When we requested for a change of room, this request was attended to immediately and within 45 minutes, we were shifted to the next available room. I would like to credit the hotel staff for being attentive and accomodating to our requests because it really made the stay a memorable one. Well done to the staff at fairmont.

title: well located, comfortable stay, great quality rooms
desc: i stayed for 3 days & 2 nights, i liked the personal touch of hotel staff knowing our names and addressing us by second name when we call in, its like they already know who we are, most hotels just address you by sir or ma'am, so this personal touch makes me feel more valued as a customer. The promptness of service was generally good, in terms of response time to pick up calls, time taken for room service to arrive, meticulousness of housekeeping services even though i indicated to only make up my room in the late afternoon. Rooms are also well kept and maintained, couldnt find any fault with the room, everything was in good working order. Perhaps would be nice if a small basket of snacks or complimentary bar items could be included in suite-level rooms. On my first night, i

title: Pawcation
desc: Excellent in all ways - cleanliness, in room dining, location. Bathroom was spotless. Dust-free, clean carpets, linen and furniture. Wonderful view from bright and spacious room. Everything works in the room. Dog was happy too.

title: Staycation with family
desc: My family have enjoyed the stay esp my boy who has mentioned it to me a couple of times as we can‚Äôt get to travel overseas. It‚Äôs quite disappointing to us that we can‚Äôt get to check-in early for my post birthday celebration as they told us is a peak for them. However, also like to thanks fairmont Singapore for the surprise chocolate cake.

title: Nice room, terrible hotel
desc: I arrived from the SG Sofitel and had to join a queue to check in as no Privelege Queue was in operation. Forced to give S$150 per night for expenses. When I complained I was told "don't worry, you'll get S$150 per night back too". Which shows a complete ignorance of American Express's FX charges (each way) and FX rates. How would I spend S$150 a day if the bar is basically shut (SG required 10.30pm finish due to Cov19) so its a generous amount. A week after leaving the hotel I still haven't been credited the funds. No executive floor for afternoon drinks and canapes. If I had be pre-warned I would never have stayed at the hotel. The room was not ready so I was told to leave my luggage and wander the streets until they called me. No late checkout. I am Diamond FFS. Out

title: Bad Stay with Dirty BathTub, Don't deserve 5 Stars hotel
desc: I stayed at #708 on 4 Dec. It was a staycation for the family and mainly for my twins (2 years old) to enjoy the bath tub. However we realized the bath tub was too dirty. Once you fill up the bath tub with hot water, the dirt from the hose of the Shower head polluted the water. I tried changing 3 times the water but the dirt from the hose just keep appearing. End up we gave up on the bath tub. We feedback to the hotel and the remedy suppose to arrive at 5.30pm with the engineering team to replace the shower hose. However the engineering team didn't appear. At 5.45pm the housekeeping team appeared and tried to clear it with cleaning solution. After 30min of work, they left. At 6pm it is close to our dinner time, we felt the time is wasted on something that is not working.

title: Excellent location & facilities; very quick check in/out, and warm service from the staff!!
desc: Overall great staycation experience with wonderful and helpful staff. Very fortunate that we had a room with a fantastic view, and the only regret is not able to get a real late check out due to peak booking. We will be back in another 2 weeks again for another staycation - please try to give similar view and late check out if available! Many thanks in advance! Two minor events/observations for suggestion for consideration: 1) The breakfast queue on Friday morning (9am+) was incredibly long (>20 pax with 5+ families with young children) almost out to the lobby. I do not know if it is due to the guests not booking the time slot or not. Perhaps, the Prego staff can offer them options to dine in at room. Obviously some will still like to queue for the buffet. We got in

title: My Personal Thoughts
desc: Birthday staycation at the hotel recently. Cleanliness of room - Excellent. Check in time 3pm Check out time 12pm. Online check-in - Not working. Internet Access - Poor. Fridge - Not working. Customer Service - Lukewarm.

title: Great location. Superb staff service. Overall enjoyable stay.
desc: From the front desk to call operators to housekeeping, all our encounters were delightfully pleasant. Keep it up. The location was centrally located with amenities. Great. It was a pity the walls were thin and could hear both neighbours talking at the corridor and the tv sound from next door while sleeping in bed. Furthermore the pillows were flat, so much so my partner had a sprained neck after a night‚Äôs sleep.

title: Overall, the stay at the hotel was pleasant.
desc: Overall, the stay at the hotel was pleasant. Below a broad review: a. Check-in. Despite a small crowd at the lobby, the check-in process was smooth and quick. The customer service associate who assisted us was pleasant and cheery. And, there were hotel staff at the various touch points to assist the guests e.g. lift lobby. b. Hotel room. The room was spacious with its own living space and was relatively clean. However, it looked slightly dated with the style of curtains used, and there were some water stains (alike) on the ceiling. Due to our sleeping preference, the bed was too soft for our liking. c. Room toilet. The toilet was relatively clean and had most of the amenities available without need to make further request. The bath tub is good for a nice bubble bath üòä

title: Disappointment In Some Aspects
desc: No room upgrade was given to ALL Platinum member. The room was very hot as the aircon could not be adjusted, no response . Late check-out was rejected even one hour also not granted. I think early check-in and late check-out should not be included in the privileges of Platinum members, not appropriate at all as hotels were fully booked at all times and so could not fulfill these requests accordingly. However, housekeeping was good and up to standard. Room was well-prepared when I checked in. Thank you very much to the housekeeper. Breakfast was good and tasty, better than my last visit.

title: Anniversary staycation
desc: Apart from some less-than-ideal starting experience, my overall staycation at Fairmont was good! The bads: - room only has 1 usb plug, which is unusual based on today modern standards - sadly, the only usb plug in my room is faulty too - one side room lamp is loose and emits some electrical crackling noise - due to full room capacity, they cannot offer 4pm late check-out (no fault of hotel though) - due to full room capacity, they cannot offer me a room with good views for my anniversary celebrations [UPDATE: that evening, a front desk staff (sharifah) called to offer me a room shift to higher floor and having a pool view; I took up the offer and the second room is definitely at a more pristine state with a more refreshing view of the pool, esplanade and even the merlion which

title: Wonderful staycation
desc: Fast mobile check-in and check-out. Friendly hotel staff who acceded to our requests for late check-out, last minute use of swimming pool. It was so difficult to get swimming slots for one night stay, and luckily managed to use the swimming pool 1 hour prior to check out. Loved the comfortable mattress, and had good night's sleep.

title: Staycation with baby
desc: Great service and facilities for a much needed break. Brought my baby along, good room w view and given a baby cot and needs followed up with. The hotel staff were friendly and food from room service was splendid. Would have extended my stay if not for work. Gym fully equipped with machines for a good total body workout. Pool was a bit crowded but okay i guess. Didnt manage to use the steam room, would try again in future

title: Enjoyable staycation
desc: We (2 adults, 3 children) stayed in the signature king suite and had an excellent time. Room was spacious and comfortable with nice view. The kids enjoyed the daily swim in the pool, the breakfast, and the CocoMelon theme restaurant at the Clove (not part of the package). The location was very convenient with the Raffles City shopping mall right below, allowing us to pack light and just walk down to grab whatever we need eg bath bomb for soaking in the tub, late dinner / snack, etc.

title: Clean and comfortable, but poor 1) information given prior to stay, 2) room service, and 3) in-room dining
desc: Hotel was operating at a high capacity during the period of our viist; perhaps those were the reasons for their lack in abovementioned areas. We only received an email two days prior to our visit with details regarding the pre-booking of facilities. Unfortunately, everything was already fully booked and we did not get to use the hotel facilities (swimming pool/gym) at all. Would appreciate if such emails for facilities booking could be sent way in advance in future! Room service was unresponsive on multiple occasions. We had to call them twice to get them to deliver our request. Housekeeping was extremely slow; by mid-afternoon our rooms were still not cleaned up and we just gave up entirely on it. In addition, the quality of the food from in-room dining is not up to par,

title: Nice Little Daycation
desc: Tried out their 1 day staycation. Checked in at 8.40am was easy but the staff did not know how to process Lazada voucher. Fairmont room was spacious but the 2 double beds seem small. Bigger size folks (4 pax) may have issue if stay overnight. Enjoyed the swimming pool & each slot was 1.5hrs. Had $75 dining credits and we used on Prego takeaway. It is enough for 2 mains. Disappointed that Prego charges full ala carte prices for dining credits and not the lower takeaway prices. Food is very average. Wish there can be more choices to use for dining credits, note Asian Mkt Cafe was closed. Overall a relaxing day. Can walk ard the shopping centre and nearby. Checked out at 7pm by dropping keys in a box.

title: Lovely place
desc: Stayed here for an extended time and their service is impeccable. Very accommodating and quality is top notch. rooms are comfy and clean. Breakfast is good though I miss buffet style ones. Will definitely return whenever I have the chance.

title: Good stay
desc: Room was big for family of four. But there‚Äôs no bathtub as they couldn‚Äôt upgrade our room and the kids were disappointed. Breakfast quality was good, wide selection and quality food at Prego. In room dining food was not that great, can skip in my opinion. Overall it‚Äôs still a good stay.

title: A very well relaxed stay
desc: We are a small family of three coming in for a well deserved staycation since we were not able to travel from 2020 and also a sort of treats for recovering from cancer for me. I loved the room, the service and the location. All we did was chill out, watch movies, shop around and then back again to the room. My teen son refused to step out of the room because he so loved the ambience of the room. A well deserved luxurious two night stay.

title: Pok√©mon Themed Staycation
desc: Took my son to the Pok√©mon Themed Staycation & we enjoyed it to the max! We were checked in by Celeste who was professional & detailed in explaining the different activites we can do at the hotel. Room is clean & huge with a beautiful city view. The Pok√©mon premiums are absolutely awesome. We headed down to the 4th floor where Auntie Sok Jing helped us set up our Nintendo Switch & we enjoyed 3 hours of Pok√©mon game. Called room service to order our in-room breakfast that was included in the package & the operator was polite & patient. Check out was swift & seamless. Met Kenny at the lobby who kindly assisted us. This hotel is full of hospitality excellence. Even thou the staff's mask were on at all times, I could feel the sincerity of their hospitality beaming through

title: Horror stay with a last straw departure at 11.30 PM
desc: Dear Mr. Strasser, It is with great duress that I am writing to you about a litany of complaints about our stay that compelled myself and my son to leave your hotel at approximately 11.30 PM on 22 November 2021. The context: We booked a ‚ÄúDaycation‚Äù at your hotel on 22 November. However, we received an email notification that it was a one night stay. I enquired with Norman of room reservations who then confirmed with his supervisor that the hotel will honour an overnight stay versus a daycation. We were assigned room 1607. The complaints: 1. Upon entering room 1607, we were visibly taken by the scratches on the lower wooden panel of the bed. There was also a very strong presence of supernatural. The first impression that struck was that the scratches were nail scratchings.

title: Great Stacay
desc: Great and spacious room. Location is excellent with underground link to nearby shopping malls. Excellent staff to ensure your stay is pleasant and nice. My family had a really great time. Will highly recommend this hotel.

title: SHN/Normal Stay
desc: Was under SHN till 23 Nov in South Wing. Thereafter extended stay in hotel for another 4 nights in North Wing. Care and attention provided was certainly much warmer and better during SHN compared to normal hotel stay. Room condition and view in renovated South Wing was much better compared to the room I stayed in North Wing. Service level at Front Desk and particularly at Willow Spa (Gym) was underwhelming.

title: Excellent Stacayation
desc: Excellent location with underground link to nearby shopping areas. The room is spacious and amenities were great. Wifi is fast and bed was comfy. The staff were all excellent and we had a very pleasant time. Will definitely be back again for a stacay again.

title: Well located!
desc: Spacious room and comfortable stay. Only downside, no bidet and toilet was a walkway from bedroom . In room breakfast was just nice and making me full. Nearest MRT is City Hall. Nearby shopping malls, Marina Sq, Funan Mall, Suntec City.

title: Great service from Jose at the poolside restaurant!
desc: My partner and I enjoyed our dinner at the poolside restaurant. Jose was very attentive to our orders and made sure that we had the drinks we needed. Will recommend to come have a meal at the restaurant

title: I have a good night at the hotel
desc: The room is great because there's a Tv if we are board or have nothing to do we can watch TV for me if I feel board I watch football on this channel such as : Fox sport and Bein Sport I find it very interesting ton watch all channels on this Tv for kids they can watch cartoon network there were a lot of cartoon in there i hope that there will be more visitors visiting this hotel soon.

title: comfortable bed, clean rooms and hotel, awesome!
desc: surely the staff of fairmont singapore must be commended from front desk to housekeeping to kitchen crew. excellent and responsive service. breakfast at prego is of high quality and fresh. would have given a 10 rating but experienced slight delay during check in. Thanks fairmont for the excellent stay.

title: I have had better experience with Fairmont
desc: Hi, We have chosen Fairmont as our honeymoon staycation. Looking forward to enjoy our time, we had booked a 2 nights stay at Signature King Suite and also a couple massage with willow stream spa. ROOM LAYOUT - We were appalled when we arrived at a U-shaped room, where the living space is out of sight from the bed, and toilet even further out along the corridor. I would think that such segregation will be more appropriate for small family where the parents can have some downtime in bed away from the noise with the children in living and vice versa. We would have love to wire our laptop to the tv to watch our newly minted wedding video, but quickly realize that we are unable to do so in the comfort of the bed for the TV is out in the living room. Because it is full house, hotel

title: Good location and comfy bed!
desc: Great location!!! Easy to look for food and shopping malls around. Travel by MRT is super convenient. Clean and comfy beds. Friendly hotel staffs and fuss free on checkin and checkout. Room-in for dine in breakfast food is good! Will definitely book again!

title: Pawcation Package for Cat
desc: The room price compared to my family room the next door caught us into surprised. Was thinking that there should be a special room for pawcation with the additional price would pay for would be satisfied, especially with the amenities like cat scratching boards so that the pet will not scratch the sofa or carpets. Asides this having difficulties on finding to park my vehicle, end up I have to make whole big turn goes round back to where originally where I was from the main entrance lobby. Infact they asked prior arrival for my vehicle number so rightfully they should allocate the lot. Well besides this, the view was nice facing MBS.

title: Enjoyable family staycation
desc: Overall a good family staycation and enjoyable for the kids. The family staycation package was worth it. Clean and spacious room, excellent room service and in-room breakfast was fantastic. Hotel staff was warm and friendly. If there was no restrictions in place due to Covid-19, we would have had a more enjoyable time to spend at the pool as a family and we could have had the birthday decor setup as requested. Overall a wonderful stay, thank you!

title: Bad room allocation
desc: Bad room allocation. Went to fairmont for staycation in September and November. Was given level 6 despite requesting for high floor. Asked to change to higher floor during check in but staff said no other rooms available in the whole of fairmont. Told staff to check why am I allocated level 6 twice and he said will get someone to check and get back to me. Duty manager called and said there was a available room on level 17 and check if I wanted to shift over. I declined as it was too much of a hassle to change room after moving all my stuffs in. Requested for late check-out and was given 1.5hours. Everything was ok except the room allocation and the incompetency of the front desk staff who checked me in.

title: Awesome , good service
desc: amazing stay here at Fairmont, thank you to the house keeping team for we had an amazing experience room 2011 & 2005 from 8-10 Nov 2021 . They serviced the room well and we had cute elephants to welcome us!!! Thank u team AUDREY ,LIYING ,HE YING ,XIN LI from team housekeeping

title: 2 rooms staycay for 2 nights
desc: Stayed in signature suite room and have a normal room for my parent in law. Signature suite room is perfect especially when you are travelling with a little one and a cot is needed. Had a room with the city view. The staff have arranged 1 cake for each room as we are there to celebrate our anniversary and my in law‚Äôs birthday. Everything is great! Front Desk and Comm Center staff are ever ready to help and assist. Had to trouble the team to store my breastmilk. Have a few minor hiccup regarding this as they stored it with room service team instead of Concierge and the team couldn‚Äôt find it at one point. The breastmilk were definitely kept at compacted freezer and they were completely out of shape when I receive it but it is not too much of a big deal. The front desk were

title: Not able to sleep well
desc: 1. The room sound insulation is not good, can hear LOUD water flowing noise from upstairs at midnight; 2. Bed is not comfortable, too hard, is the bed even flat? 3. Staff is polite and welcoming, thumb up. 4. The curtain is not able to move easily, wear and tear? 5. Operating lift is limited (not sure whether only 1 is operating); need to Q 6. Facing an office building, no privacy. Not goin to go back again, avoid at all cost.

title: Very Disappointing!!!
desc: There was hacking noise at 11.30pm. when I gone down to lobby to checked. The manager said it came from the shopping mall and they couldn't do anything!!! Do you think this is an acceptable response? We couldn't sleep all night!

title: Room is a mess with no operator available
desc: 1st, when I initially checked in, the room was unclean, I doubt that it was even disinfected. The only good thing is that they transferred me unto another room 2nd, I ordered in room dining as my dinner and I requested bottled water and bucket of ice, nothing came, when I pressed 0, no one is answering. 3rd, I went to pool area within my designated slot, I sat on the bar side instead of pool side saying that there are reservations there, 1hr has passed, no one occupied the area.

title: Best location if you like shopping, food and checking out the city
desc: We had a good time, shopping at Raffles City and food choices was in abundance and great. Also the pool and spa (massage) were excellent. The staff at the front desk and swimming pool/spa were very friendly and obliging. We had dinner at Prego and the food and service were great.

title: A good stay at Fairmont
desc: Staycation at Fairmont was plesant. Nothing to wow about. Rooms are okay. Not the best but also not the worst. Aircon is honestly not cold at all. But from what I gather from my friends, this is a common issue for the hotel. What I like about staying at Fairmont are for location and facilities. Location is one of the best and the rooms offer good views around the area. Another thing I like the access to the spa facilities. Not all hotels offer this and I do enjoy relaxing in the jacuzzi and using the steam/sauna rooms. Furthermore, the pool here, another a circular shape is perfect as it isn't too cool like most other pools. The gentleman's working by the pool are very friendly and welcoming. Breakfast at Prego is good. Could tell they are slightly struggling due to the crowd

title: Birthday staycation that was goodhad a good
desc: Had a good birthday staycation . make use of the spa facilities on level 6 via booking at the counter on level 6 due ton covid 19 requirements. Steam room and sauna was good with hot jacuzzi & cold jacuzzi pools .

title: Lovely Birthdaycation
desc: Excellent service from front desk at check in. Even though we didn't get any free upgrade or late check out, we felt very welcome by 'Angele' (may have gotten her name wrongly'). Spacious king room was clean and comfortable. Love the children pool. Consider huge and the kids enjoyed more than 1.5hr. Toiletries especially shampoo and conditioner are good quality. No tangled hair after use. Bed comfortable but pillow too soft for us. Only downsize is aircon is not cool and room get stuffy. We were literally sweating at night.

title: Conveniently located and easy to use pre-arrival check-in and express checkout
desc: Fairmont is a regular hotel we stay in for a short staycation and we have experienced how they have improved their check-in and checkout processed in the past 2 years. With pre-arrival check-in and booking of facilities, it reduces the time we spend physically at the check-in queue, thus we were served almost immediately upon arrival at the hotel. Express checkout also allow us to just drop the keys off in the express checkout box and our bill will be emailed to me quickly. No need to queue to check out. As always the hotel is centrally located and linked to City Hall MRT through the Raffles City Shopping Centre which in turn is linked to other shopping malls around the area. Great for those who don't drive. We could hear the water sound from another room for this stay which

title: Birthday Staycation
desc: Terrible mistake to celebrate my birthday in this Hotel. Poor service and communication. Nothing surprise but lot of disappointment Replies from the staff wasn‚Äôt the most sincere and accurate. Could have done better but choose not to.

title: Overall a great stay
desc: Strategically located, the room has a huge space and has a nice view and the hotel staff are friendly. Although the room is subject to availability, i.e., I got a double room when it should be a king suite as arranged by my event organiser.

title: Average stay at Fairmont
desc: Room was spacious and clean but was disappointed by the block of office tower is right in the middle of the window view . Twin bed for couple (hmm..) not really their fault though. As they did email to inform of no more double . Hotel in-room breakfast was awesome & sent punctually. In room dining was great & fast too . Steak arrived warm & delicious.

title: Great stay but wished I can experience the newer rooms
desc: Check In ‚Äì I arrived to a relatively empty lobby at 10:30am on a weekday and a counter was available immediately. I was thanked for my loyalty as a Platinum member and told I have been upgrade to a Signature Suite which was nice. I was also proactively given a 4pm late check out and Platinum benefits explained to me, including welcome drinks and access to the Fairmont‚Äôs version of a concierge, the Royal Service. In total, the process took about 15mins. Note that all leisure guests are in the North Tower as the South Tower is a SHN (Stay Home Notice) facility. Room ‚Äì My Signature Suite (56SqM), 1817, was indeed spacious but feels a little aged due to the liberal use of brown. I am hence thankful for the few pops of maroon colors in the space. The very spacious bathroom contains

title: Great staycaytion
desc: Was a great experience! The hotel has helpful, lovely staff - I would especially like to commend Jasmine Lew : she helped to send up a cake to our room when she was informed it was my partner's birthday. When our room had an aircon leak, she went beyond expectations and helped to smoothly resolve the problem by arranging for a new room quickly and apologising for any inconvenience. Very professional attitude, thank you Fairmont!

title: Not quite up to Fairmont service standards!
desc: We stayed in a King Suite for a local staycation. Location is fantastic, being situated directly above Raffles City shopping centre and City Hall MRT. Facilities were broadly good. However... it seemed to lack the service standards of previous Fairmonts I have stayed in. The showerhead for instance was broken, as were the phones (of all things). The service staff were mainly quite perfunctory and not warm. Also, no free parking befuddled me. There is much good for the hotel, but the standards were not quite up to what i expected of Fairmont.

title: Great stay for family of 4
desc: Love the view! We get the city view with high floor! The hotel is super clean and very kids friendly. We enjoyed our stay there. Will definitely come again when we can. The pool is a simple pool though. But it does not matter. Our staycation was a great one :)

title: A decent hotel with shopping mall
desc: We booked a staycation at Fairmont, and also to celebrate our anniversary. We requested for early check in, but was told the hotel was full, and so, unable to provide early check in. The check in process was fast as I had already done a pre-check in procedure. Although the check in staff was very friendly and helpful, he made 2 mistakes. One, he wrote the wrong room number for us, resulting in is having to wait around while the room was still being cleaned. When I called the operator, I was told my room is actually ready, at the next door. And luckily, the chambermaid helped me to check that my room key was able to access the rightful room. I wasn‚Äôt happy as I was made to wait. But then again, I didn‚Äôt kick up a fuss since people make mistakes. Secondly, he told me that Prego

title: Lovely stay at a great location
desc: 2nd time staying at fairmont with family in the signature suite. Love the bigger room so we could all stay comfortably and kids could roam around more easily. We had breakfast in the room and the staff was nice to call ahead and inform of the delay due to lift issues. Booking of swimming pool slots were also a breeze with the online booking system. Lastly, check out was really easy, just dropping the key off and doing the checkout online. Will be back!

title: Satisfied stay!
desc: Staff are friendly and helpful! Room is clean and nice! Highly recommended! Room with nice view too! And complimentary birthday cake for birthday celebration! Thank you fairmont team! We've a wonderful stay!

title: love the location & ease to many eateries
desc: I had a great stay except for 2 incidences: 1. when my surgical mask gave way at the lobby - front desk guy "refused" me a mask saying none is available. UNBELIEVABLE for a SHN hotel and poor service quality. I was shocked and was offended, a guest's emergency was turned down/refusal to help. 2. to facilitate my check out - i used the self check out online function, only to be accosted/disturbed 4x by housekeeping (2x) and front desk (2x) pestering me why I haven't checked out. We already had informed 36 hours prior check out that we leave at 5pm. Horrid was housekeeper came into round unannounced. She wasn't informed of my late check out

title: Incredible Experience!
desc: Fairmont Hotel was allocated to me for my SHN after my trip from the USA. I have stayed at this property for 10 days and it has been an amazing experience. The front desk staff and the in-house dining staff are professional and go the extra mile to ensure customer satisfaction. It is a perfect stay and I would accord my appreciation to everyone at the red zone who made my stay possible and kudos to the management for upholding great service. Well Done! I shall certainly recommend this hotel to my friends and family members.

title: Room are spacious and clean. Good Marina Bay view too.
desc: Have a staycation with my family. Room is big and clean. Kid love the tent alot. Has a balcony to view the nice marina bay. Toilet is very clean too with all the amenities given. Will like to go back again in the future. Only disappointment was there is no bathtub.

title: Well located and great stay!
desc: Booked the signature king suite for my family of 4 staycation. My 2 young children can stay for free with existing bed and we were given a complimentary extra bed too! All staffs were very friendly and approachable. My package comes with 2 complimentary breakfast and children can dine in with complimentary breakfast too! The food are great at Prego. In Room dine in were good too. Other than no complimentary parking due to the facility belongs to Raffles City Shopping Centre, it's really a great 3 days 2 night stay for my family. The kids enjoyed it very much. Thank you!

title: Relaxing stay overall
desc: Overall had an excellent stay at the Fairmont. Staff were excellent and professional, the rooms were well equiped and provided great practicalities such as automatic moving curtains. The bed overall was quite comfortable too, and the rooms were large. Staff were also quick to take action on room defects, including a 24 hour aircon mechanic when our aircon was not providing cool air. There was a little wear and tear that couldn't be resolved by the staff, such as the loose power points at the bedside tables - this is apparently due to a lot of guests pulling plugs in and out of them all the time. The two options for complimentary breakfast was a good choice. It offered variety for guests staying multiple nights to try new things. The staff were overall quite good in those
